segment.source: NVDA NVDA_VERSION User Guide
segment.target: NVDA NVDA_VERSION 用戶指南

segment.source: NVDA NVDA_VERSION Commands Quick Reference
segment.target: NVDA NVDA_VERSION 指令快速參考

segment.source: Introduction
segment.target: 簡介

segment.source: Welcome to NVDA!
segment.target: 歡迎使用 NVDA!

segment.source: NonVisual Desktop Access (NVDA) is a free and open source screen reader for the Microsoft Windows operating system.
segment.target: NVDA (Nonvisual Desktop Access) 為適用於 Microsoft Windows 作業系統的自由及開放原始碼的螢幕助讀程式，

segment.source: Providing feedback via synthetic speech and Braille, it enables blind or vision impaired people to access computers running Windows for no more cost than a sighted person.
segment.target: 透過 NVDA 提供的合成語音及點字，全盲或視覺障礙的人得以不必花比有視力的人更多的成本即可使用 Windows 電腦。

segment.source: NVDA is developed by [NV Access](https://www.nvaccess.org/), with contributions from the community.
segment.target: NVDA 是由 [NV Access](https://www.nvaccess.org/) 所開發，並包含來自 NVDA 社群參與者的許多貢獻和回饋。

segment.source: General Features
segment.target: 特色

segment.source: NVDA allows blind and vision impaired people to access and interact with the Windows operating system and many third party applications.
segment.target: NVDA 讓全盲及視覺障礙的人能夠操作 Windows 作業系統及許多第三方應用程式。

segment.source: A short video demonstration, ["What is NVDA?"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tCFyyqy9mqo) is available from the NV Access YouTube channel.
segment.target: NV Access YouTube 頻道上有一段簡短的影片展示[「What is NVDA?」](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tCFyyqy9mqo)。

segment.source: Major highlights include:
segment.target: 主要特點包括：

segment.source: Support for popular applications including web browsers, email clients, internet chat programs and office suites
segment.target: 支援流行的應用程式包括網頁瀏覽器、郵件程式、線上聊天程式及辦公室套裝軟體

segment.source: Built-in speech synthesizer supporting over 80 languages
segment.target: 內建的語音合成器支援超過 80 種語言

segment.source: Reporting of textual formatting where available such as font name and size, style and spelling errors
segment.target: 讀出文字格式例如字型名稱與大小、樣式與拼字錯誤

segment.source: Automatic announcement of text under the mouse and optional audible indication of the mouse position
segment.target: 自動讀出滑鼠所指的文字並可選用音調變化指示滑鼠位置

segment.source: Support for many refreshable braille displays, including the ability to detect many of them automatically as well as braille input on braille displays with a braille keyboard
segment.target: 支援多種點顯器包括可被自動偵測或具有點字輸入鍵盤的點顯器

segment.source: Ability to run entirely from a USB flash drive or other portable media without the need for installation
segment.target: 可以不需安裝完全從 USB 隨身碟或其他可攜式媒體上執行

segment.source: Easy to use talking installer
segment.target: 易於使用具備語音功能的安裝程式

segment.source: Translated into 54 languages
segment.target: 已翻譯成 54 種語言

segment.source: Support for modern Windows Operating Systems including both 32 and 64 bit variants
segment.target: 支援現今的 Windows 作業系統包含 32 及 64 位元的版本

segment.source: Ability to run during Windows sign-in and [other secure screens](#SecureScreens).
segment.target: 可在 Windows 登入畫面及[其他安全畫面](#SecureScreens)執行

segment.source: Announcing controls and text while using touch gestures
segment.target: 使用觸控手勢時可讀出控制項和文字

segment.source: Support for common accessibility interfaces such as Microsoft Active Accessibility, Java Access Bridge, IAccessible2 and UI Automation
segment.target: 支援常見的輔助功能介面例如 Microsoft Active Accessibility, Java Access Bridge, IAccessible2 及 UI Automation

segment.source: Support for Windows Command Prompt and console applications
segment.target: 支援 Windows 命令提示字元和終端應用程式

segment.source: The ability to highlight the system focus
segment.target: 能夠醒目提示系統焦點

segment.source: System Requirements
segment.target: 系統需求

segment.source: Minimum System Requirements
segment.target: 最低系統需求

segment.source: Operating Systems: all 32-bit and 64-bit editions of Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11, and all Server Operating Systems starting from Windows Server 2012 R2.
segment.target: 作業系統：32 和 64 位元的 Microsoft Windows 8.1、Windows 10、Windows 11 及 Windows Server 2012 R2 以上的所有伺服器作業系統。

segment.source: both AMD64 and ARM64 variants of Windows are supported.
segment.target: 支援 AMD64 與 ARM64 架構下執行的 Windows。

segment.source: Note that 32-bit operating systems are no longer under active support.
segment.target: 不再主動支援 32 位元作業系統。

segment.source: Note that Windows 8.1 and Windows Server versions older than 2022 are no longer under active support.
segment.target: 不再主動支援 Windows 8.1 與 Windows Server 2022 以前的版本。

segment.source: at least 500 MB of storage space.
segment.target: 至少 500 MB 的儲存空間。

segment.source: Recommended System Requirements
segment.target: 建議系​​統需求

segment.source: Operating Systems: 64-bit editions of Windows 10, Windows 11, and Windows Server 2022.
segment.target: 作業系統：64 位元的 Windows 10、Windows 11 及 Windows Server 2022。

segment.source: both AMD64 and ARM64 variants of Windows are supported.
segment.target: 支援 AMD64 與 ARM64 架構下執行的 Windows。

segment.source: at least 500 MB of storage space.
segment.target: 至少 500 MB 的儲存空間。

segment.source: at least 4 GB of RAM.
segment.target: 至少 4 GB 記憶體。

segment.source: Internationalization
segment.target: 國際化

segment.source: It is important that people anywhere in the world, no matter what language they speak, get equal access to technology.
segment.target: 讓世界上所有的人不論使用何種語言都可以平等使用科技是極為重要的，

segment.source: Besides English, NVDA has been translated into 54 languages including: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Aragonese, Bulgarian, Burmese, Catalan, Chinese (simplified and traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Farsi, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German (Germany and Switzerland), Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Kannada, Korean, Kyrgyz, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil and Portugal), Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish (Colombia and Spain), Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian and Vietnamese.
segment.target: NVDA 除了英文外已翻譯成 54 種語言，包括：南非荷蘭文、阿爾巴尼亞文、阿姆哈拉文、阿拉伯文、亞拉岡文、保加利亞文、緬甸文、卡達隆尼亞文、中文 (簡體與繁體)、克羅埃西亞文、捷克文、丹麥文、荷蘭文、波斯文、芬蘭文、法文、加里斯亞文、喬治亞文、德文 (德國與瑞士)、希臘文、希伯來文、印度文、匈牙利文、冰島文、愛爾蘭文、義大利文、日文、坎那達文、韓文、吉爾吉斯文、立陶宛文、馬其頓文、蒙古文、尼泊爾文、挪威文、波蘭文、葡萄牙文 (巴西與葡萄牙)、旁遮普文、羅馬尼亞文、俄文、塞爾維亞文、斯洛伐克文、斯洛維尼亞文、西班牙文 (哥倫比亞與西班牙)、瑞典文、坦米爾文、泰文、土耳其文、烏克蘭文及越南文。

segment.source: Speech Synthesizer Support
segment.target: 語音合成器支援

segment.source: Apart from providing its messages and interface in several languages, NVDA can also enable the user to read content in any language, as long as they have a speech synthesizer that can speak that language.
segment.target: 除了提供多種語言的訊息與使用者介面外，NVDA 還可以讓使用者閱讀任何語言的內容，只要他們有一個可以說該種語言的語音合成器。

segment.source: NVDA is bundled with [eSpeak NG](https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng), a free, open-source, multi-lingual speech synthesizer.
segment.target: NVDA 內嵌有 [eSpeak NG](https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng)，這是一款自由及開放程式碼的多語言語音合成器。

segment.source: Information about other speech synthesizers that NVDA supports can be found in the [Supported Speech Synthesizers](#SupportedSpeechSynths) section.
segment.target: 有關 NVDA 支援的其他語音合成器資訊請參見[支援的語音合成器](#SupportedSpeechSynths)章節。

segment.source: Braille support
segment.target: 點字支援

segment.source: For users that own a refreshable braille display, NVDA can output its information in braille.
segment.target: 對於擁有點字顯示器 (簡稱點顯器) 的使用者，NVDA 可將資訊以點字形式輸出到點顯器上，

segment.source: NVDA uses the open source braille translator [LibLouis](https://liblouis.io/) to generate braille sequences from text.
segment.target: NVDA 使用開放原始碼的點字轉譯器 [LibLouis](https://liblouis.io/) 將文字轉為點字序列，

segment.source: Both uncontracted and contracted braille input via a braille keyboard is also supported.
segment.target: 還支援以點字鍵盤輸入未收縮及收縮點字，

segment.source: Furthermore, NVDA will detect many braille displays automatically by default.
segment.target: 此外 NVDA 在預設情況下將會自動偵測許多點顯器，

segment.source: Please see the [Supported Braille Displays](#SupportedBrailleDisplays) section for information about the supported braille displays.
segment.target: 有關支援的點顯器資訊請參見[支援的點顯器](#SupportedBrailleDisplays)章節。

segment.source: NVDA supports braille codes for many languages, including contracted, uncontracted and computer braille codes.
segment.target: NVDA 支援多種語言點字碼，包括收縮、未收縮及電腦點字碼。

segment.source: License and Copyright
segment.target: 授權與著作權

segment.source: NVDA is copyright NVDA_COPYRIGHT_YEARS NVDA contributors.
segment.target: NVDA 著作權 2006-2024 是歸屬於 NVDA 貢獻者所有。

segment.source: NVDA is available under the GNU General Public License version 2, with two special exceptions.
segment.target: NVDA 受到「GNU 通用公共授權條款」第二版保護，但有兩個特殊例外，

segment.source: The exceptions are outlined in the license document under the sections "Non-GPL Components in Plugins and Drivers" and "Microsoft Distributable Code".
segment.target: 例外狀況列在授權文件 (copying.txt) 的「Non-GPL Components in Plugins and Drivers」和「Microsoft Distributable Code」段落中。

segment.source: NVDA also includes and uses components which are made available under different free and open source licenses.
segment.target: NVDA 同時也包含並使用了那些受其他不同自由及開放程式碼授權的元件，

segment.source: You are free to share or change this software in any way you like as long as it is accompanied by the license and you make all source code available to anyone who wants it.
segment.target: 只要將此授權隨附於軟體，您可以自由地以任何方式分享或修改此軟體，並將所有的原始碼提供給需要的人，

segment.source: This applies to both original and modified copies of this software, plus any derivative works.
segment.target: 這個規則適用於原始發佈的軟體或任何以此軟體修改之後發佈的軟體，以及所有採用此軟體內的程式碼所產生的軟體。

segment.source: For further details, you can [view the full license.](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html)
segment.target: 更詳細的內容請[檢視完整授權](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html)，

segment.source: For details regarding exceptions, access the license document from the NVDA menu under the "help" section.
segment.target: 關於例外狀況的祥細說明請參見 NVDA 功能表的「說明」子功能表內的「授權」項目。

segment.source: NVDA Quick Start Guide
segment.target: NVDA 快速入門指南

segment.source: This quick start guide contains three main sections: downloading, initial setup, and running NVDA.
segment.target: 此快速入門指南包含三個主要部分：下載、初使設定及執行 NVDA，

segment.source: These are followed by information on adjusting preferences, using add-ons, participating in the community and getting help.
segment.target: 接著是調整偏好、使用附加元件、參與社群及取得說明的資訊。

segment.source: The information in this guide is condensed from other parts of the NVDA User Guide.
segment.target: 此指南章節中的資訊是濃縮自 NVDA 用戶指南的其他部分，

segment.source: Please refer to the full User Guide for more detailed information on each topic.
segment.target: 關於每個主題的更多詳細資訊請參考完整的用戶指南。

segment.source: Downloading NVDA
segment.target: 下載 NVDA

segment.source: NVDA is completely free for anyone to use.
segment.target: NVDA 提供給所有人完全免費使用，

segment.source: There is no license key to worry about or expensive subscription to pay.
segment.target: 不需擔心授權金鑰或支付昂貴的訂閱費用。

segment.source: NVDA is updated, on average, four times per year.
segment.target: NVDA 平均每年更新四次，

segment.source: The latest version of NVDA is always available from the "Download" page of the [NV Access website](NVDA_URL).
segment.target: 最新版本的 NVDA 始終可從 [NV Access 網站](NVDA_URL)的「Download」頁面中取得。

segment.source: NVDA works with all recent versions of Microsoft Windows.
segment.target: NVDA 適用於所有最新版本的 Microsoft Windows，

segment.source: Check the [System Requirements](#SystemRequirements) for full details.
segment.target: 請參見[系統需求](#SystemRequirements)以取得祥細資訊。

segment.source: Steps for Downloading NVDA
segment.target: 下載 NVDA 步驟

segment.source: These steps assume some familiarity with navigating a web page.
segment.target: 這些步驟假定您對瀏覽網頁有一定的熟悉度。

segment.source: Open your web browser (Press the `Windows` key, type the word "internet" without quotes, and press `enter`)
segment.target: 打開您的網頁瀏覽器 (按 Windows 鍵，輸入 internet 這個單字，然後按 Enter)

segment.source: Load the NV Access download page (Press `alt+d`, type the following address and press `enter`):
segment.target: 載入 NV Access 下載頁面 (按 Alt+D，輸入以下網址並按 Enter)：

segment.source: https://www.nvaccess.org/download
segment.target: https://www.nvaccess.org/download

segment.source: Activate the "download" button
segment.target: 點選「Download」按鈕

segment.source: The browser may or may not prompt for an action after downloading, and then start the download
segment.target: 瀏覽器可能會有可操作的下載提示並開始下載

segment.source: Depending on the browser, the file may run automatically after it downloads
segment.target: 根據瀏覽器不同，檔案下載後可能會自動執行

segment.source: If the file needs to be manually launched, press `alt+n` to move to the notification area, then `alt+r` to run the file (or the steps for your browser)
segment.target: 如果需要手動執行檔案，請按 Alt+N 移到通知，接著按 Alt+R 執行檔案 (或依照您所使用瀏覽器的步驟)

segment.source: Setting up NVDA
segment.target: 設定 NVDA

segment.source: Running the file you have just downloaded will start a temporary copy of NVDA.
segment.target: 執行剛下載的檔案會啟動一個 NVDA 的暫時性版本，

segment.source: You will then be asked if you want to install NVDA, create a portable copy or just continue using the temporary copy.
segment.target: 將詢問您是要安裝 NVDA、建立可攜式版或繼續使用暫時性版本。

segment.source: NVDA does not need access to the Internet to run or install once the launcher is downloaded.
segment.target: 下載安裝程式後 NVDA 不需連到網際網路即可執行或安裝，

segment.source: If available, an internet connection does enable NVDA to check for updates periodically.
segment.target: 若能連到網際網路可讓 NVDA 定期檢查更新。

segment.source: Steps for running the downloaded launcher
segment.target: 執行下載的安裝程式步驟

segment.source: The setup file is named "nvda_2022.1.exe" or similar.
segment.target: 安裝檔名為 nvda_2022.1.exe 或類似的名稱，

segment.source: The year and version changes between updates to reflect the current release.
segment.target: 依照目前發行的版本會顯示不同的年份及版次。

segment.source: Run the downloaded file.
segment.target: 執行下載的檔案，

segment.source: Music plays while a temporary copy of NVDA loads.
segment.target: 載入 NVDA 暫時性版本過程中會有音樂播放，

segment.source: Once loaded, NVDA will speak throughout the rest of the process.
segment.target: 載入後 NVDA 將會在接下來的過程中朗讀。

segment.source: The NVDA Launcher window appears with the license agreement.
segment.target: NVDA 安裝程式視窗會顯示授權合約，

segment.source: Press `downArrow` to read the license agreement if desired.
segment.target: 如有需要請按向下鍵來閱讀授權合約。

segment.source: Press `tab` to move to the "I agree" checkbox, then press the `spacebar` to check it.
segment.target: 按 Tab 移到「我同意」核取方塊並按空白鍵來勾選它。

segment.source: Press `tab` to move through the options, then press `enter` on the desired option.
segment.target: 按 Tab 移到各個選項並在想要的選項上按 Enter。

segment.source: The options are:
segment.target: 選項有：

segment.source: "Install NVDA on this computer": This is the main option most users want for easy use of NVDA.
segment.target: 安裝 NVDA 在這台電腦：這是大多數使用者想要輕鬆使用 NVDA 的主要選項。

segment.source: "Create portable copy": This allows NVDA to be setup in any folder without installing.
segment.target: 建立可攜式版：這允許在任何資料夾中建立 NVDA 而不需安裝，

segment.source: This is useful on computers without admin rights, or on a memory stick to carry with you.
segment.target: 通常用在沒有管理員權限的電腦上或是儲存在您攜帶的隨身碟中。

segment.source: When selected, NVDA walks through the steps to create a portable copy.
segment.target: 選擇此項 NVDA 將進入建立可攜式版的步驟，

segment.source: The main thing NVDA needs to know is the folder to setup the portable copy in.
segment.target: 主要是 NVDA 需知道建立可攜式版的資料夾所在。

segment.source: "Continue running": This keeps the temporary copy of NVDA running.
segment.target: 繼續執行：這會使 NVDA 暫時性版本保持執行，

segment.source: This is useful for testing features in a new version before installing it.
segment.target: 這在安裝新版本前測試新版功能很有幫助。

segment.source: When selected, the launcher window closes and the temporary copy of NVDA continues running until it is exited or the PC is shut down.
segment.target: 選擇此項安裝程式視窗會關閉，NVDA 的暫時性版本會繼續執行直到結束或關閉電腦，

segment.source: Note that changes to settings are not saved.
segment.target: 而設定上的變更將不會儲存。

segment.source: "Cancel": This closes NVDA without performing any action.
segment.target: 結束：這會關閉 NVDA 而不執行任何動作。

segment.source: If you plan to always use NVDA on this computer, you will want to choose to install NVDA.
segment.target: 如果您打算在這台電腦上使用 NVDA，您需要選擇安裝 NVDA，

segment.source: Installing NVDA will allow for additional functionality such as automatic starting after sign-in, the ability to read the Windows sign-in and [secure screens](#SecureScreens).
segment.target: 安裝 NVDA 將允許附加功能，例如登錄後自動啟動、讀出 Windows 登入畫面和[安全畫面](#SecureScreens)，

segment.source: These cannot be done with portable and temporary copies.
segment.target: 這些在可攜式及暫時性版本無法做到。

segment.source: For full details of the limitations when running a portable or temporary copy of NVDA, please see [Portable and temporary copy restrictions](#PortableAndTemporaryCopyRestrictions).
segment.target: 有關執行 NVDA 可攜式或暫時性版本限制的詳細資訊請參見[可攜式與暫時性版本的限制](#PortableAndTemporaryCopyRestrictions)。

segment.source: Installing also offers to create Start Menu and desktop shortcuts, and allow NVDA to be started with `control+alt+n`.
segment.target: 安裝還提供了建立開始功能表及桌面的捷徑，並允許使用 Ctrl+Alt+N 啟動 NVDA。

segment.source: Steps for installing NVDA from the launcher
segment.target: 從安裝程式安裝 NVDA 的步驟

segment.source: These steps walk through the most common setup options.
segment.target: 這些步驟介紹了最常見的設定選項，

segment.source: For more details on the options available, please see [Installation options](#InstallingNVDA).
segment.target: 有關可用選項的更多詳細資訊請參見[安裝選項](#InstallingNVDA)。

segment.source: From the launcher, ensure the checkbox to agree to the license is checked.
segment.target: 在安裝程式中確認同意授權合約的核取方塊已勾選。

segment.source: `Tab` to, and activate the "Install NVDA on this computer" button.
segment.target: 按 Tab 到「安裝 NVDA 在這台電腦」按鈕並按下。

segment.source: Next, are options to use NVDA during Windows sign-in and to create a desktop shortcut.
segment.target: 接下來是在 Windows 登入畫面使用 NVDA 及建立桌面捷徑的選項，

segment.source: These are checked by default.
segment.target: 這些預設是勾選的，

segment.source: If desired, press `tab` and `spaceBar` to change any of these options, or leave them at the default.
segment.target: 如有需要請按 Tab 及空白鍵來變更這些選項，或保留預設值。

segment.source: Press `enter` to continue.
segment.target: 按 Enter 繼續。

segment.source: A Windows "User Account Control (UAC)" dialog appears asking "Do you want to allow this app to make changes to your PC?".
segment.target: 出現 Windows 「使用者帳戶控制 (UAC)」對話框，詢問「您是否要允許此應用程式變更您的電腦？」。

segment.source: Press `alt+y` to accept the UAC prompt.
segment.target: 按 Alt+Y 接受 UAC 提示。

segment.source: A progress bar fills up as NVDA installs.
segment.target: 隨著 NVDA 的安裝進度，進度列將會逐漸填滿，

segment.source: During this process NVDA sounds an increasingly higher pitched beep.
segment.target: 期間 NVDA 會發出越來越高的嗶嗶聲，

segment.source: This process is often fast and may not be noticed.
segment.target: 這個過程通常很快，可能不會被注意到。

segment.source: A dialog box appears confirm that the install of NVDA has been successful.
segment.target: 出現一個對話框確認 NVDA 安裝已成功，

segment.source: The message advises to "Press OK to start the installed copy".
segment.target: 訊息提示「請按『確認』開始使用安裝的版本」，

segment.source: Press `enter` to start the installed copy.
segment.target: 按 Enter 來開始使用安裝的版本。

segment.source: The "Welcome to NVDA" dialog appears, and NVDA reads a welcome message.
segment.target: 出現「歡迎使用 NVDA」對話框，NVDA 會讀出歡迎訊息，

segment.source: The focus is on the "Keyboard Layout" drop-down.
segment.target: 焦點停在「鍵盤配置」下拉式方塊，

segment.source: By default, "Desktop" keyboard layout uses the number pad for some function.
segment.target: 預設情況下「桌上型電腦」鍵盤配置會將數字鍵盤用於某些功能，

segment.source: If desired, press `downArrow` to choose "Laptop" keyboard layout to reassign number pad functions to other keys.
segment.target: 如有需要請按向下鍵選擇「筆記型電腦」鍵盤配置，將數字鍵盤功能重新指派給其他按鍵。

segment.source: Press `tab` to move to "Use `capsLock` as an NVDA modifier key".
segment.target: 按 Tab 拸到「使用 Caps Lock 鍵作為 NVDA 鍵」，

segment.source: `Insert` is set as the NVDA modifier key by default.
segment.target: Insert 鍵被設定作為預設的 NVDA 鍵，

segment.source: Press `spaceBar` to select `capsLock` as an alternate modifier key.
segment.target: 按空白鍵選擇 Caps Lock 鍵作為替代的 NVDA 鍵。

segment.source: Note that the keyboard layout is set separately from the NVDA modifier key.
segment.target: 附註：鍵盤配置與 NVDA 鍵是分開設定的，

segment.source: The NVDA key and keyboard layout can be changed later from the Keyboard Settings.
segment.target: NVDA 鍵及鍵盤配置可在稍後從鍵盤設定中變更。

segment.source: Use `tab` and `spaceBar` to adjust the other options on this screen.
segment.target: 使用 Tab 及空白鍵來調整此畫面上的其他選項，

segment.source: These set whether NVDA starts automatically.
segment.target: 包括設定 NVDA 是否自動啟動。

segment.source: Press `enter` to close the dialog box with NVDA now running.
segment.target: 按 Enter 關閉對話框，NVDA 繼續執行。

segment.source: Running NVDA
segment.target: 執行 NVDA

segment.source: The full NVDA user guide has all the NVDA commands, split up into different sections for reference.
segment.target: 完整的 NVDA 用戶指南包含所有 NVDA 指令，並分為不同章節以供參考，

segment.source: The tables of commands are also available in the "Commands Quick Reference".
segment.target: 指令表也可在「指令快速參考」中找到。

segment.source: The "Basic Training for NVDA" NVDA training module has each command in more depth with step-by-step activities.
segment.target: 在 NVDA 訓練教材《Basic Training for NVDA》中有逐步操作的方式來更深入了解各項指令，

segment.source: "Basic Training for NVDA" is available from the [NV Access Shop](http://www.nvaccess.org/shop).
segment.target: 《Basic Training for NVDA》可從 [NV Access Shop](https://www.nvaccess.org/shop) 取得。

segment.source: Here are some basic commands which are used frequently.
segment.target: 這裡有一些經常使用的基本指令，

segment.source: All commands are configurable, so these are the default keystrokes for these functions.
segment.target: 所有指令都是可設訂的，以下是這些功能的預設快速鍵。

segment.source: The NVDA Modifier Key
segment.target: NVDA 組合鍵

segment.source: The default NVDA modifier key is either the `numpadZero`, (with `numLock` off), or the `insert` key, near the `delete`, `home` and `end` keys.
segment.target: 預設的 NVDA 組合鍵是數字鍵盤 0 (關閉 numLock) 或 Insert 鍵，靠近 Delete、Home 及 End 鍵，

segment.source: The NVDA modifier key can also be set to the `capsLock` key.
segment.target: capsLock 鍵也可以設定為 NVDA 組合鍵。

segment.source: Input Help
segment.target: 輸入說明

segment.source: To learn and practice the location of keys, press `NVDA+1` to turn Input help on.
segment.target: 要學習和練習按鍵的位置，請按 NVDA+1 開啟輸入說明，

segment.source: While in input help mode, performing any input gesture (such as pressing a key or performing a touch gesture) will report the action and describe what it does (if anything).
segment.target: 在輸入說明模式下執行任何輸入手勢 (例如按下按鍵或執行觸控手勢) 都會讀出該操作並描述其功能 (若有的話)，

segment.source: The actual commands will not execute while in input help mode.
segment.target: 在輸入說明模式下實際指令並不會執行。

segment.source: Starting and stopping NVDA
segment.target: 啟動及停止 NVDA

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Start NVDA |`control+alt+n` |`control+alt+n` |Starts or restarts NVDA
segment.target: 啟動 NVDA |Ctrl+Alt+N |Ctrl+Alt+N |啟動或重新啟動 NVDA

segment.source: Exit NVDA |`NVDA+q`, then `enter` |`NVDA+q`, then `enter` |Exits NVDA
segment.target: 結束 NVDA |NVDA+Q 然後 Enter |NVDA+Q 然後 Enter |結束 NVDA

segment.source: Pause or restart speech |`shift` |`shift` |Instantly pauses speech. Pressing it again will continue speaking where it left off
segment.target: 暫停或繼續語音 |Shift |Shift |立即暫停語音，再按一次會從中斷的地方繼續朗讀

segment.source: Stop speech |`control` |`control` |Instantly stops speaking
segment.target: 停止語音 |Ctrl |Ctrl |立即停止朗讀

segment.source: Reading text
segment.target: 讀出文字

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Say all |`NVDA+downArrow` |`NVDA+a` |Starts reading from the current position, moving it along as it goes
segment.target: 讀出全部 |NVDA+向下鍵 |NVDA+a |從目前位置開始讀出，游標跟隨移動

segment.source: Read current line |`NVDA+upArrow` |`NVDA+l` |Reads the line. Pressing twice spells the line. Pressing three times spells the line using character descriptions (Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, etc)
segment.target: 讀出目前行 |NVDA+向上鍵 |NVDA+l |讀出游標所在的一行，連按兩下拼讀整行，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀整行 (Alpha, Bravo, Charlie 等)。

segment.source: Read selection |`NVDA+shift+upArrow` |`NVDA+shift+s` |Reads any selected text. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will spell it using character description
segment.target: 讀出選取文字 |NVDA+Shift+向上鍵 |NVDA+Shift+S |讀出選取的文字，連按兩下拼讀資訊，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀。

segment.source: Read clipboard text |`NVDA+c` |`NVDA+c` |Reads any text on the clipboard. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will spell it using character description
segment.target: 讀出剪貼簿文字 |NVDA+c |NVDA+c |讀出剪貼簿內的文字，連按兩下拼讀資訊，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀。

segment.source: Reporting location and other information
segment.target: 讀出位置及其他資訊

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Window title |`NVDA+t` |`NVDA+t` |Reports the title of the currently active window. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will copy it to the clipboard
segment.target: 視窗標題 |NVDA+t |NVDA+t |讀出目前作用中的視窗標題，連按兩下拼讀標題，連按三下複製標題到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Report focus |`NVDA+tab` |`NVDA+tab` |Reports the current control which has focus. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will spell it using character description
segment.target: 讀出焦點 |NVDA+Tab |NVDA+Tab |讀出目前焦點所在的控制項，連按兩下拼讀字詞，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀字詞。

segment.source: Read window |`NVDA+b` |`NVDA+b` |Reads the entire current window (useful for dialogs)
segment.target: 讀出視窗 |NVDA+b |NVDA+b |讀出目前整個視窗 (對於對話框很有用)。

segment.source: Read status bar |`NVDA+end` |`NVDA+shift+end` |Reports the Status Bar if NVDA finds one. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will copy it to the clipboard
segment.target: 讀出狀態列 |NVDA+End |NVDA+Shift+End |如果 NVDA 找到狀態列則讀出，連按兩下拼讀資訊，連按三下複製內容到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Read time |`NVDA+f12` |`NVDA+f12` |Pressing once reports the current time, pressing twice reports the date. The time and date are reported in the format specified in Windows settings for the system tray clock.
segment.target: 讀出時間 |NVDA+F12 |NVDA+F12 |按一下讀出目前時間，連按兩下讀出日期，時間和日期依照 Windows 設定中通知區域時鐘所指定的格式讀出。

segment.source: Report text formatting |`NVDA+f` |`NVDA+f` |Reports text formatting. Pressing twice shows the information in a window
segment.target: 讀出文字格式 |NVDA+F |NVDA+F |讀出游標所在的文字格式，按兩下以視窗顯示資訊

segment.source: Report link destination |`NVDA+k` |`NVDA+k` |Pressing once speaks the destination URL of the link at the current caret or focus position. Pressing twice shows it in a window for more careful review
segment.target: 讀出連結目標 |NVDA+K |NVDA+K |按一下讀出目前游標或焦點位置所在連結的目標 URL，連按兩下將它顯示在一個視窗中便於仔細瀏覽。

segment.source: Toggle which information NVDA reads
segment.target: 切換 NVDA 讀出的資訊

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Speak typed characters |`NVDA+2` |`NVDA+2` |When enabled, NVDA will announce all characters you type on the keyboard.
segment.target: 讀出輸入字元 |NVDA+2 |NVDA+2 |當啟用時，NVDA 將讀出所有在鍵盤上輸入的字元。

segment.source: Speak typed words |`NVDA+3` |`NVDA+3` |When enabled, NVDA will announce word you type on the keyboard.
segment.target: 讀出輸入單字 |NVDA+3 |NVDA+3 |當啟用時，NVDA 將讀出所有在鍵盤上輸入的單字 (適用英文等拼音文字)。

segment.source: Speak command keys |`NVDA+4` |`NVDA+4` |When enabled, NVDA will announce all non-character keys you type on the keyboard. This includes key combinations such as control plus another letter.
segment.target: 讀出指令鍵 |NVDA+4 |NVDA+4 |當啟用時，NVDA 將讀出所有在鍵盤上輸入的非字元按鍵，包括組合鍵例如 Ctrl 加上其他字母鍵。

segment.source: Enable mouse tracking |`NVDA+m` |`NVDA+m` |When enabled, NVDA will announce the text currently under the mouse pointer, as you move it around the screen. This allows you to find things on the screen, by physically moving the mouse, rather than trying to find them through object navigation.
segment.target: 啟用跟隨滑鼠朗讀 |NVDA+m |NVDA+m |當啟用時，移動滑鼠 NVDA 將會讀出滑鼠指標所指的文字，這允許您藉由實際移動滑鼠來尋找螢幕上的內容而不是藉由物件導覽的方式來尋找。

segment.source: The synth settings ring
segment.target: 快速語音設定

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Move to next synth setting |`NVDA+control+rightArrow` |`NVDA+shift+control+rightArrow` |Moves to the next available speech setting after the current, wrapping around to the first setting again after the last
segment.target: 移到下一個語音選項 |NVDA+Ctrl+向右鍵 |NVDA+Shift+Ctrl+向右鍵 |移到下一個可用的語音選項，若已到最後一個則會回到第一個選項。

segment.source: Move to previous synth setting |`NVDA+control+leftArrow` |`NVDA+shift+control+leftArrow` |Moves to the next available speech setting before the current, wrapping around to the last setting after the first
segment.target: 移到上一個語音選項 |NVDA+Ctrl+向左鍵 |NVDA+Shift+Ctrl+向左鍵 |移到上一個可用的語音選項，若已到第一個則會回到最後一個選項。

segment.source: Increment current synth setting |`NVDA+control+upArrow` |`NVDA+shift+control+upArrow` |increases the current speech setting you are on. E.g. increases the rate, chooses the next voice, increases the volume
segment.target: 增加目前語音選項的設定值 |NVDA+Ctrl+向上鍵 |NVDA+Shift+Ctrl+向上鍵 |增加目前語音選項的設定值，例如加快速度、選擇下一個語音及調大音量。

segment.source: Increment the current synth setting in larger steps |`NVDA+control+pageUp` |`NVDA+shift+control+pageUp` |Increases the value of the current speech setting you're on in larger steps. e.g. when you're on a voice setting, it will jump forward every 20 voices; when you're on slider settings (rate, pitch, etc) it will jump forward the value up to 20%
segment.target: 以較大幅度增加目前語音選項的設定值 |NVDA+Ctrl+Page Up |NVDA+Shift+Ctrl+Page Up |以較大幅度增加目前語音選項的設定值，例如在語音設定時每次往前跳 20 個語音；在滑桿設定 (速度、音調等) 時數值每次增加 20%

segment.source: Decrement current synth setting |`NVDA+control+downArrow` |`NVDA+shift+control+downArrow` |decreases the current speech setting you are on. E.g. decreases the rate, chooses the previous voice, decreases the volume
segment.target: 減少目前語音選項的設定值 |NVDA+Ctrl+向下鍵 |NVDA+Shift+Ctrl+向下鍵 |減少目前語音選項的設定值，例如降低速度、選擇上一個語音及調小音量。

segment.source: Decrement the current synth setting in larger steps |`NVDA+control+pageDown` |`NVDA+shift+control+pageDown` |Decreases the value of the current speech setting you're on in larger steps. e.g. when you're on a voice setting, it will jump backward every 20 voices; when you're on a slider setting, it will jump backward the value up to 20%.
segment.target: 以較大幅度減少目前語音選項的設定值 |NVDA+Ctrl+Page Down |NVDA+Shift+Ctrl+Page Down |以較大幅度減少目前語音選項的設定值，例如在語音設定時每次往回跳 20 個語音；在滑桿設定 (速度、音調等) 時數值每次減少 20%

segment.source: It is also possible to set the first or last value of the current synth setting by assign custom gestures in [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures), under the speech category.
segment.target: 也可以透過在[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)的語音類別中指派手勢來設定目前語音選項的第一個或最後一個值，

segment.source: This means, for example, when you're on a rate setting, it will set the rate to 0 or 100.
segment.target: 這表示例如當在速度設定時，它會將速度設定為 0 或 100，

segment.source: When you're on a voice setting, it will set the first or last voice.
segment.target: 當在語音設定時，它將設定為第一個或最後一個語音。

segment.source: Web navigation
segment.target: 網頁導覽

segment.source: The full list of Single Letter Navigation keys is in the [Browse Mode](#BrowseMode) section of the user guide.
segment.target: 單鍵導覽按鍵的完整清單位於用戶指南的[瀏覽模式](#BrowseMode)章節。

segment.source: Command |Keystroke |Description
segment.target: 指令 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Heading |`h` |Move to the next heading
segment.target: 標題 |H |移到下一個標題

segment.source: Heading level 1, 2, or 3 |`1`, `2`, `3` |Move to the next heading at the specified level
segment.target: 標題第 1、2 或 3 級 |1、2、3 |移到下一個指定層級的標題

segment.source: Form field |`f` |Move to the next form field (edit box, button, etc)
segment.target: 表單欄位 |F |移到下一個表單欄位 (編輯區、按鈕等)

segment.source: Link |`k` |Move to the next link
segment.target: 連結 |K |移到下一個連結

segment.source: Landmark |`d` |Move to the next landmark
segment.target: 地標 |D |移到下一個地標

segment.source: List |`l` |Move to the next list
segment.target: 清單 |L |移到下一個清單

segment.source: Table |`t` |Move to the next table
segment.target: 表格 |T |移到下一個表格

segment.source: Move backwards |`shift+letter` |Press `shift` and any of the above letters to move to the previous element of that type
segment.target: 往回移動 |Shift+字母 |按 Shift 和上述任一字母移動到該類型的上一個元素

segment.source: Elements list |`NVDA+f7` |Lists various types of elements, such as links and headings
segment.target: 項目清單 |NVDA+f7 |列出各種類型的元素，例如連結和標題

segment.source: Preferences
segment.target: 偏好

segment.source: Most NVDA functions can be enabled or changed via the NVDA settings.
segment.target: 大部分 NVDA 功能可以在 NVDA 設定中啟用或變更，

segment.source: Settings, and other options, are available via NVDA's menu.
segment.target: 「設定」和其他選項位於 NVDA 功能表中，

segment.source: To open NVDA's menu, press `NVDA+n`.
segment.target: 要開啟 NVDA 功能表，按 NVDA+N，

segment.source: To open NVDA's general settings dialog directly, press `NVDA+control+g`.
segment.target: 要直接開啟 NVDA 一般設定，按 NVDA+Ctrl+G。

segment.source: Many settings screens have keystrokes to open them directly, such as `NVDA+control+s` for synthesizer, or `NVDA+control+v` for other voice options.
segment.target: 許多設定都有快速鍵可以直接開啟，例如 NVDA+Ctrl+S 開啟合成器設定，或 NVDA+Ctrl+V 開啟其他語音選項。

segment.source: Add-ons
segment.target: 附加元件

segment.source: Add-ons are programs which provide new or changed functionality for NVDA.
segment.target: 附加元件是為 NVDA 提供新功能或修改既有功能的程式，

segment.source: Add-ons are developed by the NVDA community, or external companies and are unaffiliated with NV Access.
segment.target: 附加元件由 NVDA 社群或外部公司開發，與 NV Access 沒有關聯。

segment.source: As with any software, it is important to trust the developer of an add-on before using it.
segment.target: 與任何軟體一樣，在使用附加元件之前信任它的開發者是很重要的，

segment.source: Please refer to [Installing Add-ons](#AddonStoreInstalling) for ways to verify add-ons prior to installation.
segment.target: 有關在安裝之前驗證附加元件的方法請參考[安裝附加元件](#AddonStoreInstalling)。

segment.source: The first time the Add-on Store is opened, NVDA displays a warning about add-ons.
segment.target: 第一次打開附加元件商店，NVDA 會顯示一個有關附加元件的警告，

segment.source: Add-ons are not vetted by NV Access and may have unrestricted functionality and access to information.
segment.target: 附加元件未經 NV Access 審查，可以具有不受限制的功能和資訊存取權限，

segment.source: Press `spacebar` if you have read the warning and do not need to see it next time.
segment.target: 如果您已閱讀警告且下次不需要看到它，請按一下空白鍵，

segment.source: Press `tab` to reach the "OK" button, then `enter` to accept the warning and proceed to the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 按 Tab 到「確定」按鈕，然後按 Enter 接受警告並繼續前往附加元件商店。

segment.source: The "[Add-ons and the Add-on Store](#AddonsManager)" section of the User Guide contains information about every feature of the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 用戶指南的「[附加元件及附加元件商店](#AddonsManager)」章節包含有關附加元件商店每個功能的資訊。

segment.source: The Add-on Store is available from the Tools menu.
segment.target: 附加元件商店位於「工具」功能表，

segment.source: Press `NVDA+n` to open the NVDA menu, then `t` for tools, then `a` for Add-on Store.
segment.target: 按 NVDA+N 打開 NVDA 功能表，然後按 T 選擇工具，接著按 A 選擇附加元件商店。

segment.source: When the Add-on Store opens, it shows "Available add-ons" if no add-ons are installed.
segment.target: 當附加元件商店打開時，如果沒有安裝任何附加元件，它會顯示「可用的附加元件」，

segment.source: When add-ons are installed, the Add-on Store opens to the "Installed add-ons" tab.
segment.target: 當已安裝了附加元件，附加元件商店會打開到「已安裝的附加元件」索引標籤。

segment.source: Available add-ons
segment.target: 可用的附加元件

segment.source: When the window first opens, add-ons may take a few seconds to load.
segment.target: 當視窗第一次打開時，載入附加元件可能需要幾秒鐘的時間，

segment.source: NVDA will read the name of the first add-on once the list of add-ons finishes loading.
segment.target: 一但附加元件清單載入完成，NVDA 會讀出第一個附加元件的名稱，

segment.source: Available add-ons are listed alphabetically in a multi-column list.
segment.target: 可用的附加元件按字母順序排列在一個多欄清單中，

segment.source: To browse the list and find out about a specific add-on:
segment.target: 要瀏覽清單並查看特定附加元件的資訊：

segment.source: Use the arrow keys or press the first letter of an add-on name to move around the list.
segment.target: 使用方向鍵或按附加元件名稱的首字母在清單中移動。

segment.source: Press `tab` once to move to a description of the currently selected add-on.
segment.target: 按一下 Tab 移到目前所選附加元件的簡介。

segment.source: Use the [reading keys](#ReadingText) or arrow keys to read the full description.
segment.target: 使用[讀出文字快速鍵](#ReadingText)或方向鍵閱讀完整簡介。

segment.source: Press `tab` to the "Actions" button, which can be used to install the add-on, among other actions.
segment.target: 按 Tab 到「動作」按鈕，該按鈕可用於安裝附加元件等操作。

segment.source: Press `tab` to "Other Details", which lists details such as the publisher, version and homepage.
segment.target: 按 Tab 到「其他詳細資料」，其中列出了發行者、版本和首頁等詳細資訊。

segment.source: To return to the list of add-ons, press `alt+a`, or `shift+tab` until reaching the list.
segment.target: 要返回附加元件清單，請按 Alt+A 或一直按 Shift+Tab 直到清單為止。

segment.source: Searching for add-ons
segment.target: 搜尋附加元件

segment.source: As well as browsing all available add-ons, it is possible to filter the add-ons shown.
segment.target: 除了瀏覽所有可用的附加元件外，還可以篩選顯示的附加元件，

segment.source: To search, press `alt+s` to jump to the "Search" field and type the text to search for.
segment.target: 要搜尋，請按 Alt+S 跳到「搜尋」欄位並輸入要搜尋的文字，

segment.source: Searching checks for matches in the add-on ID, display name, publisher, author and description fields.
segment.target: 搜尋會在附加元件 ID、顯示名稱、發行者、作者和簡介中檢查匹配項目，

segment.source: The list updates while typing the search terms.
segment.target: 輸入搜尋字串時清單會隨著更新，

segment.source: Once done, press `tab` to go to the filtered list of add-ons and browse the results.
segment.target: 完成後按 Tab 到經過篩選的附加元件清單並瀏覽結果。

segment.source: Installing add-ons
segment.target: 安裝附加元件

segment.source: To install an add-on:
segment.target: 要安裝附加元件：

segment.source: With the focus on an add-on you would like to install, press `enter`.
segment.target: 將焦點停在您想要安裝的附加元件上，然後按 Enter。

segment.source: The actions menu opens with a list of actions; the first action is "Install".
segment.target: 動作功能表會列出動作清單，第一個動作是「安裝」。

segment.source: To install the add-on, press `i` or `downArrow` to "Install" and press `enter`.
segment.target: 要安裝附加元件，請按 I 或向下鍵移到「安裝」，然後按 Enter。

segment.source: The focus returns to the add-on in the list and NVDA will read the details about the add-on.
segment.target: 焦點返回清單中的附加元件，NVDA 會讀出有關附加元件的詳細資料。

segment.source: The "Status" information reported by NVDA changes from "Available" to "Downloading".
segment.target: NVDA 讀出的「狀態」資訊會從「可用」變為「正在下載」。

segment.source: Once the add-on has finished downloading, it will change to "Downloaded. Pending install".
segment.target: 附加元件下載完成後，狀態資訊將變為「已下載，等待安裝」。

segment.source: Repeat with any other add-ons you would like to install at the same time.
segment.target: 對您想要同時安裝的任何其他附加元件重複上述步驟。

segment.source: Once finished, press `tab` until the focus is on the "Close" button, then press `enter`.
segment.target: 完成後，按 Tab 直到焦點位於「關閉」按鈕上，然後按 Enter。

segment.source: The downloaded add-ons will start the installation process once the Add-on Store is closed.
segment.target: 關閉附加元件商店後下載的附加元件將啟動安裝程序，

segment.source: During the installation process, add-ons may display dialogs that you will need to respond to.
segment.target: 安裝過程中附加元件可能會顯示您需要回應的對話框。

segment.source: When the add-ons have been installed, a dialog appears advising that changes were made, and you must restart NVDA for the add-on installation to complete.
segment.target: 附加元件安裝完成後會出現一個對話框告知您已進行變更，您必須重新啟動 NVDA 才能完成附加元件安裝。

segment.source: Press `enter` to restart NVDA.
segment.target: 按 Enter 重新啟動 NVDA。

segment.source: Managing installed add-ons
segment.target: 管理安裝的附加元件

segment.source: Press `control+tab` to move between the tabs of the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 按 Ctrl+Tab 在附加元件商店的索引標籤之间移动，

segment.source: The tabs include: "Installed add-ons", "Updatable add-ons", "Available add-ons" and "Installed incompatible add-ons".
segment.target: 索引標籤包括「安装的附加元件」、「可更新的附加元件」、「可用的附加元件」及「安装的不相容附加元件」，

segment.source: Each of the tabs are set out similar to each other, as a list of add-ons, a panel for more details on the selected add-on, and a button to perform actions for the selected add-on.
segment.target: 每個索引標籤的板面都是类似的，包括附加元件清單、所选附加元件的详细資料面板以及用于执行所选附加元件動作的按钮。

segment.source: The actions menu of installed add-ons includes "Disable" and "Remove" rather than "Install".
segment.target: 安裝的附加元件其動作功能表包括“停用”和“移除”，而不是“安裝”，

segment.source: Disabling an add-on stops NVDA from loading it, but leaves it installed.
segment.target: 停用附加元件會阻止 NVDA 載入它，但會保留其安裝狀態。

segment.source: To re-enable a disabled add-on, activate "Enable" from the actions menu.
segment.target: 要重新啟用已停用的附加元件，請從動作功能表執行「啟用」。

segment.source: After enabling, disabling, or removing add-ons, you will be prompted to restart NVDA when closing the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 啟用、停用或移除附加元件後，關閉附加元件商店會提示您重新啟動 NVDA，

segment.source: These changes will only take effect once NVDA is restarted.
segment.target: 這些變更僅在 NVDA 重新啟動後才會生效。

segment.source: Note that in the Add-on Store window `escape` works the same as the Close button.
segment.target: 附註：在附加元件商店視窗中，Esc 的作用與「關閉」按鈕相同。

segment.source: Updating add-ons
segment.target: 更新附加元件

segment.source: When an update to an add-on you have installed is available, it will be listed in the "Updatable add-ons" tab.
segment.target: 當您安裝的附加元件有可用更新時，它將列在「可更新的附加元件」索引標籤中，

segment.source: Press `control+tab` to get to this tab from anywhere in the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 按 Ctrl+Tab 可從附加元件商店中的任何位置到達此索引標籤。

segment.source: The status of the add-on will be listed as "Update available".
segment.target: 附加元件的狀態會顯示為「有可用的更新」，

segment.source: The list will display the currently installed version and the available version.
segment.target: 此清單將顯示目前安裝版本和可用版本，

segment.source: Press `enter` on the add-on to open the actions list; choose "Update".
segment.target: 在附加元件上按 Enter 開啟動作功能表，選擇「更新」。

segment.source: By default, after NVDA startup, you will be notified if any add-on updates are available.
segment.target: 預設情況下，NVDA 啟動後如果有任何可用的附加元件更新，您將收到通知，

segment.source: To learn more about and configure this behaviour, refer to ["Update Notifications"](#AutomaticAddonUpdates).
segment.target: 要了解有關此行為的更多資訊及設定，請參考[「更新通知」](#AutomaticAddonUpdates)。

segment.source: Community
segment.target: 社群

segment.source: NVDA has a vibrant user community.
segment.target: NVDA 擁有充滿活力的使用者社群，

segment.source: There is a main [English language email list](https://nvda.groups.io/g/nvda) and a page full of [local language groups](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/wiki/Connect).
segment.target: 包括主要的 [English language email list](https://nvda.groups.io/g/nvda) 及完整的 [local language groups](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda-community/wiki/Connect)，

segment.source: NV Access, makers of NVDA, are active on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nvaccess) and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/NVAccess).
segment.target: NVDA 的開發者 NV Access 活躍於 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nvaccess) 及 [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/NVAccess)，

segment.source: NV Access also have a regular [In-Process blog](https://www.nvaccess.org/category/in-process/).
segment.target: NV Access 還有一個定期更新的[部落格](https://www.nvaccess.org/category/in-process/)。

segment.source: There is also an [NVDA Certified Expert](https://certification.nvaccess.org/) program.
segment.target: 除此之外有一個 [NVDA 專家認證](https://certification.nvaccess.org/)計畫，

segment.source: This is an online exam you can complete to demonstrate your skills in NVDA.
segment.target: 這是一個線上測驗，您可以完成該測驗來檢驗您使用 NVDA 的能力。

segment.source: [NVDA Certified Experts](https://certification.nvaccess.org/) can list their contact and relevant business details.
segment.target: [NVDA 專家認證](https://certification.nvaccess.org/)網站有列出他們的聯絡方式和相關業務詳情可供諮詢。

segment.source: Getting help
segment.target: 取得說明

segment.source: To get help for NVDA, press `NVDA+n` to open the menu, then `h` for help.
segment.target: 要取得 NVDA 的說明，按 NVDA+N 開啟功能表，接著按 H 到「說明」，

segment.source: From this submenu you can access the User Guide, a quick reference of commands, history of new features and more.
segment.target: 在這個子功能表中您可以查看用戶指南、指令快速參考、新版資訊等，

segment.source: These first three options open in the default web browser.
segment.target: 前三個項目會在預設瀏覽器中開啟。

segment.source: There is also more comprehensive Training Material available in the [NV Access Shop](https://www.nvaccess.org/shop).
segment.target: 在 [NV Access Shop](https://www.nvaccess.org/shop) 中還有更全面的訓練教材。

segment.source: We recommend starting with the "Basic Training for NVDA module".
segment.target: 我們建議從《Basic Training for NVDA module》開始，

segment.source: This module covers concepts from getting started up to browsing the web and using object navigation.
segment.target: 本教材涵蓋從入門到瀏覽網頁及使用物件導覽的概念，

segment.source: It is available in:
segment.target: 提供的型式有：

segment.source: [Electronic text](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/basic-training-for-nvda-ebook/), which includes Word DOCX, Web page HTML, eBook ePub and Kindle KFX formats.
segment.target: [電子書](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/basic-training-for-nvda-ebook/)，包括 Word DOCX、網頁 HTML、eBook ePub 及 Kindle KFX 格式。

segment.source: [Human-read, MP3 audio](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/basic-training-for-nvda-downloadable-audio/)
segment.target: [人聲錄製的 MP3 音檔](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/basic-training-for-nvda-downloadable-audio/)

segment.source: [Hard-copy UEB Braille](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/basic-training-for-nvda-braille-hard-copy/) with delivery included anywhere in the world.
segment.target: [紙本 UEB 點字](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/basic-training-for-nvda-braille-hard-copy/) (可寄送到世界各地)

segment.source: Other modules, and the discounted [NVDA Productivity Bundle](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/nvda-productivity-bundle/), are available in the [NV Access Shop](https://www.nvaccess.org/shop/).
segment.target: 其他教材及優惠的 [NVDA Productivity Bundle](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/nvda-productivity-bundle/) 可在 [NV Access Shop](https://www.nvaccess.org/shop/) 中取得。

segment.source: NV Access also sells [telephone support](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/nvda-telephone-support/), either in blocks, or as part of the [NVDA Productivity Bundle](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/nvda-productivity-bundle/).
segment.target: NV Access 還銷售[電話支援](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/nvda-telephone-support/)，可單獨購買或包含在 [NVDA Productivity Bundle](https://www.nvaccess.org/product/nvda-productivity-bundle/) 中的一部分，

segment.source: Telephone support includes local numbers in Australia and the USA.
segment.target: 電話支援包括澳洲及美國的本地號碼。

segment.source: The [email user groups](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/wiki/Connect) are a great source of community help, as are [certified NVDA experts](https://certification.nvaccess.org/).
segment.target: [電子郵件使用者群組](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/wiki/Connect)是社群支援的重要來源，[認證的 NVDA 專家](https://certification.nvaccess.org/)也是。

segment.source: You can make bug reports or feature requests via [GitHub](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/projectDocs/issues/readme.md).
segment.target: 您可以透過 [GitHub](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/projectDocs/issues/readme.md) 提出錯誤回報或功能請求，

segment.source: The [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) contain valuable information for contributing to the community.
segment.target: [貢獻指南](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md)則包含為社群做出貢獻的寶貴資訊。

segment.source: More Setup Options
segment.target: 更多設定選項

segment.source: Installation Options
segment.target: 安裝選項

segment.source: If installing NVDA directly from the downloaded NVDA launcher, press the Install NVDA button.
segment.target: 若是直接從下載的 NVDA 安裝程式進行安裝，開啟後按「安裝」按鈕，

segment.source: If you have already closed this dialog or are wanting to install from a portable copy, please choose the Install NVDA menu item found under Tools in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 若您已經關閉此對話框，或是想要從可攜式版安裝，請從 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表選擇「安裝 NVDA」這個項目。

segment.source: The installation dialog that appears will confirm whether you wish to install NVDA and will also tell you whether this installation will be updating a previous install.
segment.target: 安裝對話框將確認您是否要安裝 NVDA，並且也會告知是否將會更新先前安裝的 NVDA，

segment.source: Pressing the Continue button will start installing NVDA.
segment.target: 按下「繼續」按鈕及開始進行安裝。

segment.source: There are also a few options in this dialog which are explained below.
segment.target: 對話框中還有一些選項將說明於後。

segment.source: Once the installation has completed, a message will appear telling you that it was successful.
segment.target: 一旦完成安裝將出現一個訊息告知已成功完成，

segment.source: Pressing OK at this point will restart the newly installed copy of NVDA.
segment.target: 在這時按下「確認」按鈕將重新啟動新安裝的 NVDA。

segment.source: Incompatible add-ons warning
segment.target: 不相容附加元件警告

segment.source: If you have add-ons already installed there may also be a warning that incompatible add-ons will be disabled.
segment.target: 如果您已經安裝了附加元件，也可能會出現警告訊息提醒不相容附加元件將被停用，

segment.source: Before you're able to press the Continue button you will have to use the checkbox to confirm that you understand that these add-ons will be disabled.
segment.target: 在按下「安裝」按鈕之前，您必須勾選一個核取方塊確認您已了解有些附加元件將會被停用，

segment.source: There will also be a button present to review the add-ons that will be disabled.
segment.target: 還有一個按鈕可以檢視將被停用的附加元件，

segment.source: Refer to the [incompatible add-ons dialog section](#incompatibleAddonsManager) for more help on this button.
segment.target: 關於此按鈕的更多說明請參考[不相容附加元件對話框一節](#incompatibleAddonsManager)。

segment.source: After installation, you are able to re-enable incompatible add-ons at your own risk from within the [Add-on Store](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 安裝後您可以在自行承擔風險的情況下到[附加元件商店](#AddonsManager)重新啟用這些附加元件。

segment.source: Use NVDA during sign-in
segment.target: 在登入畫面使用 NVDA

segment.source: This option allows you to choose whether or not NVDA should automatically start while at the Windows sign-in screen, before you have entered a password.
segment.target: 此選項允許您選擇是否在 Windows 登入畫面於輸入密碼前啟動 NVDA，

segment.source: This also includes User Account Control and [other secure screens](#SecureScreens).
segment.target: 這也包括使用者帳戶控制和[其他安全畫面](#SecureScreens)，

segment.source: This option is enabled by default for fresh installations.
segment.target: 此選項在初次安裝時預設是啟用的。

segment.source: Create Desktop Shortcut (ctrl+alt+n)
segment.target: 建立桌面捷徑 (Ctrl+Alt+N)

segment.source: This option allows you to choose whether or not NVDA should create a shortcut on the desktop to start NVDA.
segment.target: 此選項允許您選擇是否在桌面建立捷徑以啟動 NVDA，

segment.source: If created, this shortcut will also be assigned a shortcut key of `control+alt+n`, allowing you to start NVDA at any time with this keystroke.
segment.target: 一旦建立捷徑將為其指派一組快速鍵 Ctrl+Alt+N，讓您可以在任何時候按此快速鍵來啟動 NVDA。

segment.source: Copy Portable Configuration to Current User Account
segment.target: 複製可攜式版組態到目前的使用者帳戶

segment.source: This option allows you to choose whether or not NVDA should copy the user configuration from the currently running NVDA into the configuration for the currently logged on user, for the installed copy of NVDA.
segment.target: 此選項允許您選擇是否為 NVDA 的安裝版本從目前正在執行的 NVDA 複製使用者組態到目前登入使用者的組態，

segment.source: This will not copy the configuration for any other users of this system nor to the system configuration for use during Windows sign-in and [other secure screens](#SecureScreens).
segment.target: 這不會複製電腦上其他使用者的組態，也不會將組態複製到用於 Windows 登入及[其他安全畫面](#SecureScreens)的 NVDA 系統組態目錄中，

segment.source: This option is only available when installing from a portable copy, not when installing directly from the downloaded Launcher package.
segment.target: 此選項只有從可攜式版安裝時才有，若是從安裝程式進行安裝則無此選項。

segment.source: Creating a Portable Copy
segment.target: 建立可攜式版

segment.source: If creating a portable copy directly from the NVDA download package, press the Create Portable Copy button.
segment.target: 如果是直接從下載的 NVDA 安裝程式建立可攜式版，按「建立可攜式版」按鈕，

segment.source: If you have already closed this dialog or you are running an installed copy of NVDA, choose the Create Portable copy menu item found under Tools in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 若您正在執行 NVDA 的安裝版本，請從 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表選擇「建立可攜式版」這個項目。

segment.source: The dialog that appears allows you to choose where the portable copy should be created.
segment.target: 建立可攜式版對話框允許您選擇建立可攜式版的位置，

segment.source: This can be a directory on your hard drive or a location on a USB thumb drive or other portable media.
segment.target: 可以是硬碟上的目錄，也可以是 USB 隨身碟或其他可攜式媒體上的位置，

segment.source: By default, a new directory is created for the portable copy.
segment.target: 預設情況下會為可攜式版建立一個新目錄，

segment.source: You can also choose to use an existing directory, this will overwrite files in the directory.
segment.target: 您也可以選擇使用現有目錄，這會覆寫該目錄中的檔案，

segment.source: If the existing directory is a portable copy of NVDA, that copy will be updated.
segment.target: 如果現有目錄是 NVDA 的可攜式版，則該版本將會更新。

segment.source: There is also an option to choose whether NVDA should copy the logged on user's current NVDA configuration for use with the newly created portable copy.
segment.target: 還有一個選項是可以選擇是否複製登入使用者目前的 NVDA 組態到新建立的可攜式版，此選項只有從 NVDA 的安裝版本建立可攜式版時才有，

segment.source: This also includes add-ons.
segment.target: 這也包括附加元件，

segment.source: This option is only available when creating a portable copy from an installed copy, not when creating from the download package.
segment.target: 若是從安裝程式進行安裝時則無此選項。

segment.source: Pressing Continue will create the portable copy.
segment.target: 按「繼續」按鈕將開始建立可攜式版，

segment.source: Once creation is complete, a message will appear telling you it was successful.
segment.target: 一旦完成安裝將出現一個訊息告知已成功完成，

segment.source: Press OK to dismiss this dialog.
segment.target: 按「確認」按鈕關閉對話框。

segment.source: Portable and Temporary Copy Restrictions
segment.target: 可攜式與暫時性版本的限制

segment.source: If you want to take NVDA with you on a USB thumb drive or other writable media, then you should choose to create a portable copy.
segment.target: 如果您要將 NVDA 存入 USB 隨身碟或其他可寫入的儲存媒體以便隨身攜帶，您憗該選擇建立可攜式版，

segment.source: The installed copy is also able to create a portable copy of itself at any time.
segment.target: 安裝的版本也能隨時建立自己的可攜式版，

segment.source: The portable copy also has the ability to install itself on any computer at a later time.
segment.target: 可攜式版也能於日後安裝到任何一台電腦上。

segment.source: However, if you wish to copy NVDA onto read-only media such as a CD, you should just copy the download package.
segment.target: 然而若欲將 NVDA 複製到唯讀的儲存媒體例如光碟，則應僅複製下載的安裝程式，

segment.source: Running the portable version directly from read-only media is not supported at this time.
segment.target: 直接從唯讀的儲存媒體執行可攜式版目前還不支援。

segment.source: The [NVDA installer](#StepsForRunningTheDownloadLauncher) can be used as a temporary copy of NVDA.
segment.target: [NVDA 安裝程式](#StepsForRunningTheDownloadLauncher)可作為 NVDA 的暫時性版本，

segment.source: Temporary copies prevent saving NVDA settings.
segment.target: 暫時性版本會阻止儲存 NVDA 設定，

segment.source: This includes disabling usage of the [Add-on Store](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 這包括停用[附加元件商店](#AddonsManager)的使用。

segment.source: Portable and temporary copies of NVDA have the following restrictions:
segment.target: NVDA 的可攜式和暫時性版本有下列的限制：

segment.source: The inability to automatically start during and/or after log-on.
segment.target: 不能在登入期間和/或登入後自動啟動。

segment.source: The inability to interact with applications running with administrative privileges, unless of course NVDA itself has been run also with these privileges (not recommended).
segment.target: 不能與以系統管理員身分權限執行的應用程式互動，除非 NVDA 本身也以系統管理員身分權限執行 (不建議)。

segment.source: The inability to read User Account Control (UAC) screens when trying to start an application with administrative privileges.
segment.target: 當開啟以系統管理員身分權限執行的應用程式，將無法讀出使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 的畫面。

segment.source: The inability to support input from a touchscreen.
segment.target: 不支援從觸控螢幕輸入。

segment.source: The inability to provide features such as browse mode and speaking of typed characters in Windows Store apps.
segment.target: 在 Microsoft Store 的應用程式中無法提供某些功能，例如瀏覽模式與讀出輸入字元。

segment.source: Audio ducking is not supported.
segment.target: 不支援自動音量調整。

segment.source: Using NVDA
segment.target: 使用 NVDA

segment.source: Launching NVDA
segment.target: 啟動 NVDA

segment.source: If you have installed NVDA with the installer, then starting NVDA is as simple as either pressing control+alt+n, or choosing NVDA from the NVDA menu under Programs on the Start Menu.
segment.target: 如果您已經安裝了 NVDA，最簡單啟動的方式是利用按快速鍵 Ctrl+Alt+N，或從「開始」功能表的「所有應用程式」清單找到 NVDA 資料夾並展開後選擇「NVDA」，

segment.source: Additionally you can type NVDA into the Run dialog and press Enter.
segment.target: 此外您也可以從「開始」功能表的搜尋方塊輸入「nvda」後按 Enter，

segment.source: If NVDA is already running, it will be restarted.
segment.target: 若 NVDA 已經在執行會重新啟動。

segment.source: You can also pass some [command line options](#CommandLineOptions) which allows you to quit (-q), disable add-ons (--disable-addons), etc.
segment.target: 您也可以使用一些「[命令列選項](#CommandLineOptions)」以結束 (-q)、停用附加元件 (--disable-addons) 等等。

segment.source: For installed copies, NVDA stores the configuration in the roaming application data folder of the current user by default (e.g. "`C:\Users\<user>\AppData\Roaming`").
segment.target: NVDA 的安裝版本其組態預設儲存在目前使用者的 roaming application data 資料夾中 (例如 "`C:\Users\<user>\AppData\Roaming`")，

segment.source: It is possible to change this in a way that NVDA loads its configuration from the local application data folder instead.
segment.target: 也可以變更為從本機應用程式資料夾載入組態，

segment.source: Consult the section about [system wide parameters](#SystemWideParameters) for more details.
segment.target: 更多祥細資訊請查閱[全系統參數](#SystemWideParameters)章節。

segment.source: To start the portable version, go to the directory you unpacked NVDA to, and press enter or double click on nvda.exe.
segment.target: 要啟動可攜式版，請到您解開 NVDA 的目錄找到「nvda.exe」後 Enter 或雙擊滑鼠左鍵，

segment.source: If NVDA was already running, it will automatically stop before starting the portable version.
segment.target: 如果 NVDA 已在執行則會先關閉後再啟動可攜式版。

segment.source: As NVDA starts, you will first hear an ascending set of tones (telling you that NVDA is loading).
segment.target: 當 NVDA 啟動時，您首先會聽到一段上揚的聲音表示 NVDA 正在載入，

segment.source: Depending on how fast your computer is, or if you are running NVDA off a USB key or other slow media, it may take a little while to start.
segment.target: 根據您電腦的速度或是從 USB 隨身碟或其他慢速媒體執行 NVDA，有可能需要一段嵵間才能啟動，

segment.source: If it is taking an extra-long time to start, NVDA should say "Loading NVDA. Please wait..."
segment.target: 若啟動時間過長，NVDA 應該會說出「載入 NVDA 中，請稍後...」的提示。

segment.source: If you don't hear any of this, or you hear the Windows error sound, or a descending set of tones, then this means that NVDA has an error, and you will need to possibly report a bug to the developers.
segment.target: 如果您沒聽到這些，或者聽到 Windows 錯誤音效，或是一段下沉的聲音，那就代表 NVDA 載入沒有成功，您需要重新檢視可能引發的原因或向 NVDA 開發者回報問題，

segment.source: Please check out the NVDA website for how to do this.
segment.target: 請連上 NVDA 網站查看如何回報問題。

segment.source: Welcome Dialog
segment.target: 歡迎對話框

segment.source: When NVDA starts for the first time, you will be greeted by a dialog box which provides you with some basic information about the NVDA modifier key and the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 當第一次啟動 NVDA 會出現一個對話框，提供有關 NVDA 組合鍵及 NVDA 功能表的基本資訊，

segment.source: (Please see further sections about these topics.)
segment.target: (請參見以下各節以進一步了解相關主題。)

segment.source: The dialog box also contains a combo box and three checkboxes.
segment.target: 對話框也包含一個下拉式方塊及三個核取方塊，

segment.source: The combo box lets you select the keyboard layout.
segment.target: 下拉式方塊讓您選擇鍵盤配置，

segment.source: The first checkbox lets you control if NVDA should use the Caps Lock as an NVDA modifier key.
segment.target: 第一個核取方塊讓您控制 NVDA 是否要使用 Caps Lock 鍵作為 NVDA 組合鍵，

segment.source: The second specifies whether NVDA should start automatically after you log on to Windows and is only available for installed copies of NVDA.
segment.target: 第二個核取方塊指定當您登入 Windows 後 NVDA 是否自動啟動，此項目僅有在 NVDA 的安裝版本才有，

segment.source: The third lets you control if this Welcome dialog should appear each time NVDA starts.
segment.target: 第三個核取方塊控制每當 NVDA 啟動時是否顯示此歡迎對話框。

segment.source: Data usage statistics dialog
segment.target: 使用資料收集對話框

segment.source: When starting NVDA for the first time, a dialog will appear which will ask you if you want to accept sending data to NV Access while using NVDA, in order to help improve NVDA in the future.
segment.target: 當第一次啟動 NVDA 會出現一個對話框，詢問是否同意在使用 NVDA 時將使用資料傳給 NV Access 以協助改進未來的 NVDA 版本。

segment.source: You can read more info about the data gathered by NV Access in the general settings section, [Allow NV Access to gather NVDA usage statistics](#GeneralSettingsGatherUsageStats).
segment.target: 您可以在以下「一般」類別設定一節中的[允許 NV Access 收集 NVDA 使用情況統計](#GeneralSettingsGatherUsageStats)閱讀更多有關 NV Access 收集的資訊。

segment.source: Note: pressing on "yes" or "no" will save this setting and the dialog will never appear again unless you reinstall NVDA.
segment.target: 附註：按下「是」或「否」按鈕後將會儲存此設定，直到您重新安裝 NVDA 才會再次詢問，

segment.source: However, you can enable or disable the data gathering process manually in NVDA's general settings panel. For changing this setting manually, you can check or uncheck the checkbox called [Allow the NVDA project to gather NVDA usage statistics](#GeneralSettingsGatherUsageStats).
segment.target: 不過您可以在 NVDA 的「一般」類別設定中手動啟用或停用資料收集，要變更此設定您可以勾選或取消勾選名為「[允許 NVDA 專案收集 NVDA 使用情況統計](#GeneralSettingsGatherUsageStats)」的核取方塊。

segment.source: About NVDA keyboard commands
segment.target: NVDA 鍵盤指令

segment.source: The NVDA Modifier Key
segment.target: NVDA 組合鍵

segment.source: Most NVDA-specific keyboard commands consist of pressing a particular key called the NVDA modifier key in conjunction with one or more other keys.
segment.target: 大多數 NVDA 特定的鍵盤指令由按下一個名為「NVDA 組合鍵 (簡稱 NVDA 鍵)」的特殊按鍵與一個或多個其他按鍵所組成，

segment.source: Notable exceptions to this are the text review commands for the desktop keyboard layout which just use the numpad keys by themselves, but there are some other exceptions as well.
segment.target: 但顯著的例外是桌上型電腦鍵盤配置的文字檢閱指令，只單獨使用數字鍵盤的按鍵，不過也有一些其他的例外。

segment.source: NVDA can be configured so that the `insert`, `numpadInsert`, and/or `capsLock` key can be used as the `NVDA` modifier key.
segment.target: NVDA 可以設定 Insert 鍵、數字鍵盤的 Insert 鍵 及/或 Caps Lock 鍵作為 NVDA 鍵，

segment.source: By default, both the `insert` and `numpadInsert` keys are set as NVDA modifier keys.
segment.target: 預設情況下 Insert 鍵及數字鍵盤的 Insert 鍵皆設定為 NVDA 鍵。

segment.source: If you wish to cause one of the NVDA modifier keys to behave as it usually would if NVDA were not running (e.g. you wish to turn Caps Lock on when you have set Caps Lock to be an NVDA modifier key), you can press the key twice in quick succession.
segment.target: 如果您想要使其中一個 NVDA 鍵的行為與 NVDA 沒有執行時一樣，例如當您已設定 Caps Lock 鍵作為 NVDA 鍵，但又要用來切換大寫鎖定狀態，您可以快速連按此鍵兩下。

segment.source: Keyboard Layouts
segment.target: 鍵盤配置

segment.source: NVDA currently comes with two sets of key commands (known as keyboard layouts): the desktop layout and the laptop layout.
segment.target: NVDA 快速鍵目前有兩種鍵盤配置，分別用在桌上型電腦與筆記型電腦，

segment.source: By default, NVDA is set to use the Desktop layout, though you can switch to the Laptop layout in the Keyboard category of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog, found under Preferences in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 預設配置使用桌上型電腦，不過您可以從 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的「鍵盤」類別設定切換到筆記型電腦配置。

segment.source: The Desktop layout makes heavy use of the numpad (with Num Lock off).
segment.target: 桌上型電腦配置需要經常使用數字鍵盤 (使用時要關閉 Num Lock)，

segment.source: Although most laptops do not have a physical numpad, some laptops can emulate one by holding down the FN key and pressing letters and numbers on the right-hand side of the keyboard (7, 8, 9, u, i, o, j, k, l, etc.).
segment.target: 僅管大部分的筆記型電腦沒有實體的數字鍵盤，有些筆記型電腦可以利用按住 FN 鍵搭配鍵盤右手邊的英文與數字 (如 7 8 9 u i o j k l 等等) 來模擬數字鍵盤，

segment.source: If your laptop cannot do this or does not allow you to turn Num Lock off, you may want to switch to the Laptop layout instead.
segment.target: 如果您的筆記型電腦沒辦法這麼做，或者不允許關閉 Num Lock 鍵，您可能需要切換到筆記型電腦配置。

segment.source: NVDA Touch Gestures
segment.target: NVDA 觸控手勢

segment.source: If you are running NVDA on a device with a touchscreen, you can also control NVDA directly via touch commands.
segment.target: 如果您在有觸控螢幕的裝置執行 NVDA，可以直接透過觸控指令來控制 NVDA。

segment.source: While NVDA is running, unless touch interaction support is disabled, all touch input will go directly to NVDA.
segment.target: 當 NVDA 執行時所有觸控輸入的控制都是直接透過 NVDA 來執行，除非將觸控互動支援關閉，

segment.source: Therefore, actions that can be performed normally without NVDA will not work.
segment.target: 因此在沒有 NVDA 時可以正常執行的操作將不起作用。

segment.source: To toggle touch interaction support, press NVDA+control+alt+t.
segment.target: 要切換觸控互動支援，按 NVDA+Ctrl+Alt+T。

segment.source: You can also enable or disable [touch interaction support](#TouchSupportEnable) from the Touch Interaction category of the NVDA settings.
segment.target: 您也可以在 NVDA 設定的「觸控互動」類別中啟用或停用[觸控互動支援](#TouchSupportEnable)。

segment.source: Exploring the Screen
segment.target: 探索螢幕

segment.source: The most basic action you can perform with the touch screen is to announce the control or text at any point on the screen.
segment.target: 觸控螢幕的最基本操作就是讓 NVDA 讀出螢幕上任一點的控制項或文字，

segment.source: To do this, place one finger anywhere on the screen.
segment.target: 要執行此操作請將一根手指放在螢幕上的任何位置，

segment.source: You can also keep your finger on the screen and move it around to read other controls and text that your finger moves over.
segment.target: 您也可以保持手指放在螢幕上並四處移動，以讀出手指觸摸到的控制項或文字。

segment.source: Touch Gestures
segment.target: 觸控手勢

segment.source: When NVDA commands are described later in this user guide, they may list a touch gesture which can be used to activate that command with the touchscreen.
segment.target: 在本用戶指南隨後提及的 NVDA 指令中，可能會列出可在觸控螢幕上執行該指令的觸控手勢，

segment.source: Following are some instructions on how to perform the various touch gestures.
segment.target: 以下是有關如何執行各種觸控手勢的一些說明。

segment.source: Taps
segment.target: 輕點

segment.source: Tap the screen quickly with one or more fingers.
segment.target: 用一根或多根手指快速輕點螢幕。

segment.source: Tapping once with one finger is simply known as a tap.
segment.target: 用一根手指在螢幕上輕點一次簡稱為點一下，

segment.source: Tapping with 2 fingers at the same time is a 2-finger tap and so on.
segment.target: 用兩根手指在螢幕上同時輕點為兩指點一下，以此類推。

segment.source: If the same tap is performed one or more times again in quick succession, NVDA will instead treat this as a multi-tap gesture.
segment.target: 若相同的輕點動作快速連續執行多次，NVDA 會視同為多次輕點的手勢，

segment.source: Tapping twice will result in a double-tap.
segment.target: 輕點兩次為點兩下，

segment.source: Tapping 3 times will result in a triple-tap and so on.
segment.target: 輕點三次為點三下，以此類推。

segment.source: Of course, these multi-tap gestures also recognize how many fingers were used, so it's possible to have gestures like a 2-finger triple-tap, a 4-finger tap, etc.
segment.target: 當然這些多次輕點手勢也要看是由多少根手指組成，所以有可能是兩指點三下或四指點一下等等。

segment.source: Flicks
segment.target: 滑動

segment.source: Quickly swipe your finger across the screen.
segment.target: 在螢幕上快速滑動手指。

segment.source: There are 4 possible flick gestures depending on the direction: flick left, flick right, flick up and flick down.
segment.target: 依據不同方向有四個可能的滑動手勢：向左滑動、向右滑動、向上滑動及向下滑動。

segment.source: Just like taps, more than one finger can be used to perform the gesture.
segment.target: 如同輕點一樣，您可利用一根以上的手指來執行手勢動作，

segment.source: Therefore, gestures such as 2-finger flick up and 4-finger flick left are all possible.
segment.target: 因此手勢可能是兩指向上滑動、四指向左滑動。

segment.source: Touch Modes
segment.target: 觸控模式

segment.source: As there are many more NVDA commands than possible touch gestures, NVDA has several touch modes you can switch between which make certain subsets of commands available.
segment.target: 由於 NVDA 指令比可能的觸控手勢來得多，因此 NVDA 有多種觸控模式可以切換，以便使某些指令都能使用，

segment.source: The two modes are text mode and object mode.
segment.target: 目前有兩種模式分別是文字模式及物件模式。

segment.source: Certain NVDA commands listed in this document may have a touch mode listed in brackets after the touch gesture.
segment.target: 在本用戶指南中所列出的某些 NVDA 指令可能會在觸控手勢的後面括弧中標明觸控模式，

segment.source: For example, flick up (text mode) means that the command will be performed if you flick up, but only while in text mode.
segment.target: 例如：向上滑動 (文字模式)，表示向上滑動將會執行指令，但僅限於文字模式下，

segment.source: If the command does not have a mode listed, it will work in any mode.
segment.target: 若觸控手勢的後面沒有標名模式，表示可在任何模式下執行。

segment.source: To toggle touch modes, perform a 3-finger tap.
segment.target: 要切換觸控模式，使用三指點一下。

segment.source: Touch keyboard
segment.target: 觸控鍵盤

segment.source: The touch keyboard is used to enter text and commands from a touchscreen.
segment.target: 觸控鍵盤用於從觸控螢幕輸入文字和指令，

segment.source: When focused on an edit field, you can bring up the touch keyboard by double-tapping the touch keyboard icon on the bottom of the screen.
segment.target: 當焦點在編輯區時可透過點兩下螢幕底部的觸控鍵盤圖示來開啟觸控鍵盤，

segment.source: For tablets such as Microsoft Surface Pro, the touch keyboard is always available when the keyboard is undocked.
segment.target: 平板電腦如 Microsoft Surface Pro 在實體鍵盤卸除後觸控鍵盤可隨時使用，

segment.source: To dismiss the touch keyboard, double-tap the touch keyboard icon or move away from the edit field.
segment.target: 要關閉觸控鍵盤請點兩下觸控鍵盤圖示或離開編輯區。

segment.source: While the touch keyboard is active, to locate keys on the touch keyboard, move your finger to where the touch keyboard is located (typically at the bottom of the screen), then move around the keyboard with one finger.
segment.target: 當觸控鍵盤可使用時，要定位觸控鍵盤上的按鍵請移動手指到觸控鍵盤的位置 (通常在螢幕底部)，接著可以用一根手指在鍵盤上移動，

segment.source: When you find the key you wish to press, double-tap the key or lift your finger, depending on options chosen from the [Touch Interaction Settings category](#TouchInteraction) of the NVDA Settings.
segment.target: 找到所要的按鍵後可以點兩下按鍵或是放開手指，取決於 NVDA 設定對話框中的[觸控互動](#TouchInteraction)類別選擇的選項而定。

segment.source: Input Help Mode
segment.target: 輸入說明模式

segment.source: Many NVDA commands are mentioned throughout the rest of this user guide, but an easy way to explore all the different commands is to turn on input help.
segment.target: 許多 NVDA 指令會在本用戶指南的其餘章節中提到，但另一個簡單的方式來探索所有不同的指令就是開啟輸入說明。

segment.source: To turn on input help, press NVDA+1.
segment.target: 按 NVDA+1 可開啟輸入說明，

segment.source: To turn it off, press NVDA+1 again.
segment.target: 再按一次 NVDA+1 即可關閉。

segment.source: While in input help, performing any input gesture (such as pressing a key or performing a touch gesture) will report the action and describe what it does (if anything).
segment.target: 在輸入說明模式下，執行任何輸入手勢 (例如按下按鍵或執行觸控手勢) 將會讀出所按的鍵或手勢並說出其功能 (如果有的話)，

segment.source: The actual commands will not execute while in input help mode.
segment.target: 在輸入說明模式下任何操作所對應的指令並不會實際執行。

segment.source: The NVDA menu
segment.target: NVDA 功能表

segment.source: The NVDA menu allows you to control NVDA's settings, access help, save/revert your configuration, Modify speech dictionaries, access additional tools and exit NVDA.
segment.target: NVDA 功能表允許您控制設定、開啟說明文件、儲存或還原您的組態、修改讀音字典、使用額外工具及結束 NVDA。

segment.source: To get to the NVDA menu from anywhere in Windows while NVDA is running, you may do any of the following:
segment.target: 當 NVDA 在 Windows 中執行時要在任何地方打開 NVDA 功能表，您可以執行下列操作：

segment.source: press `NVDA+n` on the keyboard.
segment.target: 在鍵盤上按 NVDA+N。

segment.source: Perform a 2-finger double-tap on the touch screen.
segment.target: 在觸控螢幕上用兩指點兩下。

segment.source: Access the system tray by pressing `Windows+b`, `downArrow` to the NVDA icon, and press `enter`.
segment.target: 按 Windows+B 移到通知區域，按向下鍵找到 NVDA 圖示，接著按 Enter 鍵。

segment.source: Alternatively, access the system tray by pressing `Windows+b`, `downArrow` to the NVDA icon, and open the context menu by pressing the `applications` key located next to the right control key on most keyboards.
segment.target: 或者按 Windows+b 移到通知區域，按向下鍵找到 NVDA 圖示，接著按應用程式鍵 (或稱快顯鍵) 打開快顯功能表，快顯鍵在大多數的鍵盤上位於右邊 Ctrl 的旁邊，

segment.source: On a keyboard without an `applications` key, press `shift+f10` instead.
segment.target: 在沒有快顯鍵的鍵盤上按 Shift+F10 來替代。

segment.source: Right-click on the NVDA icon located in the Windows system tray
segment.target: 在 Windows 通知區域的 NVDA 圖示上點擊滑鼠右鍵。

segment.source: When the menu comes up, You can use the arrow keys to navigate the menu, and the `enter` key to activate an item.
segment.target: NVDA 功能表打開後可利用方向鍵移到所要選取的項目，接著按 Enter 執行。

segment.source: Basic NVDA commands
segment.target: 基本 NVDA 指令

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Touch |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |觸控 |說明

segment.source: Starts or restarts NVDA |Control+alt+n |Control+alt+n |none |Starts or restarts NVDA from the Desktop, if this Windows shortcut is enabled during NVDA's installation process. This is a Windows specific shortcut and therefore it cannot be reassigned in the input gestures dialog.
segment.target: 啟動或重新啟動 NVDA |Ctrl+Alt+N |Ctrl+Alt+N |無 |若在安裝 NVDA 時有啟用此 Windows 快速鍵選項則可以用來啟動或重新啟動桌面上的 NVDA。這是一個 Windows 指定的快速鍵，因此您無法在輸入手勢對話框中重新指派手勢。

segment.source: Stop speech |Control |control |2-finger tap |Instantly stops speaking
segment.target: 停止語音 |Ctrl |Ctrl |兩指點一下 |立即停止朗讀。

segment.source: Pause Speech |shift |shift |none |Instantly pauses speech. Pressing it again will continue speaking where it left off (if pausing is supported by the current synthesizer)
segment.target: 暫停語音 |Shift |Shift |無 |立即暫停語音，再按一次會從中斷的地方繼續朗讀 (若使用的合成器有支援)。

segment.source: NVDA Menu |NVDA+n |NVDA+n |2-finger double-tap |Pops up the NVDA menu to allow you to access preferences, tools, help, etc.
segment.target: NVDA 功能表 |NVDA+n |NVDA+n |兩指點兩下 |開啟 NVDA 功能表以選擇偏好設定、工具及說明等。

segment.source: Toggle Input Help Mode |NVDA+1 |NVDA+1 |none |Pressing any key in this mode will report the key, and the description of any NVDA command associated with it
segment.target: 切換輸入說明模式 |NVDA+1 |NVDA+1 |無 |在這個模式下按下任何按鍵將會讀出按鍵及關聯的 NVDA 指令說明。

segment.source: Quit NVDA |NVDA+q |NVDA+q |none |Exits NVDA
segment.target: 結束 NVDA |NVDA+q |NVDA+q |無 |結束 NVDA。

segment.source: Pass next key through |NVDA+f2 |NVDA+f2 |none |Tells NVDA to pass the next key press straight through to the active application - even if it is normally treated as an NVDA key command
segment.target: 忽略下一個 NVDA 按鍵指令 |NVDA+F2 |NVDA+F2 |無 |告知 NVDA 將下一個按鍵動作直接傳到作用中的憗用程式，即使此按鍵通常是 NVDA 的快速鍵。

segment.source: Toggle application sleep mode on and off |NVDA+shift+s |NVDA+shift+z |none |sleep mode disables all NVDA commands and speech/braille output for the current application. This is most useful in applications that provide their own speech or screen reading features. Press this command again to disable sleep mode - note that NVDA will only retain the Sleep Mode setting until it is restarted.
segment.target: 切換應用程式睡眠模式的開與關 |NVDA+Shift+S |NVDA+Shift+Z |無 |睡眠模式會停用目前應用程式的所有 NVDA 指令、語音及點字輸出。此功能可用於某些本身即具備語音功能的應用程式，再按一次這個指令則關閉睡眠模式，NVDA 的睡眠模式設定僅會保留至重新啟動為止。

segment.source: Reporting System Information
segment.target: 讀出系統資訊

segment.source: Name |key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Report date/time |NVDA+f12 |Pressing once reports the current time, pressing twice reports the date
segment.target: 讀出日期或時間 |NVDA+F12 |按一下讀出目前時間，連按兩下讀出日期。

segment.source: Report battery status |NVDA+shift+b |Reports the battery status i.e. whether AC power is in use or the current charge percentage.
segment.target: 讀出電池狀態 |NVDA+Shift+B |讀出電池的狀態包括是否正在使用交流電源或目前充電百分比。

segment.source: Report clipboard text |NVDA+c |Reports the Text on the clipboard if there is any.
segment.target: 讀出剪貼簿文字 |NVDA+c |如果有的話讀出剪貼簿內的文字內容。

segment.source: Speech modes
segment.target: 語音模式

segment.source: The speech mode governs how screen content, notifications, responses to commands, and other output is spoken during operation of NVDA.
segment.target: 語音模式控制 NVDA 在操作期間如何讀出螢幕內容、通知、指令回應和其他輸出，

segment.source: The default mode is "talk", which speaks in situations that are expected when using a screen reader.
segment.target: 預設模式是“說話”，即在使用螢幕助讀程式時預期情況會朗讀，

segment.source: However, under certain circumstances, or when running particular programs, you may find one of the other speech modes valuable.
segment.target: 然而在某些情況下或執行特定程式時，您會發現使用其他語音模式更為有用。

segment.source: The four available speech modes are:
segment.target: 四種可用的語音模式包括：

segment.source: Talk (Default): NVDA will speak normally in reaction to screen changes, notifications, and actions such as moving the focus, or issuing commands.
segment.target: 說話 (預設)：NVDA 會正常朗讀以反應螢幕變化、通知及移動焦點或發出指令等的動作。

segment.source: On-demand: NVDA will only speak when you use commands with a reporting function (e.g. report the title of the window); but it will not speak in reaction to actions such as moving the focus or the cursor.
segment.target: 隨選：NVDA 只有當您使用具有讀出功能的指令 (例如讀出視窗的標題) 時才會朗讀，但不會對移動焦點或遊標等動作做出反應。

segment.source: Off: NVDA will not speak anything, however unlike sleep mode, it will silently react to commands.
segment.target: 關：NVDA 不會朗讀，但與睡眠模式不同的是會對指令做出無聲反應。

segment.source: Beeps: NVDA will replace normal speech with short beeps.
segment.target: 嗶嗶聲：NVDA 會以短促的嗶嗶聲取代正常語音。

segment.source: The Beeps mode may be useful when some very verbose output is scrolling in a terminal window, but you don't care what it is, only that it is continuing to scroll; or in other circumstances when the fact that there is output is more relevant than the output itself.
segment.target: 「嗶嗶聲」模式可能適合用在當一些非常冗長的輸出使終端機視窗不斷捲動時，但您不關心它是什麼，只關心它是否持續捲動；或者在其他情況下是否有輸出的事實比輸出本身更重要時。

segment.source: The On-demand mode may be valuable when you don't need constant feedback about what is happening on screen or on the computer, but you periodically need to check particular things using review commands, etc.
segment.target: 「隨選」模式可能適合用在當您不需要有關螢幕或電腦上發生了什麼事的持續性回饋，但需要定期使用檢閱等指令檢查特定內容時，

segment.source: Examples include while recording audio, when using screen magnification, during a meeting or a call, or as an alternative to beeps mode.
segment.target: 例如包括錄製音訊時、使用螢幕放大功能時、在會議或通話期間，或是作為嗶嗶聲模式的替代方案。

segment.source: A gesture allows cycling through the various speech modes:
segment.target: 循環切換語音模式的手勢：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Cycle Speech Mode |`NVDA+s` |Cycles between speech modes.
segment.target: 循環語音模式 |NVDA+S |循環切換語音模式

segment.source: If you only need to switch between a limited subset of speech modes, see [Modes available in the Cycle speech mode command](#SpeechModesDisabling) for a way to disable unwanted modes.
segment.target: 如果您只需要在限定的語音模式之間切換，請見[循環切換語音模式指令中可用的模式](#SpeechModesDisabling)以了解停用不需要的模式的方法。

segment.source: Navigating with NVDA
segment.target: NVDA 導覽

segment.source: NVDA allows you to explore and navigate the system in several ways, including both normal interaction and review.
segment.target: NVDA 允許您以不同的方式探索及導覽 Windows 系統，包括一般性互動及檢閱。

segment.source: Objects
segment.target: 物件

segment.source: Each Application and the operating system itself consist of many objects.
segment.target: 每個應用程式及作業系統本身均包含了許多物件，

segment.source: An object is a single item such as a piece of text, button, checkbox, slider, list or editable text field.
segment.target: 物件指的是一段文字、按鈕、核取方塊、滑桿、清單或文字編輯區等單一項目。

segment.source: Navigating with the System Focus
segment.target: 系統焦點導覽

segment.source: The system focus, also known simply as the focus, is the [object](#Objects) which receives keys typed on the keyboard.
segment.target: 系統焦點，也就是所謂的焦點，指的是接收鍵盤輸入所在的[物件](#Objects)，

segment.source: For example, if you are typing into an editable text field, the editable text field has the focus.
segment.target: 例如當您在文字編輯區打字時焦點就在此文字編輯區上。
