segment.source: The most common way of navigating around Windows with NVDA is to simply move the system focus using standard Windows keyboard commands, such as pressing tab and shift+tab to move forward and back between controls, pressing alt to get to the menu bar and then using the arrows to navigate menus, and using alt+tab to move between running applications.
segment.target: 使用 NVDA 在 Windows 上導覽，最常用到的操作方式是使用標準的 Windows 鍵盤指令來移動系統焦點，例如按 Tab 或 Shift+Tab 在各控制項之間往前或往回移動，按 Alt 到功能表列並使用方向鍵導覽功能表的項目，或是使用 Alt+Tab 在執行中的應用程式之間切換，

segment.source: As you do this, NVDA will report information about the object with focus, such as its name, type, value, state, description, keyboard shortcut and positional information.
segment.target: 當您這樣操作時 NVDA 通常會讀出焦點所在物件的相關資訊，例如：名稱、類型、數值、狀態、說明、便捷鍵及位置等，

segment.source: When [Visual Highlight](#VisionFocusHighlight) is enabled, the location of the current system focus is also exposed visually.
segment.target: 若有啟用[視覺醒目提示](#VisionFocusHighlight)則目前系統焦點的位置也會在螢幕上呈現出來。

segment.source: There are some key commands that are useful when moving with the System focus:
segment.target: 以下是幾個用來移動系統焦點很有用的快速鍵：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Report current focus |NVDA+tab |NVDA+tab |announces the current object or control that has the System focus. Pressing twice will spell the information
segment.target: 讀出目前焦點 |NVDA+Tab |NVDA+Tab |讀出目前系統焦點所在的物件或控制項，連按兩下拼讀資訊，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀。

segment.source: Report title |NVDA+t |NVDA+t |Reports the title of the currently active window. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will copy it to the clipboard
segment.target: 讀出視窗標題 |NVDA+t |NVDA+t |讀出目前作用中的視窗標題，連按兩下拼讀標題，連按三下複製標題到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Read active window |NVDA+b |NVDA+b |reads all the controls in the currently active window (useful for dialogs)
segment.target: 讀出作用中的視窗內容 |NVDA+b |NVDA+b |讀出目前作用中視窗所有的控制項 (對於對話框很有用)。

segment.source: Report Status Bar |NVDA+end |NVDA+shift+end |Reports the Status Bar if NVDA finds one. Pressing twice will spell the information. Pressing three times will copy it to the clipboard
segment.target: 讀出狀態列 |NVDA+End |NVDA+Shift+End |如果 NVDA 找到狀態列則讀出，連按兩下拼讀資訊，連按三下複製內容到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Report Shortcut Key |`shift+numpad2` |`NVDA+control+shift+.` |Reports the shortcut (accelerator) key of the currently focused object
segment.target: 讀出便捷鍵 |Shift+數字鍵盤2 |NVDA+Ctrl+Shift+. |讀出目前焦點物件的便捷健 (快速鍵)

segment.source: Navigating with the System Caret
segment.target: 系統游標導覽

segment.source: When an [object](#Objects) that allows navigation and/or editing of text is [focused](#SystemFocus), you can move through the text using the system caret, also known as the edit cursor.
segment.target: 當[焦點](#SystemFocus)在一個可導覽 及/或 可編輯文字的[物件](#Objects)上，您可以利用系統游標 (也稱為編輯游標) 在文字間移動。

segment.source: When the focus is on an object that has the system caret, you can use the arrow keys, page up, page down, home, end, etc. to move through the text.
segment.target: 當焦點位在一個有系統游標的物件上，您可以按方向鍵、Page Up、Page Down、Home、End 等按鍵在文字間移動，

segment.source: You can also change the text if the control supports editing.
segment.target: 若控制項有支援編輯功能的話您也可以改變其內的文字，

segment.source: NVDA will announce as you move by character, word and line, and will also announce as you select and unselect text.
segment.target: 當您逐一字元、單字、逐行移動，或者選取文字、取消選取文字時 NVDA 都會讀出來。

segment.source: NVDA provides the following key commands in relation to the system caret:
segment.target: 與系統游標相關的 NVDA 快速鍵如下：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Say all |NVDA+downArrow |NVDA+a |Starts reading from the current position of the system caret, moving it along as it goes
segment.target: 讀出全部 |NVDA+向下鍵 |NVDA+a |從系統游標目前位置開始讀出，游標跟隨移動

segment.source: Read current line |NVDA+upArrow |NVDA+l |Reads the line where the system caret is currently situated. Pressing twice spells the line. Pressing three times spells the line using character descriptions.
segment.target: 讀出游標所在行 |NVDA+向上鍵 |NVDA+l |讀出游標所在的一行，連按兩下拼讀整行，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀整行。

segment.source: Read current text selection |NVDA+Shift+upArrow |NVDA+shift+s |Reads any currently selected text
segment.target: 讀出選取文字 |NVDA+Shift+向上鍵 |NVDA+Shift+S |讀出目前已選取的文字。

segment.source: Report text formatting |NVDA+f |NVDA+f |Reports the formatting of the text where the caret is currently situated. Pressing twice shows the information in browse mode
segment.target: 讀出文字格式 |NVDA+F |NVDA+F |讀出游標所在的文字格式，按兩下以瀏覽模式顯示資訊

segment.source: Report link destination |`NVDA+k` |`NVDA+k` |Pressing once speaks the destination URL of the link at the current caret or focus position. Pressing twice shows it in a window for more careful review
segment.target: 讀出連結目標 |NVDA+K |NVDA+K |按一下讀出游標或焦點所在連結的目標 URL，連按兩下將 URL 顯示在一個視窗中以方便仔細瀏覽。

segment.source: Report caret location |NVDA+numpadDelete |NVDA+delete |Reports information about the location of the text or object at the position of system caret. For example, this might include the percentage through the document, the distance from the edge of the page or the exact screen position. Pressing twice may provide further detail.
segment.target: 讀出游標位置 |NVDA+數字鍵盤 Delete |NVDA+Delete |讀出系統游標所在的文字或物件的位置資訊。例如：這可能包括文件中的百分比、頁面與邊緣的距離或精確的螢幕位置，連按兩下可提供更多細節。

segment.source: Next sentence |alt+downArrow |alt+downArrow |Moves the caret to the next sentence and announces it. (only supported in Microsoft Word and Outlook)
segment.target: 下一句 |Alt+向下鍵 |Alt+向下鍵 |移動游標到下一個句子的開頭並讀出該句子 (僅支援 Microsoft Word 及 Outlook)

segment.source: Previous sentence |alt+upArrow |alt+upArrow |Moves the caret to the previous sentence and announces it. (only supported in Microsoft Word and Outlook)
segment.target: 上一句 |Alt+向上鍵 |Alt+向上鍵 |移動游標到上一個句子的開頭並讀出該句子 (僅支援 Microsoft Word 及 Outlook)

segment.source: When within a table, the following key commands are also available:
segment.target: 當在表格內時也可使用以下的快速鍵：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Move to previous column |control+alt+leftArrow |Moves the system caret to the previous column (staying in the same row)
segment.target: 移到左一欄 |Ctrl+Alt+向左鍵 |移動游標到左一欄 (仍在同一列中)

segment.source: Move to next column |control+alt+rightArrow |Moves the system caret to the next column (staying in the same row)
segment.target: 移到右一欄 |Ctrl+Alt+向右鍵 |移動游標到右一欄 (仍在同一列中)

segment.source: Move to previous row |control+alt+upArrow |Moves the system caret to the previous row (staying in the same column)
segment.target: 移到上一列 |Ctrl+Alt+向上鍵 |移動游標到上一列 (仍在同一欄中)

segment.source: Move to next row |control+alt+downArrow |Moves the system caret to the next row (staying in the same column)
segment.target: 移到下一列 |Ctrl+Alt+向下鍵 |移動游標到下一列 (仍在同一欄中)

segment.source: Move to first column |control+alt+home |Moves the system caret to the first column (staying in the same row)
segment.target: 移到第一欄 |Ctrl+Alt+Home |移動游標到第一欄 (仍在同一列中)

segment.source: Move to last column |control+alt+end |Moves the system caret to the last column (staying in the same row)
segment.target: 移到最後一欄 |Ctrl+Alt+End |移動游標到最後一欄 (仍在同一列中)

segment.source: Move to first row |control+alt+pageUp |Moves the system caret to the first row (staying in the same column)
segment.target: 移到第一列 |Ctrl+Alt+PageUp |移動游標到第一列 (仍在同一欄中)

segment.source: Move to last row |control+alt+pageDown |Moves the system caret to the last row (staying in the same column)
segment.target: 移到最後一列 |Ctrl+Alt+PageDown |移動游標到最後一列 (仍在同一欄中)

segment.source: Say all in column |`NVDA+control+alt+downArrow` |Reads the column vertically from the current cell downwards to the last cell in the column.
segment.target: 向下讀出整欄 |NVDA+Ctrl+Alt+向下鍵 |從目前儲存格垂直向下讀到此欄的最後一個儲存格。

segment.source: Say all in row |`NVDA+control+alt+rightArrow` |Reads the row horizontally from the current cell rightwards to the last cell in the row.
segment.target: 向右讀出整列 |NVDA+Ctrl+Alt+向右鍵 |從目前儲存格水平向右讀到此列的最後一個儲存格。

segment.source: Read entire column |`NVDA+control+alt+upArrow` |Reads the current column vertically from top to bottom without moving the system caret.
segment.target: 讀出整欄 |NVDA+Ctrl+Alt+向上鍵 |由上往下垂直讀出目前欄，不移動系統游標。

segment.source: Read entire row |`NVDA+control+alt+leftArrow` |Reads the current row horizontally from left to right without moving the system caret.
segment.target: 讀出整列 |NVDA+Ctrl+Alt+向左鍵 |由左往右水平讀出目前列，不移動系統游標。

segment.source: Object Navigation
segment.target: 物件導覽

segment.source: Most of the time, you will work with applications using commands which move the [focus](#SystemFocus) and the [caret](#SystemCaret).
segment.target: 多數情況下您是利用移動[焦點](#SystemFocus)及[游標](#SystemCaret)相關的指令操作應用程式，

segment.source: However, sometimes, you may wish to explore the current application or the Operating System without moving the focus or caret.
segment.target: 不過有時候您會想要在不移動焦點或游標的情況下探索目前應用程式或作業系統，

segment.source: You may also wish to work with [objects](#Objects) that cannot be accessed normally using the keyboard.
segment.target: 您也會想要使用無法以鍵盤正常操作的[物件](#Objects)，

segment.source: In these cases, you can use object navigation.
segment.target: 此時物件導覽的功能就可以派上用場。

segment.source: Object navigation allows you to move between and obtain information about individual [objects](#Objects).
segment.target: 物件導覽可以讓您在個[物件](#Objects)之間移動並獲取各物件的相關資訊，

segment.source: When you move to an object, NVDA will report it similarly to the way it reports the system focus.
segment.target: 當您導覽到一個物件時，NVDA 會以類似於讀出系統焦點的方式來讀出此物件，

segment.source: For a way to review all text as it appears on the screen, you can instead use [screen review](#ScreenReview).
segment.target: 要檢閱螢幕畫面顯示的文字，則可改使用[畫面檢閱](#ScreenReview)的功能。

segment.source: Rather than having to move back and forth between every single object on the system, the objects are organized hierarchically.
segment.target: 物件是以階層架構方式組織而成，不需要在 Windows 系統上每個單一物件之間來回移動，

segment.source: This means that some objects contain other objects and you must move inside them to access the objects they contain.
segment.target: 這意謂著某些物件包含了其他子物件，您必須進入該物件後才能處理所含的子物件。

segment.source: For example, a list contains list items, so you must move inside the list in order to access its items.
segment.target: 例如針對一個包含數個清單項目的清單，您必須先移動進入這個清單才能讀出其內的清單項目，

segment.source: If you have moved to a list item, moving next and previous will take you to other list items in the same list.
segment.target: 如果您已經移動進入清單項目，則可以在同一個清單內移動至下一個或上一個清單項目，

segment.source: Moving to a list item's containing object will take you back to the list.
segment.target: 移動到包含清單項目的母物件將回到清單，

segment.source: You can then move past the list if you wish to access other objects.
segment.target: 接下來若您要讀出其他物件就可以直接跳過清單。

segment.source: Similarly, a toolbar contains controls, so you must move inside the toolbar to access the controls in the toolbar.
segment.target: 同樣地工具列也包含了控制項，若想要操作控制項您必須先移動進入工具列。

segment.source: If you yet prefer to move back and forth between every single object on the system, you can use commands to move to the previous/next object in a flattened view.
segment.target: 如果您仍然選擇要在 Windows 系統上的每個單一物件之間來回移動，可以使用指令在平面檢視中移動到上一個/下一個物件。

segment.source: For example, if you move to the next object in this flattened view and the current object contains other objects, NVDA will automatically move to the first object that it contains.
segment.target: 例如如果您移動到此平面檢視中的下一個物件，並且目前物件包含其他子物件，則 NVDA 將自動移到該物件包含的第一個子物件，

segment.source: Alternatively, if the current object doesn't contain any objects, NVDA will move to the next object at the current level of the hierarchy.
segment.target: 或者如果目前物件不包含任何子物件，NVDA 將移動到目前階層層級的下一個物件，

segment.source: If there is no such next object, NVDA will try to find the next object in the hierarchy based on containing objects until there are no more objects to move to.
segment.target: 如果沒有這樣的下一個物件，NVDA 將根據母物件的階層嘗試尋找下一個物件，直到沒有更多可以移動到的物件為止，

segment.source: The same rules apply to moving backwards in the hierarchy.
segment.target: 相同的規則適用於在階層中往回移動。

segment.source: The object currently being reviewed is called the navigator object.
segment.target: 目前正在檢閱的物件稱為「導覽物件」，

segment.source: Once you navigate to an object, you can review its content using the [text review commands](#ReviewingText) while in [Object review mode](#ObjectReview).
segment.target: 當導覽到一個物件，在[物件檢閱模式](#ObjectReview)下您可以使用[文字檢閱指令](#ReviewingText)來檢閱其內容，

segment.source: When [Visual Highlight](#VisionFocusHighlight) is enabled, the location of the current navigator object is also exposed visually.
segment.target: 若有啟用[視覺醒目提示](#VisionFocusHighlight)則目前導覽物件所在的位置會在螢幕上呈現出來，

segment.source: By default, the navigator object moves along with the System focus, though this behaviour can be toggled on and off.
segment.target: 預設情況下「導覽物件」會跟隨系統焦點移動，不過此行為可以切換開啟或關閉。

segment.source: Note: Braille following Object Navigation can be configured via [Braille Tether](#BrailleTether).
segment.target: 附註：點字游標跟隨物件導覽的方式可透過[點字游標跟隨](#BrailleTether)選項進行設定。

segment.source: To navigate by object, use the following commands:
segment.target: 要使用物件導覽可利用以下的指令：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Touch |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |觸控 |說明

segment.source: Report current object |NVDA+numpad5 |NVDA+shift+o |none |Reports the current navigator object. Pressing twice spells the information, and pressing 3 times copies this object's name and value to the clipboard.
segment.target: 讀出目前物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤5 |NVDA+Shift+O |無 |讀出目前導覽物件，連按兩下拼讀物件資訊，連按三下複製物件名稱或內容到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Move to containing object |NVDA+numpad8 |NVDA+shift+upArrow |flick up (object mode) |Moves to the object containing the current navigator object
segment.target: 移到母物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤8 |NVDA+Shift+向上鍵 |向上滑動 (物件模式) |移到包含目前導覽物件的物件 (也就是包含此物件的容器)

segment.source: Move to previous object |NVDA+numpad4 |NVDA+shift+leftArrow |none |Moves to the object before the current navigator object
segment.target: 移到上一個物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤4 |NVDA+Shift+向左鍵 |無 |移到目前導覽物件之前的物件

segment.source: Move to previous object in flattened view |NVDA+numpad9 |NVDA+shift+[ |flick left (object mode) |Moves to the previous object in a flattened view of the object navigation hierarchy
segment.target: 在平面檢視中移到上一個物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤9 |NVDA+Shift+[ |向左滑動 (物件模式) |在物件導覽階層的平面檢視中移到上一個物件

segment.source: Move to next object |NVDA+numpad6 |NVDA+shift+rightArrow |none |Moves to the object after the current navigator object
segment.target: 移到下一個物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤6 |NVDA+Shift+向右鍵 |無 |移到目前導覽物件之後的物件

segment.source: Move to next object in flattened view |NVDA+numpad3 |NVDA+shift+] |flick right (object mode) |Moves to the next object in a flattened view of the object navigation hierarchy
segment.target: 在平面檢視中移到下一個物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤3 |NVDA+Shift+] |向右滑動 (物件模式) |在物件導覽階層的平面檢視中移到下一個物件

segment.source: Move to first contained object |NVDA+numpad2 |NVDA+shift+downArrow |flick down (object mode) |Moves to the first object contained by the current navigator object
segment.target: 移到第一個子物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤2 |NVDA+Shift+向下鍵 |向下滑動 (物件模式) |移到包含於目前導覽物件內的第一個物件 (也就是此容器包含的第一個物件)

segment.source: Move to focus object |NVDA+numpadMinus |NVDA+backspace |none |Moves to the object that currently has the system focus, and also places the review cursor at the position of the System caret, if it is showing
segment.target: 移到焦點物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤減號 |NVDA+backspace |無 |移到目前系統焦點所在的物件，並將檢閱游標放在系統游標的位置 (如果有的話)

segment.source: Activate current navigator object |NVDA+numpadEnter |NVDA+enter |double-tap |Activates the current navigator object (similar to clicking with the mouse or pressing space when it has the system focus)
segment.target: 啟動目前導覽物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤Enter |NVDA+enter |點兩下 |啟動目前導覽物件 (與在系統焦點下按空白鍵或點擊滑鼠類似)

segment.source: Move System focus or caret to current review position |NVDA+shift+numpadMinus |NVDA+shift+backspace |none |pressed once Moves the System focus to the current navigator object, pressed twice moves the system caret to the position of the review cursor
segment.target: 系統焦點或游標移到目前檢閱位置 |NVDA+Shift+數字鍵盤減號 |NVDA+Shift+Backspace |無 |按一下將系統焦點移到目前導覽物件，按兩下將系統游標移到檢閱游標位置。

segment.source: Report review cursor location |NVDA+shift+numpadDelete |NVDA+shift+delete |none |Reports information about the location of the text or object at the review cursor. For example, this might include the percentage through the document, the distance from the edge of the page or the exact screen position. Pressing twice may provide further detail.
segment.target: 讀出檢閱游標位置 |NVDA+Shift+數字鍵盤 Delete |NVDA+Shift+Delete |無 |讀出檢閱游標所在的文字或物件的位置，例如：這可能包括文件中的百分比、頁面與邊緣的距離或精確的螢幕位置，連按兩下可提供更多細節。

segment.source: Move review cursor to status bar |none |none |none |Reports the Status Bar if NVDA finds one. It also moves the navigator object to this location.
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到狀態列 |無 |無 |無 |讀出狀態列 (若 NVDA 有找到)，同時會將導覽物件移到該處。

segment.source: Note: numpad keys require the Num Lock to be turned off to work properly.
segment.target: 附註：數字鍵盤的 Num Lock 鍵須在關閉狀態才能正常運作。

segment.source: Reviewing Text
segment.target: 檢閱文字

segment.source: NVDA allows you to read the contents of the [screen](#ScreenReview), current [document](#DocumentReview) or current [object](#ObjectReview) by character, word or line.
segment.target: NVDA 允許您以逐一字元、字詞及逐行方式讀出[畫面](#ScreenReview)、目前[物件](#ObjectReview)或目前[文件](#DocumentReview)上的內容，

segment.source: This is mostly useful in places (including Windows command consoles) where there is no [system caret](#SystemCaret).
segment.target: 這對於包括 Windows 命令主控台在內的那些本身沒有[系統游標](#SystemCaret)的地方尤其好用，

segment.source: For example, you might use it to review the text of a long information message in a dialog.
segment.target: 例如您可以利用此方式檢閱對話框中的一長串訊息文字。

segment.source: When moving the review cursor, the System caret does not follow along, so you can review text without losing your editing position.
segment.target: 當移動檢閱游標時系統游標不會跟著移動，所以您可以在不改變編輯位置的情況下檢閱文字，

segment.source: However, by default, when the System caret moves, the review cursor follows along.
segment.target: 不過預設情況下檢閱游標會跟隨系統游標移動，

segment.source: This can be toggled on and off.
segment.target: 此行為可以切換開啟或關閉。

segment.source: Note: Braille following the review cursor can be configured via [Braille Tether](#BrailleTether).
segment.target: 附註：點字游標跟隨檢閱游標的方式可透過[點字游標跟隨](#BrailleTether)選項進行設定。

segment.source: The following commands are available for reviewing text:
segment.target: 以下指令可用於檢閱文字 (所提到的字詞在英文等拼音文字則為單字)：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Touch |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |觸控 |說明

segment.source: Move to top line in review |shift+numpad7 |NVDA+control+home |none |Moves the review cursor to the top line of the text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到第一行 |Shift+數字鍵盤7 |NVDA+Ctrl+Home |無 |檢閱游標移到第一行文字

segment.source: Move to previous line in review |numpad7 |NVDA+upArrow |flick up (text mode) |Moves the review cursor to the previous line of text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到上一行 |數字鍵盤7 |NVDA+向上鍵 |向上滑動 (文字模式) |檢閱游標移到上一行文字

segment.source: Report current line in review |numpad8 |NVDA+shift+. |none |Announces the current line of text where the review cursor is positioned. Pressing twice spells the line. Pressing three times spells the line using character descriptions.
segment.target: 讀出檢閱游標所在行 |數字鍵盤8 |NVDA+Shift+句點 |無 |讀出檢閱游標所在的一行文字，連按兩下拼讀整行，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀整行。

segment.source: Move to next line in review |numpad9 |NVDA+downArrow |flick down (text mode) |Move the review cursor to the next line of text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到下一行 |數字鍵盤9 |NVDA+向下鍵 |向下滑動 (文字模式) |檢閱游標移到下一行文字

segment.source: Move to bottom line in review |shift+numpad9 |NVDA+control+end |none |Moves the review cursor to the bottom line of text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到最後一行 |Shift+數字鍵盤9 |NVDA+Ctrl+End |無 |檢閱游標移到最後一行文字

segment.source: Move to previous word in review |numpad4 |NVDA+control+leftArrow |2-finger flick left (text mode) |Moves the review cursor to the previous word in the text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到上一個字詞 |數字鍵盤4 |NVDA+Ctrl+向左鍵 |兩指向左滑動 (文字模式) |檢閱游標移到文字中的上一個字詞

segment.source: Report current word in review |numpad5 |NVDA+control+. |none |Announces the current word in the text where the review cursor is positioned. Pressing twice spells the word. Pressing three times spells the word using character descriptions.
segment.target: 讀出檢閱游標所在字詞 |數字鍵盤5 |NVDA+Ctrl+句點 |無 |讀出文字中目前檢閱游標所在的字詞，連按兩下拼讀字詞，連按三下使用字元說明拼讀字詞。

segment.source: Move to next word in review |numpad6 |NVDA+control+rightArrow |2-finger flick right (text mode) |Move the review cursor to the next word in the text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到下一個字詞 |數字鍵盤6 |NVDA+Ctrl+向右鍵 |兩指向右滑動 (文字模式) |檢閱游標移到文字中的下一個字詞

segment.source: Move to start of line in review |shift+numpad1 |NVDA+home |none |Moves the review cursor to the start of the current line in the text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到行首 |Shift+數字鍵盤1 |NVDA+Home |無 |檢閱游標移到目前所在行文字的開頭

segment.source: Move to previous character in review |numpad1 |NVDA+leftArrow |flick left (text mode) |Moves the review cursor to the previous character on the current line in the text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到上一個字元 |數字鍵盤1 |NVDA+向左鍵 |向左滑動 (文字模式) |檢閱游標移到目前所在行文字的上一個字元

segment.source: Report current character in review |numpad2 |NVDA+. |none |Announces the current character on the line of text where the review cursor is positioned. Pressing twice reports a description or example of that character. Pressing three times reports the numeric value of the character in decimal and hexadecimal.
segment.target: 讀出檢閱游標所在字元 |數字鍵盤2 |NVDA+句點 |無 |讀出文字中檢閱游標所在行的字元，連按兩下讀出字元說明，連按三下讀出字元的十進位值和十六進位值。

segment.source: Move to next character in review |numpad3 |NVDA+rightArrow |flick right (text mode) |Move the review cursor to the next character on the current line of text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到下一個字元 |數字鍵盤3 |NVDA+向右鍵 |向右滑動 (文字模式) |檢閱游標移到目前所在行文字的下一個字元

segment.source: Move to end of line in review |shift+numpad3 |NVDA+end |none |Moves the review cursor to the end of the current line of text
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到行尾 |Shift+數字鍵盤3 |NVDA+End |無 |檢閱游標移到目前所在行文字的結尾

segment.source: Move to previous page in review |`NVDA+pageUp` |`NVDA+shift+pageUp` |none |Moves the review cursor to the previous page of text if supported by the application
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到上一頁 |NVDA+pageUp |NVDA+Shift+PageUp |無 |檢閱游標移到文字的上一頁 (若應用程式有支援)

segment.source: Move to next page in review |`NVDA+pageDown` |`NVDA+shift+pageDown` |none |Moves the review cursor to the next page of text if supported by the application
segment.target: 檢閱游標移到下一頁 |NVDA+pageDown |NVDA+Shift+PageUp |無 |檢閱游標移到文字的下一頁 (若應用程式有支援)

segment.source: Say all with review |numpadPlus |NVDA+shift+a |3-finger flick down (text mode) |Reads from the current position of the review cursor, moving it as it goes
segment.target: 以檢閱游標讀出全部 |數字鍵盤加號 |NVDA+Shift+A |三指向下滑動 (文字模式) |從檢閱游標目前位置開始讀出，檢閱游標跟隨移動

segment.source: Select then Copy from review cursor |NVDA+f9 |NVDA+f9 |none |Starts the select then copy process from the current position of the review cursor. The actual action is not performed until you tell NVDA where the end of the text range is
segment.target: 從檢閱游標開始選取或複製 |NVDA+f9 |NVDA+f9 |無 |從檢閱游標目前位置開始選取或複製的程序，在沒有告訴 NVDA 文字範圍的結束位置之前不會有實際動作。

segment.source: Select then Copy to review cursor |NVDA+f10 |NVDA+f10 |none |On the first press, text is selected from the position previously set as start marker up to and including the review cursor's current position. If the system caret can reach the text, it will be moved to the selected text. After pressing this key stroke a second time, the text will be copied to the Windows clipboard
segment.target: 選取或複製到檢閱游標 |NVDA+f10 |NVDA+f10 |無 |按一下將先前標記的開頭位置到目前檢閱游標位置之間的文字選取，如果系統游標可以到達文字則會移到選取的文字，連按兩下將這段文字複製到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Move to marked start for copy in review |NVDA+shift+f9 |NVDA+shift+f9 |none |Moves the review cursor to the position previously set start marker for copy
segment.target: 移動檢閱游標到標記要複製的開頭 |NVDA+Shift+F9 |NVDA+Shift+F9 |無 |檢閱游標移到先前已標記要複製的開頭位置

segment.source: Report text formatting |NVDA+shift+f |NVDA+shift+f |none |Reports the formatting of the text where the review cursor is currently situated. Pressing twice shows the information in browse mode
segment.target: 讀出文字格式 |NVDA+Shift+F |NVDA+Shift+F |無 |讀出檢閱游標所在位置的文字格式，連按兩下在瀏覽模式顯示資訊。

segment.source: Report current symbol replacement |None |None |none |Speaks the symbol where the review cursor is positioned. Pressed twice, shows the symbol and the text used to speak it in browse mode.
segment.target: 讀出目前符號的替代文字 |無 |無 |無 |讀出檢閱游標所在的符號，連按兩下在瀏覽模式顯示該符號及讀音替代文字。

segment.source: Note: numpad keys require the Num Lock to be turned off to work properly.
segment.target: 附註：數字鍵盤的 Num Lock 鍵須在關閉狀態才能正常運作。

segment.source: A good way to remember the basic text review commands when using the Desktop layout is to think of them as being in a grid of three by three, with top to bottom being line, word and character and left to right being previous, current and next.
segment.target: 當使用桌上型電腦鍵盤配置時提供一個好記的方法，也就是想像基本的文字檢閱指令是安排在 3 乘以 3 的九宮格數字鍵盤中，由上到下分別是讀出「行、字詞、字元」，而從左到右是讀出「上一個、目前、下一個」，

segment.source: The layout is illustrated as follows:
segment.target: 數字鍵盤配置的說明如下：

segment.source: Previous line |Current line |Next line
segment.target: 上一行 |目前這一行 |下一行

segment.source: Previous word |Current word |Next word
segment.target: 上一個字詞 |目前的字詞 |下一個字詞

segment.source: Previous character |Current character |Next character
segment.target: 上一個字元 |目前的字元 |下一個字元

segment.source: Review Modes
segment.target: 檢閱模式

segment.source: NVDA's [text review commands](#ReviewingText) can review content within the current navigator object, current document or screen, depending on the review mode selected.
segment.target: 隨著所選擇的檢閱模式而定，[文字檢閱指令](#ReviewingText)可以檢閱目前導覽物件、目前文件或畫面，

segment.source: The following commands switch between review modes:
segment.target: 以下指令用來切換檢閱模式：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Touch |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |觸控 |說明

segment.source: Switch to next review mode |NVDA+numpad7 |NVDA+pageUp |2-finger flick up |switches to the next available review mode
segment.target: 切換到下一個檢閱模式 |NVDA+數字鍵盤7 |NVDA+pageUp |兩指向上滑動 |切換到下一個可供使用的檢閱模式

segment.source: Switch to previous review mode |NVDA+numpad1 |NVDA+pageDown |2-finger flick down |switches to the previous available review mode
segment.target: 切換到上一個檢閱模式 |NVDA+數字鍵盤1 |NVDA+pageDown |兩指向下滑動 |切換到上一個可供使用的檢閱模式

segment.source: Object Review
segment.target: 物件檢閱

segment.source: While in object review mode, you are able to only review the content of the current [navigator object](#ObjectNavigation).
segment.target: 在物件檢閱模式下您只能檢閱目前[導覽物件](#ObjectNavigation)的內容，

segment.source: For objects such as editable text fields or other basic text controls, this will generally be the text content.
segment.target: 對於如文字編輯區或其他文字控制項等物件，它通常是文字內容，

segment.source: For other objects, this may be the name and/or value.
segment.target: 對於其他物件這可能會是名稱 和/或 值。

segment.source: Document Review
segment.target: 文件檢閱

segment.source: When the [navigator object](#ObjectNavigation) is within a browse mode document (e.g. web page) or other complex document (e.g. a Lotus Symphony document), it is possible to switch to the document review mode.
segment.target: 當[導覽物件](#ObjectNavigation)位於瀏覽模式文件如網頁或較複雜的文件如 Lotus Symphony 文件等，便可以切換到文件檢閱模式，

segment.source: The document review mode allows you to review the text of the entire document.
segment.target: 文件檢閱模式允許您檢閱整個文件中的文字。

segment.source: When switching from object review to document review, the review cursor is placed in the document at the position of the navigator object.
segment.target: 當從物件檢閱切換到文件檢閱模式，檢閱游標會隨之移到文件中導覽物件的所在位置，

segment.source: When moving around the document with review commands, the navigator object is automatically updated to the object found at the current review cursor position.
segment.target: 使用檢閱指令在文件中移動時，導覽物件會自動跟隨在檢閱游標位置的物件上。

segment.source: Note that NVDA will switch to document review from object review automatically when moving around browse mode documents.
segment.target: 附註：當 NVDA 在瀏覽模式文件中移動時會自動從物件檢閱切換到文件檢閱模式。

segment.source: Screen Review
segment.target: 畫面檢閱

segment.source: The screen review mode allows you to review the text of the screen as it appears visually within the current application.
segment.target: 畫面檢閱模式允許您檢閱目前應用程式中顯示的螢幕文字，

segment.source: This is similar to the screen review or mouse cursor functionality in many other Windows screen readers.
segment.target: 這類似於許多其他 Windows 助讀程式的畫面檢閱或滑鼠游標功能。

segment.source: When switching to screen review mode, the review cursor is placed at the screen position of the current [navigator object](#ObjectNavigation).
segment.target: 當切換到畫面檢閱模式，檢閱游標會隨之移到目前[導覽物件](#ObjectNavigation)所在的畫面位置，

segment.source: When moving around the screen with review commands, the navigator object is automatically updated to the object found at the screen position of the review cursor.
segment.target: 使用檢閱指令在畫面中移動時，導覽物件會自動跟隨在檢閱游標畫面位置的物件上。

segment.source: Note that in some newer applications, NVDA may not see some or all text displayed on the screen due to the use of newer screen drawing technologies which are impossible to support at this time.
segment.target: 附註：有些較新開發的應用程式使用了目前還不支援的新畫面繪圖技術，NVDA 可能無法看到螢幕上顯示的部分或全部文字。

segment.source: Navigating with the Mouse
segment.target: 滑鼠導覽

segment.source: When you move the mouse, NVDA by default reports the text that is directly under the mouse pointer as the pointer moves over it.
segment.target: 當您移動滑鼠時，預設情況下 NVDA 會讀出滑鼠指標所指的文字，您可以設定讀出滑鼠所指文字的範圍，

segment.source: Where supported, NVDA will read the surrounding paragraph of text, though some controls may only read by line.
segment.target: 例如讀出滑鼠所指文字的整個段落內容，但有些控制項則僅能讀出滑鼠所指文字的那一行文字。

segment.source: NVDA can be configured to also announce the type of [object](#Objects) under the mouse as it moves (e.g. list, button, etc.).
segment.target: 您也可以設定讓 NVDA 讀出滑鼠所指[物件](#Objects)的類型，例如清單、按鈕等，

segment.source: This may be useful for totally blind users, as sometimes, the text isn't enough.
segment.target: 這對於全盲的使用者非常有用，因為有時僅讀出文字內容是不夠的。

segment.source: NVDA provides a way for users to understand where the mouse is located relative to the dimensions of the screen by playing the current mouse coordinates as audio beeps.
segment.target: NVDA 提供了一種方法讓使用者藉由播放目前滑鼠座標的嗶嗶聲來了解滑鼠在螢幕上的相對位置，

segment.source: The higher the mouse is on the screen, the higher the pitch of the beeps.
segment.target: 滑鼠愈接近螢幕頂端則發出的嗶嗶聲音調愈高，

segment.source: The further left or right the mouse is located on the screen, the further left or right the sound will be played (assuming the user has stereo speakers or headphones).
segment.target: 若使用者有立體聲喇叭或耳機，滑鼠位置愈接近螢幕左側或右側則來自左邊或右邊喇叭聲音的遠近感也會不同。

segment.source: These extra mouse features are not turned on by default in NVDA.
segment.target: 這種額外的滑鼠功能 NVDA 預設不會開啟，

segment.source: If you wish to take advantage of them, you can configure them from the [Mouse settings](#MouseSettings) category of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog, found in the NVDA Preferences menu.
segment.target: 如果您想利用此功能可在 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的[滑鼠設定](#MouseSettings)類別進行設定。

segment.source: Although a physical mouse or trackpad should be used to navigate with the mouse, NVDA provides some commands related to the mouse:
segment.target: 雖然應使用實體的滑鼠或觸控板來進行滑鼠導覽，NVDA 仍提供以下幾個與滑鼠相關的指令：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Touch |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |觸控 |說明

segment.source: Left mouse button click |numpadDivide |NVDA+[ |none |Clicks the left mouse button once. The common double click can be performed by pressing this key twice in quick succession
segment.target: 點擊滑鼠左鍵 |數字鍵盤除號 |NVDA+左中括號 |無 |點擊滑鼠左鍵一次，連續快按兩下為雙擊滑鼠左鍵。

segment.source: Left mouse button lock |shift+numpadDivide |NVDA+control+[ |none |Locks the left mouse button down. Press again to release it. To drag the mouse, press this key to lock the left button down and then move the mouse either physically or use one of the other mouse routing commands
segment.target: 鎖定滑鼠左鍵 |Shift+數字鍵盤除號 |NVDA+Ctrl+左中括號 |無 |鎖定滑鼠左鍵，再按一次則解鎖。要拖曳滑鼠請鎖定左鍵，然後實際移動滑鼠或使用其他滑鼠定位指令。

segment.source: Right mouse click |numpadMultiply |NVDA+] |tap and hold |Clicks the right mouse button once, mostly used to open context menu at the location of the mouse.
segment.target: 點擊滑鼠右鍵 |數字鍵盤乘號 |NVDA+右中括號 |點兩下並按住 |點擊滑鼠右鍵一次，通常用於在滑鼠位置開啟快顯功能表。

segment.source: Right mouse button lock |shift+numpadMultiply |NVDA+control+] |none |Locks the right mouse button down. Press again to release it. To drag the mouse, press this key to lock the right button down and then move the mouse either physically or use one of the other mouse routing commands
segment.target: 鎖定滑鼠右鍵 |Shift+數字鍵盤乘號 |NVDA+Ctrl+右中括號 |無 |鎖定滑鼠右鍵，再按一次則解鎖。要拖曳滑鼠請鎖定右鍵，然後實際移動滑鼠或使用其他滑鼠定位指令。

segment.source: Scroll up at the mouse position |none |none |none |Scrolls the mouse wheel up at the current mouse position
segment.target: 在滑鼠位置向上滾動 |無 |無 |無 |在目前滑鼠位置向上滾動滑鼠滾輪

segment.source: Scroll down at the mouse position|none |none |none |Scrolls the mouse wheel down at the current mouse position
segment.target: 在滑鼠位置向下滾動 |無 |無 |無 |在目前滑鼠位置向下滾動滑鼠滾輪

segment.source: Scroll left at the mouse position |none |none |none |Scrolls the mouse wheel left at the current mouse position
segment.target: 在滑鼠位置向左滾動 |無 |無 |無 |在目前滑鼠位置向左滾動滑鼠滾輪

segment.source: Scroll right at the mouse position |none |none |none |Scrolls the mouse wheel right at the current mouse position
segment.target: 在滑鼠位置向右滾動 |無 |無 |無 |在目前滑鼠位置向右滾動滑鼠滾輪

segment.source: Move mouse to current navigator object |NVDA+numpadDivide |NVDA+shift+m |none |Moves the mouse to the location of the current navigator object and review cursor
segment.target: 移動滑鼠到目前導覽物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤除號 |NVDA+Shift+M |無 |移動滑鼠到目前導覽物件及檢閱游標位置。

segment.source: Navigate to the object under the mouse |NVDA+numpadMultiply |NVDA+shift+n |none |Set the navigator object to the object located at the position of the mouse
segment.target: 導覽到滑鼠所在物件 |NVDA+數字鍵盤乘號 |NVDA+Shift+N |無 |導覽物件移到目前滑鼠所在的物件。

segment.source: Browse Mode
segment.target: 瀏覽模式

segment.source: Complex read-only documents such as web pages are browsed in NVDA using browse mode.
segment.target: NVDA 使用瀏覽模式來瀏覽諸如網頁內容等複雜的唯讀文件，

segment.source: This includes documents in the following applications:
segment.target: 此模式適用於下列應用程式中的文件：

segment.source: Mozilla Firefox
segment.target: Mozilla Firefox

segment.source: Microsoft Internet Explorer
segment.target: Microsoft Internet Explorer

segment.source: Mozilla Thunderbird
segment.target: Mozilla Thunderbird

segment.source: HTML messages in Microsoft Outlook
segment.target: Microsoft Outlook 中的 HTML 訊息

segment.source: Google Chrome
segment.target: Google Chrome

segment.source: Microsoft Edge
segment.target: Microsoft Edge

segment.source: Adobe Reader
segment.target: Adobe Reader

segment.source: Foxit Reader
segment.target: Foxit Reader

segment.source: Supported books in Amazon Kindle for PC
segment.target: Amazon Kindle for PC 支援的電子書

segment.source: Browse mode is also optionally available for Microsoft Word documents.
segment.target: 瀏覽模式同樣也能用於 Microsoft Word 文件。

segment.source: In browse mode, the content of the document is made available in a flat representation that can be navigated with the cursor keys as if it were a normal text document.
segment.target: 在瀏覽模式下文件的內容是以平面形式呈現，利用方向鍵來導覽文件內容，就如同一般文字文件那樣，

segment.source: All of NVDA's [system caret](#SystemCaret) key commands will work in this mode; e.g. say all, report formatting, table navigation commands, etc.
segment.target: 所有 NVDA 的[系統游標](#SystemCaret)指令皆可用於瀏覽模式，例如讀出全部、讀出格式資訊及表格導覽指令等，

segment.source: When [Visual Highlight](#VisionFocusHighlight) is enabled, the location of the virtual browse mode caret is also exposed visually.
segment.target: 若有啟用[視覺醒目提示](#VisionFocusHighlight)則虛擬瀏覽模式游標位置會以視覺強調的方式在螢幕上呈現，

segment.source: Information such as whether text is a link, heading, etc. is reported along with the text as you move.
segment.target: 移動時文字是否為連結、標題等資訊將會隨著文字一起讀出。

segment.source: Sometimes, you will need to interact directly with controls in these documents.
segment.target: 有時候您需要與文件上的某些控制項直接互動，

segment.source: For example, you will need to do this for editable text fields and lists so that you can type characters and use the cursor keys to work with the control.
segment.target: 例如在文字編輯區輸入文字或在清單控制項中使用方向鍵操作，

segment.source: You do this by switching to focus mode, where almost all keys are passed to the control.
segment.target: 此時就需要切換到焦點模式，隨後所有按鍵動作將直達控制項。

segment.source: When in Browse mode, by default, NVDA will automatically switch to focus mode if you tab to or click on a particular control that requires it.
segment.target: 當在瀏覽模式，預設情況下按 Tab 移到或以滑鼠點擊需要焦點模式的特定控制項將會自動切換到焦點模式，

segment.source: Conversely, tabbing to or clicking on a control that does not require focus mode will switch back to browse mode.
segment.target: 反之若按 Tab 移到或以滑鼠點擊不需要焦點模式的控制項則會切換回瀏覽模式。

segment.source: You can also press enter or space to switch to focus mode on controls that require it.
segment.target: 您也可以在需要焦點模式的控制項上按 Enter 或空白鍵來切換到焦點模式，

segment.source: Pressing escape will switch back to browse mode.
segment.target: 按 Escape 鍵則會切換回瀏覽模式，

segment.source: In addition, you can manually force focus mode, after which it will remain in effect until you choose to disable it.
segment.target: 此外您可以手動強制切換到焦點模式，這將會持續保持在焦點模式直到您再手動切換回瀏覽模式。

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Toggle browse/focus modes |NVDA+space |Toggles between focus mode and browse mode
segment.target: 切換瀏覽/焦點模式 |NVDA+空白鍵 |在焦點模式與瀏覽模式之間切換

segment.source: Exit focus mode |escape |Switches back to browse mode if focus mode was previously switched to automatically
segment.target: 離開焦點模式 |Esc |如果先前自動切換到焦點模式則切換回瀏覽模式

segment.source: Refresh browse mode document |NVDA+f5 |Reloads the current document content (useful if certain content seems to be missing from the document. Not available in Microsoft Word and Outlook.)
segment.target: 更新瀏覽模式文件 |NVDA+F5 |重新載入目前文件內容 (若發現似乎文件內容有些遺失則此功能相當管用，但對於 Microsoft Word 及 Outlook 則不適用)

segment.source: Find |NVDA+control+f |Pops up a dialog in which you can type some text to find in the current document. See [searching for text](#SearchingForText) for more information.
segment.target: 尋找 |NVDA+Ctrl+F |開啟一個對話框，以便輸入文字在目前的文件中搜尋。請參見[尋找文字](#SearchingForText)獲取更多資訊

segment.source: Find next |NVDA+f3 |Finds the next occurrence of the text in the document that you previously searched for
segment.target: 尋找下一個 |NVDA+F3 |在目前文件中向下尋找前次搜尋的文字。

segment.source: Find previous |NVDA+shift+f3 |Finds the previous occurrence of the text in the document you previously searched for
segment.target: 尋找上一個 |NVDA+Shift+F3 |在目前文件中向上尋找前次搜尋的文字。

segment.source: Single Letter Navigation
segment.target: 單鍵導覽

segment.source: While in browse mode, for quicker navigation, NVDA also provides single character keys to jump to certain fields in the document.
segment.target: 在瀏覽模式下為了快速導覽，NVDA 還提供了單一字母按鍵以跳至文件內特定元素的功能。

segment.source: Note that not all of these commands are supported in every type of document.
segment.target: 附註：並非所有的單鍵導覽指令在個種類型的文件均有支援。

segment.source: The following keys by themselves jump to the next available element, while adding the shift key causes them to jump to the previous element:
segment.target: 下列的按鍵僅按該單一按鍵會跳至對應的下一個元素，同時按 Shift+該單一按鍵則會跳至上一個對應的元素。

segment.source: h: heading
segment.target: h: 標題 (heading)

segment.source: l: list
segment.target: l: 清單 (list)

segment.source: i: list item
segment.target: i: 清單項目 (list item)

segment.source: t: table
segment.target: t: 表格 (table)

segment.source: k: link
segment.target: k: 連結 (link)

segment.source: n: nonLinked text
segment.target: n: 非連結文字 (nonLinked text)

segment.source: f: form field
segment.target: f: 表單欄位 (form field)

segment.source: u: unvisited link
segment.target: u: 未到訪過的連結 (unvisited link)

segment.source: v: visited link
segment.target: v: 已到訪過的連結 (visited link)

segment.source: e: edit field
segment.target: e: 編輯區 (edit field)

segment.source: b: button
segment.target: b: 按鈕 (button)

segment.source: x: checkbox
segment.target: x: 核取方塊 (checkbox)

segment.source: c: combo box
segment.target: c: 下拉式方塊 (combo box)

segment.source: r: radio button
segment.target: r: 選擇鈕 (radio button)

segment.source: q: block quote
segment.target: q: 引述 (block quote)

segment.source: s: separator
segment.target: s: 分隔線 (separator)

segment.source: m: frame
segment.target: m: 頁框 (frame)

segment.source: g: graphic
segment.target: g: 圖片 (graphic)

segment.source: d: landmark
segment.target: d: 地標 (landmark)

segment.source: o: embedded object (audio and video player, application, dialog, etc.)
segment.target: o: 嵌入式物件 (音訊和視訊播放器、應用程式、對話框等) (embedded object)

segment.source: 1 to 6: headings at levels 1 to 6 respectively
segment.target: 主鍵盤上的 1 到 6: 第 1 級到第 6 級標題。

segment.source: a: annotation (comment, editor revision, etc.)
segment.target: a: 註釋 (註解、編輯者修訂等) (annotation)

segment.source: `p`: text paragraph
segment.target: p: 文字段落 (text paragraph)

segment.source: w: spelling error
segment.target: w: 拼字錯誤 (spelling error)

segment.source: To move to the beginning or end of containing elements such as lists and tables:
segment.target: 要移到容器元素例如清單或表格的開頭或結尾：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Move to start of container |shift+comma |Moves to the start of the container (list, table, etc.) where the caret is positioned
segment.target: 移到容器的開頭 |Shift, |移到游標所在容器 (例如清單或表格) 的開頭

segment.source: Move past end of container |comma |Moves past the end of the container (list, table, etc.) where the caret is positioned
segment.target: 跳開容器 |, |移出游標所在容器 (例如清單或表格) 的結尾

segment.source: Some web applications such as Gmail, Twitter and Facebook use single letters as shortcut keys.
segment.target: 有些網頁應用程式如 Gmail、Twitter 及 Facebook 使用單一字母作為快速鍵，

segment.source: If you want to use these while still being able to use your cursor keys to read in browse mode, you can temporarily disable NVDA's single letter navigation keys.
segment.target: 如果您想在瀏覽模式下以方向鍵閱讀的同時使用這些快速鍵，可將 NVDA 單鍵導覽暫時停用。

segment.source: To toggle single letter navigation on and off for the current document, press NVDA+shift+space.
segment.target: 要在目前文件中切換開啟或關閉 NVDA 單鍵導覽，按 NVDA+Shift+空白鍵。

segment.source: Text paragraph navigation command
segment.target: 文字段落導覽指令

segment.source: You can jump to the next or previous text paragraph by pressing `p` or `shift+p`.
segment.target: 您可以按 P 或 Shift+P 跳到下一個或上一個文字段落，

segment.source: Text paragraphs are defined by a group of text that appears to be written in complete sentences.
segment.target: 文字段落由一組看似以完整句子撰寫的文字所定義的，

segment.source: This can be useful to find the beginning of readable content on various webpages, such as:
segment.target: 這對於尋找各種網頁上可讀內容的開頭非常有用，例如：

segment.source: News websites
segment.target: 新聞網站

segment.source: Forums
segment.target: 論壇

segment.source: Blog posts
segment.target: 部落格文章

segment.source: These commands can also be helpful for skipping certain kinds of clutter, such as:
segment.target: 這些指令還有助於跳過某些雜亂的類型，例如：

segment.source: Ads
segment.target: 廣告

segment.source: Menus
segment.target: 選單

segment.source: Headers
segment.target: 標題

segment.source: Please note, however, that while NVDA tries its best to identify text paragraphs, the algorithm is not perfect and at times can make mistakes.
segment.target: 請注意，雖然 NVDA 盡力識別文字段落，不過演算法並不完美，有時可能會出錯。

segment.source: Additionally, this command is different from paragraph navigation commands `control+downArrow/upArrow`.
segment.target: 此外，此指令與段落導覽指令 Ctrl+向下鍵/向上鍵不同，

segment.source: Text paragraph navigation only jumps between text paragraphs, while paragraph navigation commands take the cursor to the previous/next paragraphs regardless of whether they contain text or not.
segment.target: 文字段落導覽僅在文字段落之間跳轉，而段落導覽指令則是將遊標移到上一個/下一個段落，無論它們是否包含文字。

segment.source: Other navigation commands
segment.target: 其他導覽指令

segment.source: In addition to the quick navigation commands listed above, NVDA has commands that have no default keys assigned.
segment.target: 除了上面列出的快速導覽指令，NVDA 還有未指派預設快速鍵的指令，

segment.source: To use these commands, you first need to assign gestures to them using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要使用這些指令，您需要先使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)為其指派手勢，

segment.source: Here is a list of available commands:
segment.target: 以下是可用的指令：

segment.source: Article
segment.target: 文章

segment.source: Figure
segment.target: 圖表

segment.source: Grouping
segment.target: 群組

segment.source: Tab
segment.target: 索引標籤

segment.source: Menu item
segment.target: 功能表項目

segment.source: Toggle button
segment.target: 切換按鈕

segment.source: Progress bar
segment.target: 進度列

segment.source: Math formula
segment.target: 數學公式

segment.source: Vertically aligned paragraph
segment.target: 垂直對齊段落

segment.source: Same style text
segment.target: 相同樣式文字

segment.source: Different style text
segment.target: 不同樣式文字

segment.source: Keep in mind that there are two commands for each type of element, for moving forward in the document and backward in the document, and you must assign gestures to both commands in order to be able to quickly navigate in both directions.
segment.target: 請記得每種類型的元素都有兩個指令用以在文件中往前移動及在文件中往回移動，您必須為這兩個指令指派手勢以便能夠在兩個方向上快速導覽。

segment.source: For example, if you want to use the `y` / `shift+y` keys to quickly navigate through tabs, you would do the following:
segment.target: 例如，如果您想使用 Y 或 Shift+Y 快速導覽索引標籤，可以執行以下操作：

segment.source: Open input gestures dialog from browse mode.
segment.target: 在瀏覽模式開啟輸入手勢對話框。

segment.source: Find "moves to the next tab" item in the Browse mode section.
segment.target: 在瀏覽模式的部分找到「移到下一個索引標籤」項目。

segment.source: Assign `y` key for found gesture.
segment.target: 指派 Y 鍵作為手勢。

segment.source: Find "moves to the previous tab" item.
segment.target: 找到「移到上一個索引標籤」項目。

segment.source: Assign `shift+y` for found gesture.
segment.target: 指派 Shift+Y 作為手勢。

segment.source: The Elements List
segment.target: 項目清單

segment.source: The elements list provides access to a list of various types of elements in the document as appropriate for the application.
segment.target: 「項目清單」根據應用程式而定提供了一個可以快速到達文件中各種類型項目的清單，

segment.source: For example, in web browsers, the elements list can list links, headings, form fields, buttons or landmarks.
segment.target: 例如在瀏覽器中項目清單可以列出連結、標題、表單欄位、按鈕及地標，

segment.source: Radio buttons allow you to switch between the different types of elements.
segment.target: 您可利用選擇鈕在不同類型的項目之間切換。

segment.source: An edit field is also provided in the dialog which allows you to filter the list to help you search for a particular item on the page.
segment.target: 在對話框中也提供一個可編輯文字方塊，您可輸入關鍵字篩選清單以找尋網頁上特定的項目，

segment.source: Once you have chosen an item, you can use the provided buttons in the dialog to move to or activate that item.
segment.target: 一旦選定了項目，您可以使用對話框所提供的按鈕移到或啟動所選的項目。

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Browse mode elements list |NVDA+f7 |Lists various types of elements in the current document
segment.target: 瀏覽模式項目清單 |NVDA+f7 |列出在目前文件中各種類型的項目

segment.source: Searching for text
segment.target: 尋找文字

segment.source: This dialog allows you to search for terms in the current document.
segment.target: 此對話框允許您在目前的文件中尋找文字，

segment.source: In the "Type the text you wish to find" field, the text to be found can be entered.
segment.target: 在「輸入要尋找的文字」編輯區中可以輸入您想要尋找的文字，

segment.source: The "Case sensitive" checkbox makes the search consider uppercase and lowercase letters differently.
segment.target: 「大小寫需相符」核取方塊使搜尋考慮到大小寫字母的差異，

segment.source: For example, with "Case sensitive" selected you can find "NV Access" but not "nv access".
segment.target: 例如當勾選此核取方塊，您輸入「NVDA」僅能搜尋到大寫的 NVDA，而無法搜尋到小寫的 nvda。

segment.source: Use the following keys for performing searches:
segment.target: 尋找文字相關的快速鍵如下：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Find text |NVDA+control+f |Opens the search dialog
segment.target: 尋找文字 |NVDA+Ctrl+F |開啟尋找對話框

segment.source: Find next |NVDA+f3 |searches the next occurrence of the current search term
segment.target: 尋找下一個 |NVDA+f3 |尋找下一個目前搜尋的文字

segment.source: Find previous |NVDA+shift+f3 |searches the previous occurrence of the current search term
segment.target: 尋找上一個 |NVDA+Shift+F3 |尋找上一個目前搜尋的文字

segment.source: Embedded Objects
segment.target: 嵌入式物件

segment.source: Pages can include rich content using technologies such as Oracle Java and HTML5, as well as applications and dialogs.
segment.target: 網頁可使用 Oracle Java 與 HTML5 技術以及應用程式與對話框來呈現豐富的內容，

segment.source: Where these are encountered in browse mode, NVDA will report "embedded object", "application" or "dialog", respectively.
segment.target: 當在瀏覽模式遇到這些物件，NVDA 將分別讀出「嵌入式物件」、「應用程式」或「對話框」的提示，

segment.source: You can quickly move to them using the o and shift+o embedded object single letter navigation keys.
segment.target: 您可使用 o 及 Shift+O 單鍵導覽按鍵快速移到這些物件，

segment.source: To interact with these objects, you can press enter on them.
segment.target: 要與這些物件互動可在物件上按 Enter，

segment.source: If it is accessible, you can then tab around it and interact with it like any other application.
segment.target: 如果具可及性您便可像一般的應用程式那樣按 Tab 移動並操作，

segment.source: A key command is provided to return to the original page containing the embedded object:
segment.target: 以下的快速鍵用以回到包含嵌入式物件的原來網頁：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Move to containing browse mode document |NVDA+control+space |Moves the focus out of the current embedded object and into the document that contains it
segment.target: 移到包含物件的瀏覽模式文件 |NVDA+Ctrl+空白鍵 |移動焦點離開目前的嵌入式物件回到包含該物件的文件中。

segment.source: Native Selection Mode
segment.target: 原生選取模式

segment.source: By default when selecting text with the `shift+arrow` keys in Browse Mode, a selection is only made within NVDA's Browse Mode representation of the document, and not within the application itself.
segment.target: 預設情況下，在瀏覽模式使用「Shift+方向鍵」選取文字僅會在以 NVDA 瀏覽模式表示的文件中進行選取，而不是在應用程式本身中進行選取，

segment.source: This means that the selection is not visible on screen, and copying text with `control+c` will only copy NVDA's plain text representation of the content. i.e. formatting of tables, or whether something is a link will not be copied.
segment.target: 這意謂著所選內容在螢幕上是不可見的，並且使用 Ctrl+C 複製文字只會複製以 NVDA 純文字表示的內容，也就是說表格的格式，或某些內容是否是一個連結都不會被複製下來。

segment.source: However, NVDA has a Native Selection Mode which can be turned on in particular Browse Mode documents (so far only Mozilla Firefox) which causes the document's native selection to follow NVDA's Browse Mode selection.
segment.target: 不過 NVDA 有一個原生選取模式，可以在特定的瀏覽模式文件 (目前僅 Mozilla Firefox) 中開啟該模式，從而使文件的原生選取能夠跟隨 NVDA 的瀏覽模式選取。

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Toggle Native Selection Mode on and off |`NVDA+shift+f10` |Toggles native selection mode on and off
segment.target: 切換原生選取模式的開或關 |NVDA+Shift+F10 |切換原生選取模式的開或關

segment.source: When Native Selection Mode is turned on, copying the selection with `control+c` will also use the application's own copy functionality, meaning that rich content will be copied to the clipboard, rather than plain text.
segment.target: 當原生選取模式開啟時，使用 Ctrl+C 複製所選內容也會使用應用程式自己的複製功能，意思是豐富的內容會複製到剪貼簿，而不是純文字複製到剪貼簿，

segment.source: This means that pasting this content into a program such as Microsoft Word or Excel, formatting such as tables, or whether something is a link will be included.
segment.target: 這表示將此內容貼到 Microsoft Word 或 Excel 等應用程式，表格或連結的格式將一併包含在內。

segment.source: Please note however that in native selection mode, some accessible labels or other information that NVDA generates in Browse Mode will not be included.
segment.target: 但請注意原生選取模式下將不包括 NVDA 在瀏覽模式生成的一些輔助標籤或其他資訊，

segment.source: Also, although the application will try its best to match the native selection to NVDA's Browse Mode selection, it may not always be completely accurate.
segment.target: 此外儘管應用程式會盡可能使原生選取符合 NVDA 的瀏覽模式選取，但可能不總是完全準確，

segment.source: However, for scenarios where you wish to copy an entire table or paragraph of rich content, this feature should prove useful.
segment.target: 然而對於您想要複製整個表格或豐富內容的段落的情境，此功能應該很有用。

segment.source: Reading Mathematical Content
segment.target: 讀出數學內容

segment.source: NVDA can read and navigate mathematical content on the web and in other applications, providing access in both speech and braille.
segment.target: NVDA 可以讀取和導覽在網路上和其他應用程式中的數學內容，提供語音和點字呈現，

segment.source: However, in order for NVDA to read and interact with mathematical content, you will first need to install a Math component for NvDA.
segment.target: 不過為了讓 NVDA 讀取數學內容並與之互動，您首先需要為 NVDA 安裝數學元件。

segment.source: There are several NVDA add-ons available in the NVDA Add-on Store that provide support for math, including the [MathCAT NVDA add-on](https://nsoiffer.github.io/MathCAT/) and [Access8Math](https://github.com/tsengwoody/Access8Math).
segment.target: NVDA 附加元件商店中有幾個提供數學支援的 NVDA 附加元件，包括 [MathCAT NVDA 附加元件](https://nsoiffer.github.io/MathCAT/)和 [Access8Math](https://github.com/tsengwoody/Access8Math)，

segment.source: Please refer to the [Add-on Store section](#AddonsManager) to learn how to browse and install available add-ons in NVDA.
segment.target: 請參考[附加元件商店章節](#AddonsManager)以了解如何在 NVDA 瀏覽和安裝可用的附加元件。

segment.source: NVDA also can make use of the older [MathPlayer](https://info.wiris.com/mathplayer-info) software from Wiris if found on your system, though this software is no longer maintained.
segment.target: NVDA 也可以使用 Wiris 的舊版 [MathPlayer](https://info.wiris.com/mathplayer-info) 軟體 (如果已存在您的電腦上)，但軟體已不再維護。

segment.source: Supported math content
segment.target: 支援的數學內容

segment.source: With an appropriate math component installed, NVDA supports the following types of mathematical content:
segment.target: 安裝適當的數學元件後，NVDA 支援以下類型的數學內容：

segment.source: MathML in Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Internet Explorer and Google Chrome.
segment.target: Mozilla Firefox、Microsoft Internet Explorer 和 Google Chrome 中的 MathML。

segment.source: Microsoft Word 365 Modern Math Equations via UI automation:
segment.target: 透過 UI automation 的 Microsoft Word 365 Modern Math Equations：

segment.source: NVDA is able to read and interact with math equations in Microsoft Word 365/2016 build 14326 and higher.
segment.target: NVDA 能夠讀出 Microsoft Word 365/2016 build 14326 及以上版本中的數學方程式並與之互動，

segment.source: Note however that any previously created MathType equations must be first converted to Office Math.
segment.target: 不過先前所建立的 MathType 方程式必須先轉換為 Office Math，

segment.source: This can be done by selecting each and choosing "Equation Options", then "Convert to Office Math" in the context menu.
segment.target: 選取每一個方程式後在快顯功能表中選擇 Equation Options -> Convert to Office Math。

segment.source: Ensure your version of MathType is the latest version before doing this.
segment.target: 執行此操作之前請確保您的 MathType 為最新版本。

segment.source: Microsoft Word provides linear symbol-based navigation through the equations itself and supports inputting math using several syntaxes, including LateX.
segment.target: Microsoft Word 現在也提供以線性符號方式導覽方程式，並支援使用包括 LateX 在內的一些語法來輸入數學。

segment.source: For further details, please see [Linear format equations using UnicodeMath and LaTeX in Word](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/linear-format-equations-using-unicodemath-and-latex-in-word-2e00618d-b1fd-49d8-8cb4-8d17f25754f8)
segment.target: 更詳細的內容請參見 [Linear format equations using UnicodeMath and LaTeX in Word](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/linear-format-equations-using-unicodemath-and-latex-in-word-2e00618d-b1fd-49d8-8cb4-8d17f25754f8)

segment.source: Microsoft Powerpoint, and older versions of Microsoft Word:
segment.target: Microsoft Powerpoint 與較舊版本的 Microsoft Word：

segment.source: NVDA can read and navigate MathType equations in both Microsoft Powerpoint and Microsoft word.
segment.target: NVDA 在 Microsoft Powerpoint 與 Microsoft word 中能夠讀出並導覽 MathType 方程式，

segment.source: MathType needs to be installed in order for this to work.
segment.target: 這需要安裝 MathType 且

segment.source: The trial version is sufficient.
segment.target: 只需安裝試用版即可，

segment.source: It can be downloaded from the [MathType presentation page](https://www.wiris.com/en/mathtype/).
segment.target: MathType 可以從 [MathType 展示頁](https://www.wiris.com/en/mathtype/)下載。

segment.source: Adobe Reader:
segment.target: Adobe Reader：

segment.source: Note that this is not an official standard yet, so there is currently no publicly available software that can produce this content.
segment.target: 此種標記語言尚未成為正式標準，因為目前還沒有可供大眾使用的應用程式可以製作這類內容。

segment.source: Kindle Reader for PC:
segment.target: Kindle for PC：

segment.source: NVDA can read and navigate Math in Kindle for PC for books with accessible math.
segment.target: NVDA 可以讀取和導覽 Kindle for PC 中內含可及性數學的電子書。

segment.source: When reading a document, NVDA will speak any supported mathematical content where it occurs.
segment.target: 當閱讀文件時 NVDA 會朗讀其中任何支援的數學內容，

segment.source: If you are using a braille display, it will also be displayed in braille.
segment.target: 若您正使用點顯器則數學內容也會以點字顯示。

segment.source: Interactive Navigation
segment.target: 互動式導覽

segment.source: If you are working primarily with speech, in most cases, you will probably wish to examine the expression in smaller segments, rather than hearing the entire expression at once.
segment.target: 如果您是一位以語音為主的使用者，多數情況下您應會想在較小的片段中聽取算式，而不是一次聽到整個算式。

segment.source: If you are in browse mode, you can do this by moving the cursor to the mathematical content and pressing enter.
segment.target: 如果您是在瀏覽模式，您可以將游標移到數學內容後按一下 Enter。

segment.source: If you are not in browse mode:
segment.target: 如果您並不是在瀏覽模式：

segment.source: move the review cursor to the mathematical content.
segment.target: 將檢閱游標移到數學內容的位置，

segment.source: By default, the review cursor follows the system caret, so you can usually use the system caret to move to the desired content.
segment.target: 預設情況下檢閱游標是跟隨系統游標移動，所以您通常可以利用系統游標移到數學內容的位置。

segment.source: Then, activate the following command:
segment.target: 然後執行以下的指令：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Interact with math content |NVDA+alt+m |Begins interaction with math content.
segment.target: 與數學內容互動 |NVDA+Alt+M |開始與數學內容互動

segment.source: At this point, NVDA will enter Math mode, where you can use commands such as the arrow keys to explore the expression.
segment.target: 此時 NVDA 會進入數學模式，您可以在其中使用方向鍵等指令來探索算式，

segment.source: For example, you can move through the expression with the left and right arrow keys and zoom into a portion of the expression such as a fraction using the down arrow key.
segment.target: 例如您可以使用左右方向鍵在算式內移動，並使用向下鍵進入分式以探索算式中的某一部分。

segment.source: When you wish to return to the document, simply press the escape key.
segment.target: 當您要返回文件時只需按一下 Escape 鍵即可。

segment.source: For more information on available commands and preferences for reading and navigating within math content, please refer to the documentation for your particular math component you have installed.
segment.target: 有關在數學內容中讀取和導覽的可用指令及偏好設定的更多資訊，請參考您已安裝的數學元件的文件。

segment.source: [MathCAT documentation](https://nsoiffer.github.io/MathCAT/users.html)
segment.target: [MathCAT 文件](https://nsoiffer.github.io/MathCAT/users.html)

segment.source: [Access8Math documentation](https://github.com/tsengwoody/Access8Math)
segment.target: [Access8Math 文件](https://github.com/tsengwoody/Access8Math)

segment.source: [MathPlayer documentation](https://docs.wiris.com/mathplayer/en/mathplayer-user-manual.html)
segment.target: [MathPlayer 文件](https://docs.wiris.com/mathplayer/en/mathplayer-user-manual.html)

segment.source: Sometimes mathematical content might be displayed as a button or other type of element which, when activated, can display a dialog or more information related to the formula.
segment.target: 有時數學內容可能會以按鈕或其他類型的項目顯示，啟動這些項目會顯示一個對話框或更多該公式的資訊，

segment.source: To activate the button or the element containing the formula, press ctrl+enter.
segment.target: 要啟動按鈕或含有公式的項目，按 Ctrl+Enter。

segment.source: Installing MathPlayer
segment.target: 安裝 MathPlayer

segment.source: Although it is generally recommended to use one of the newer NVDA add-ons to support math in NVDA, in certain limited scenarios MathPlayer may still be a more suitable choice.
segment.target: 雖然通常建議使用其中一種新版 NVDA 附加元件以在 NVDA 中支援數學，但在某些受限制的情境下，MathPlayer 或許仍是更合適的選擇，

segment.source: E.g. MathPlayer may support a particular language or Braille code that is unsupported in newer add-ons.
segment.target: 例如 MathPlayer 能夠支援在新版附加元件中不支援的特定語言或點字碼。

segment.source: MathPlayer is available for free from the Wiris website.
segment.target: MathPlayer 可從 Wiris 網站免費取得。

segment.source: [Download MathPlayer](https://downloads.wiris.com/mathplayer/MathPlayerSetup.exe).
segment.target: [下載 MathPlayer](https://downloads.wiris.com/mathplayer/MathPlayerSetup.exe)。

segment.source: After installing MathPlayer, you will need to restart NVDA.
segment.target: 安裝 MathPlayer 後您需要重新啟動 NVDA。

segment.source: Please note that information about MathPlayer may state that it is only for older browsers such as Internet Explorer 8.
segment.target: 附註：有關 MathPlayer 的資訊表明它僅適用於舊版的瀏覽器例如 Internet Explorer 8，

segment.source: This is only referring to using MathPlayer to display mathematical content visually, and can be ignored by those using it to read or navigate math with NVDA.
segment.target: 這指的是使用 MathPlayer 顯示視覺上的數學內容，使用它透過 NVDA 讀取或導覽數學的人可以忽略。

segment.source: Braille
segment.target: 點字

segment.source: If you own a braille display, NVDA can display information in braille.
segment.target: 如果您擁有一台點顯器，NVDA 可以以點字的形式顯示資訊，

segment.source: If your braille display has a Perkins-style keyboard, you can also enter contracted or uncontracted braille.
segment.target: 若您的點顯器有柏金斯類型的鍵盤，您也可以鍵入收縮或未收縮的點字。

segment.source: Braille can also be displayed on screen using the [Braille Viewer](#BrailleViewer) instead of, or at the same time as, using a physical braille display.
segment.target: 點字也可以不需點顯器而是使用[點字檢視器](#BrailleViewer)在畫面上顯視，或者兩者同時使用。

segment.source: Please see the [Supported Braille Displays](#SupportedBrailleDisplays) section for information about the supported braille displays.
segment.target: 請參見[支援的點顯器](#SupportedBrailleDisplays)章節以獲取支援的點顯器資訊，

segment.source: This section also contains information about what displays support NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: 此章節也包含了哪些點顯器支援 NVDA 點顯器背景自動偵測功能的資訊，

segment.source: You can configure braille using the [Braille category](#BrailleSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog.
segment.target: 您可以使用 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的[點字類別](#BrailleSettings)來設定點字。

segment.source: Control Type, State and Landmark abbreviations
segment.target: 控制項類型、狀態與地標之縮寫

segment.source: In order to fit as much information as possible on a braille display, the following abbreviations have been defined to indicate control type and state as well as landmarks.
segment.target: 為了儘可能在點顯器上呈現更多資訊，定義了以下縮寫來表示控制項類型、狀態及地標。

segment.source: Abbreviation |Control type
segment.target: 縮寫 |控制項類型

segment.source: app |application
segment.target: app |應用程式

segment.source: art |article
segment.target: art |文章

segment.source: bqt |block quote
segment.target: bqt |引述

segment.source: btn |button
segment.target: btn |按鈕

segment.source: drbtn |drop down button
segment.target: drbtn |下拉按鈕

segment.source: spnbtn |spin button
segment.target: spnbtn |調整按鈕

segment.source: splbtn |split button
segment.target: splbtn |分割按鈕

segment.source: tgbtn |toggle button
segment.target: tgbtn |切換按鈕

segment.source: cap |caption
segment.target: cap |文字描述

segment.source: cbo |combo box
segment.target: cbo |下拉式方塊

segment.source: chk |checkbox
segment.target: chk |核取方塊

segment.source: dlg |dialog
segment.target: dlg |對話框

segment.source: doc |document
segment.target: doc |文件

segment.source: edt |editable text field
segment.target: edt |編輯區

segment.source: pwdedt |password edit
segment.target: pwdedt |密碼編輯區

segment.source: embedded |embedded object
segment.target: embedded |嵌入式物件

segment.source: enote |end note
segment.target: enote |章節附註

segment.source: fig |figure
segment.target: fig |圖表

segment.source: fnote |foot note
segment.target: fnote |註腳

segment.source: gra |graphic
segment.target: gra |圖片

segment.source: grp |grouping
segment.target: grp |群組

segment.source: hN |heading at level n, e.g. h1, h2.
segment.target: hN |標題層級，例如：標題第 1 級 H1、標題第 2 級 H2。

segment.source: hlp |help balloon
segment.target: hlp |氣泡提示

segment.source: lmk |landmark
segment.target: lmk |地標

segment.source: lnk |link
segment.target: lnk |連結

segment.source: vlnk |visited link
segment.target: vlnk |到訪過的連結

segment.source: lst |list
segment.target: lst |清單

segment.source: mnu |menu
segment.target: mnu |功能表

segment.source: mnubar |menu bar
segment.target: mnubar |功能表列

segment.source: mnubtn |menu button
segment.target: mnubtn |功能表按鈕

segment.source: mnuitem |menu item
segment.target: mnuitem |功能表項目

segment.source: pnl |panel
segment.target: pnl |面板

segment.source: prgbar |progress bar
segment.target: prgbar |進度列

segment.source: bsyind |busy indicator
segment.target: bsyind |忙碌指示器

segment.source: rbtn |radio button
segment.target: rbtn |選擇鈕

segment.source: scrlbar |scroll bar
segment.target: scrlbar |捲軸

segment.source: The following state indicators are also defined:
segment.target: 還定義了以下狀態指示器：

segment.source: Abbreviation |Control state
segment.target: 縮寫 |控制項狀態

segment.source: ... |displayed when an object supports autocompletion
segment.target: ... |顯示當一個物件有支援自動完成的功能

segment.source: ⢎⣿⡱ |displayed when an object (e.g. a toggle button) is pressed
segment.target: ⢎⣿⡱ |顯示當一個物件 (例如切換按鈕) 按下

segment.source: ⢎⣀⡱ |displayed when an object (e.g. a toggle button) is not pressed
segment.target: ⢎⣀⡱ |顯示當一個物件 (例如切換按鈕) 沒按下

segment.source: ⣏⣿⣹ |displayed when an object (e.g. a checkbox) is checked
segment.target: ⣏⣿⣹ |顯示當一個物件 (例如一個核取方塊) 勾選

segment.source: ⣏⣸⣹ |displayed when an object (e.g. a checkbox) is half checked
segment.target: ⣏⣸⣹ |顯示當一個物件 (例如一個核取方塊) 部分勾選

segment.source: ⣏⣀⣹ |displayed when an object (e.g. a checkbox) is not checked
segment.target: ⣏⣀⣹ |顯示當一個物件 (例如一個核取方塊) 沒勾選

segment.source: - |displayed when an object (e.g. a tree view item) is collapsible
segment.target: - |顯示當一個物件 (例如一個樹狀檢視項目) 可折疊

segment.source: + |displayed when an object (e.g. a tree view item) is Expandable
segment.target: + |顯示當一個物件 (例如一個樹狀檢視項目) 可展開

segment.source: *** |displayed when a protected control or document is encountered
segment.target: *** |顯示當遇到一個受保護的控制項或文件

segment.source: clk |displayed when an object is clickable
segment.target: clk |顯示當一個物件可點擊

segment.source: cmnt |displayed when there is a comment for a spreadsheet cell or piece of text in a document
segment.target: cmnt |顯示當有一個註解在試算表儲存格或文件中的一段文字

segment.source: frml |displayed when there is a formula on a spreadsheet cell
segment.target: frml |顯示當試算表儲存格有公式

segment.source: invalid |displayed when an invalid entry has been made
segment.target: invalid |顯示當輸入無效時

segment.source: ldesc |displayed when an object (usually a graphic) has a long description
segment.target: ldesc |顯示當一個物件 (通常是一個圖片) 有長說明

segment.source: mln |displayed when an edit field allows typing multiple lines of text such as comment fields on websites
segment.target: mln |顯示當一個編輯區可以輸入多行 (例如網站上的註解欄位)

segment.source: req |displayed when a required form field is encountered
segment.target: req |顯示當遇到一個必要填寫的表單欄位

segment.source: ro |displayed when an object (e.g. an editable text field) is read-only
segment.target: ro |顯示當一個物件 (例如編輯區) 是唯讀的

segment.source: sel |displayed when an object is selected
segment.target: sel |顯示當一個物件已選取

segment.source: nsel |displayed when an object is not selected
segment.target: nsel |顯示當一個物件沒選取

segment.source: sorted asc |displayed when an object is sorted ascending
segment.target: sorted asc |顯示當一個物件遞增排序

segment.source: sorted desc |displayed when an object is sorted descending
segment.target: sorted desc |顯示當一個物件遞減排序

segment.source: submnu |displayed when an object has a popup (usually a sub-menu)
segment.target: submnu |顯示當一個物件有快顯 (通常是子功能表)

segment.source: Braille Input
segment.target: 點字輸入

segment.source: NVDA supports entry of both uncontracted and contracted braille via a braille keyboard.
segment.target: NVDA 支援利用點字鍵盤輸入收縮或未收縮的點字，

segment.source: You can select the translation table used to translate braille into text using the [Input table](#BrailleSettingsInputTable) setting in the Braille category of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog.
segment.target: 您可以使用 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中「點字」類別的[輸入轉譯表](#BrailleSettingsInputTable)將點字轉成文字。

segment.source: When uncontracted braille is being used, text is inserted as soon as it is entered.
segment.target: 當使用的是未收縮的點字，則一鍵入立即轉成文字插入，

segment.source: When using contracted braille, text is inserted when you press space or enter at the end of a word.
segment.target: 當使用的是收縮的點字，則在一個單字的結尾按空白鍵或 Enter 才會轉成文字插入。

segment.source: Note that translation can only reflect the braille word you are typing and cannot consider existing text.
segment.target: 附註：點字轉譯僅是反應您輸入的點字而非現有的文字，

segment.source: For example, if you are using a braille code that begins numbers with a number sign and you press backspace to move to the end of a number, you will need to type the number sign again to enter additional numbers.
segment.target: 例如您使用點字碼輸入一個帶頭有數字符號 "#" 的數字，並按 backspace 鍵移動到數字的結尾，則您需要再一次輸入數字符號才可以輸入其他數字。

segment.source: Pressing dot 7 erases the last entered braille cell or character.
segment.target: 按點字鍵 7 清除最後鍵入的點字方或字元。

segment.source: Dot 8 translates any braille input and presses the enter key.
segment.target: 按點字鍵 8 轉譯任何點字輸入並按 Enter。

segment.source: Pressing dot 7 + dot 8 translates any braille input, but without adding a space or pressing enter.
segment.target: 按點字鍵 7 與 8 轉譯任何點字的輸入，但沒有加空格或按 Enter。

segment.source: Inputting keyboard shortcuts
segment.target: 輸入鍵盤快速鍵

segment.source: NVDA supports inputting keyboard shortcuts and emulating keypresses using the braille display.
segment.target: NVDA 支援使用點顯器來輸入鍵盤快速鍵與模擬按下鍵盤按鍵，

segment.source: This emulation comes in two forms: assigning a Braille input directly to some key press and using the virtual modifier keys.
segment.target: 這種模擬有兩種形式：直接指派一個點字輸入至某些按鍵，以及使用虛擬組合鍵。

segment.source: Commonly-used keys, such as the arrow keys or pressing Alt to reach menus, can be mapped directly to Braille inputs.
segment.target: 經常使用到的按鍵例如方向鍵或按 Alt 移到功能表列，可以直接對應到點字輸入，

segment.source: The driver for each Braille display comes pre-equipped with some of these assignments.
segment.target: 每一個點顯器的驅動程式已經預設了一些這樣的指派，

segment.source: You can change these assignments or add new emulated keys from the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 您可以從[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)中更改這些指派或加入新的模擬按鍵。

segment.source: While this approach is useful for commonly-pressed or unique keys (such as Tab), you may not want to assign a unique set of keys to each keyboard shortcut.
segment.target: 雖然這種方法對於常按或單一的按鍵 (如 Tab) 很實用，但您可能不想要為每一個鍵盤快速鍵都指派一個按鍵組合，

segment.source: To allow emulating keypresses where modifier keys are held down, NVDA provides commands to toggle the control, alt, shift, windows, and NVDA keys, along with commands for some combinations of those keys.
segment.target: 要模擬按下需要按住組合鍵的按鍵，NVDA 提供了切換 Ctrl、Alt、Shift、Windows 與 NVDA 鍵等的指令，以及一些組合了前述按鍵的指令。

segment.source: To use these toggles, first press the command (or sequence of commands) for the modifier keys you want pressed.
segment.target: 要使用這些切換指令，首先按下您想要按的組合鍵所對應的指令 (或一系列指令)，

segment.source: Then input the character that's part of the keyboard shortcut you want to input.
segment.target: 接著按下您想要按的快速鍵中其餘的字母，

segment.source: For example, to produce control+f, use the "Toggle control key" command and then type an f,
segment.target: 例如要完成 Ctrl+F，先使用「切換 Ctrl 鍵」的指令，接著再鍵入一個 f，

segment.source: and to input control+alt+t, use either the "Toggle control key" and "Toggle alt key" commands, in either order, or the "Toggle control and alt keys" command, followed by typing a t.
segment.target: 要輸入 Ctrl+Alt+T，先後使用「切換 Ctrl 鍵」及「切換 Alt 鍵」的指令 (沒有順序)，或使用「切換 Ctrl 與 Alt 鍵」的指令，然後鍵入一個 t。

segment.source: If you accidentally toggle modifier keys, running the toggle command again will remove the modifier.
segment.target: 如果您不小心切換了組合鍵，再執行一次該切換指令可以移除該組合鍵。

segment.source: When typing in contracted Braille, using the modifier toggle keys will cause your input to be translated just as if you had pressed dots 7+8.
segment.target: 當鍵入收縮的點字時，使用組合鍵切換指令會將您的輸入視為按下了第七和第八點，

segment.source: In addition, the emulated keypress cannot reflect Braille typed before the modifier key was pressed.
segment.target: 另外模擬按鍵對於在組合鍵之前所按下的點字不會有反應，

segment.source: This means that, to type alt+2 with a Braille code that uses a number sign, you must first toggle Alt and then type a number sign.
segment.target: 這表示按下 Alt+2 且需要數字符號 "#" 的點字碼，您必須先切換 Alt，再輸入數字符號 "#"。

segment.source: Vision
segment.target: 視覺

segment.source: While NVDA is primarily aimed at blind or vision impaired people who primarily use speech and/or braille to operate a computer, it also provides built-in facilities to change the contents of the screen.
segment.target: 雖然 NVDA 主要是針對全盲或視覺障礙的人以語音或點字的方式來操作電腦，但也內建了更改畫面內容顯示的功能，

segment.source: Within NVDA, such a visual aid is called a vision enhancement provider.
segment.target: 在 NVDA 中這些視覺輔助工具被稱為「視覺加強器」。

segment.source: NVDA offers several built-in vision enhancement providers which are described below.
segment.target: NVDA 提供了幾個內建視覺加強器在後面有相關說明，

segment.source: Additional vision enhancement providers can be provided in [NVDA add-ons](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 額外的視覺加強器可以由 [NVDA 附加元件](#AddonsManager)提供。

segment.source: NVDA's vision settings can be changed in the [vision category](#VisionSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog.
segment.target: NVDA 的視覺相關設定可以從 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的[視覺類別](#VisionSettings)進行變更。

segment.source: Visual Highlight
segment.target: 視覺醒目提示

segment.source: Visual Highlight can help to identify the [system focus](#SystemFocus), [navigator object](#ObjectNavigation) and [browse mode](#BrowseMode) positions.
segment.target: 「視覺醒目提示」可以協助識別畫面上的[系統焦點](#SystemFocus)、[導覽物件](#ObjectNavigation)及[瀏覽模式](#BrowseMode)的位置，

segment.source: These positions are highlighted with a coloured rectangle outline.
segment.target: 這些位置使用一個帶有顏色的長方形外框突顯出來。

segment.source: Solid blue highlights a combined navigator object and system focus location (e.g. because [the navigator object follows the system focus](#ReviewCursorFollowFocus)).
segment.target: 藍色實線代表系統焦點結合導覽物件同在的位置 (例如因為[導覽物件跟隨系統焦點](#ReviewCursorFollowFocus)的關係)

segment.source: Dashed blue highlights just the system focus object.
segment.target: 藍色虛線僅代表系統焦點的位置。

segment.source: Solid pink highlights just the navigator object.
segment.target: 粉紅色實線僅代表導覽物件的位置

segment.source: Solid yellow highlights the virtual caret used in browse mode (where there is no physical caret such as in web browsers).
segment.target: 黃色實線代表瀏覽模式的虛擬游標位置 (沒有實際游標的情況例如在瀏覽器中)

segment.source: When Visual Highlight is enabled in the [vision category](#VisionSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog, you can [change whether or not to highlight the focus, navigator object or browse mode caret](#VisionSettingsFocusHighlight).
segment.target: 當在 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的[視覺類別](#VisionSettings)啟用了視覺醒目提示，您便可以[更改是否醒目提示焦點、導覽物件或瀏覽模式游標](#VisionSettingsFocusHighlight)。

segment.source: Screen Curtain
segment.target: 螢幕簾幕

segment.source: As a blind or vision impaired user, it is often not possible or necessary to see the contents of the screen.
segment.target: 對於全盲或視覺障礙的使用者，通常不可能或不需要觀看畫面上的內容，

segment.source: Furthermore, it might be hard to ensure that there isn't someone looking over your shoulder.
segment.target: 此外很難確保沒有人在背後看著您的螢幕，

segment.source: For this situation, NVDA contains a feature called "Screen Curtain" which can be enabled to make the screen black.
segment.target: 針對這樣的情形，NVDA 提供了一個名為「螢幕簾幕」的功能，啟用後可以使螢幕全黑。

segment.source: You can enable the Screen Curtain in the [vision category](#VisionSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog.
segment.target: 您可以在 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框的[視覺類別](#VisionSettings)中啟用螢幕簾幕。

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Toggles the state of the screen curtain |`NVDA+control+escape` |Enable to make the screen black or disable to show the contents of the screen. Pressed once, screen curtain is enabled until you restart NVDA. Pressed twice, screen curtain is enabled until you disable it.
segment.target: 切換螢幕簾幕的狀態 |NVDA+Ctrl+Esc |啟用使螢幕全黑或停用以顯示螢幕內容。按一下啟用螢幕簾幕直到您重新啟動 NVDA，連按兩下啟用螢幕簾幕直到您將其停用。

segment.source: When the Screen Curtain is active some tasks directly based on what appears on the screen such as performing [OCR](#Win10Ocr) or taking a screenshot cannot be achieved.
segment.target: 當螢幕簾幕運作時一些直接基於螢幕上顯示的工作例如執行 [OCR](#Win10Ocr) 或螢幕截圖將無法做到。

segment.source: Due to a change in the Windows Magnification API, Screen Curtain had to be updated to support the newest versions of Windows.
segment.target: 由於 Windows 放大 API 的變更，螢幕簾幕亦需要更新才能支援最新版的 Windows。

segment.source: Use NVDA 2021.2 to activate Screen Curtain with Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) or later.
segment.target: 使用 NVDA 2021.2 搭配 Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) 或以上版本要啟用螢幕簾幕，

segment.source: For security purposes, when using a new version of Windows, get visual confirmation that the Screen Curtain makes the screen entirely black.
segment.target: 為了保險起見，當使用新版的 Windows 時請在視覺上確認螢幕簾幕功能有讓整個螢幕全黑。

segment.source: Please note that while Windows Magnifier is running and inverted screen colors are being used, the screen curtain cannot be enabled.
segment.target: 請注意，當啟用 Windows 放大鏡並使用螢幕色彩對換時無法啟用螢幕簾幕。

segment.source: Content Recognition
segment.target: 內容辨識

segment.source: When authors don't provide sufficient information for a screen reader user to determine the content of something, various tools can be used to attempt to recognize the content from an image.
segment.target: 當作者沒有為螢幕助讀程式的使用者提供足夠資訊以確認其內容，可以使用各種工具來嘗試從圖像中辨識內容。

segment.source: NVDA supports the optical character recognition (OCR) functionality built into Windows 10 and later to recognize text from images.
segment.target: NVDA 支援 Windows 10 以上內建的光學字元辨識 (OCR) 功能，以便將圖像辨識成為文字，

segment.source: Additional content recognizers can be provided in NVDA add-ons.
segment.target: NVDA 的某些附加元件也有提供額外的內容辨識功能。

segment.source: When you use a content recognition command, NVDA recognizes content from the current [navigator object](#ObjectNavigation).
segment.target: 當您使用內容辨識指令時，NVDA 會從目前的[導覽物件](#ObjectNavigation)辨識內容。

segment.source: By default, the navigator object follows the system focus or browse mode cursor, so you can usually just move the focus or browse mode cursor where desired.
segment.target: 預設情況下導覽物件會跟隨系統焦點或瀏覽模式游標，因此通常您只需移動焦點或瀏覽模式游標即可，

segment.source: For example, if you move the browse mode cursor to a graphic, recognition will recognize content from the graphic by default.
segment.target: 例如將瀏覽模式游標移動到一個圖片上，啟動辨識預設將會從圖片辨識內容，

segment.source: However, you may wish to use object navigation directly to, for example, recognize the content of an entire application window.
segment.target: 不過您不妨直接使用物件導覽的方式來操作，例如辨識一整個應用程式視窗的內容。

segment.source: Once recognition is complete, the result will be presented in a document similar to browse mode, allowing you to read the information with cursor keys, etc.
segment.target: 辨識完成後的結果將呈現在一個類似使用瀏覽模式導覽的文件中，您可使用方向鍵來閱讀資訊，

segment.source: Pressing enter or space will activate (normally click) the text at the cursor if possible.
segment.target: 如果可能的話，在游標所在的文字上按 enter 或空白鍵會啟動一般點擊的操作，

segment.source: Pressing escape dismisses the recognition result.
segment.target: 按 escape 鍵可關閉辨識結果。

segment.source: Windows OCR
segment.target: Windows OCR

segment.source: Windows 10 and later includes OCR for many languages.
segment.target: Windows 10 以上具有多種語言的 OCR 功能，

segment.source: NVDA can use this to recognize text from images or inaccessible applications.
segment.target: NVDA 可利用這個功能從圖像或某些不可及的應用程式來辨識出文字。
