segment.source: Other benefits of unicode normalization are explained in greater detail in the [section for the equivalent speech setting](#SpeechUnicodeNormalization).
segment.target: 在[等價語音設定一節](#SpeechUnicodeNormalization)中更詳細地解釋了 unicode 正規化的其他效益。

segment.source: To toggle Unicode normalization from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方切換 Unicode 正規化，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢。

segment.source: Options |Default (Disabled), Enabled, Disabled
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (停用)、啟用、停用

segment.source: Default |Disabled
segment.target: 預設 |停用

segment.source: Interrupt speech while scrolling
segment.target: 捲動時中斷語音

segment.source: This setting determines if speech should be interrupted when the Braille display is scrolled backwards/forwards.
segment.target: 此設定決定當點顯器向上或向下捲動時是否應中斷語音，

segment.source: Previous/next line commands always interrupt speech.
segment.target: 點字游標移到上一行或下一行的指令則始終會中斷語音。

segment.source: On-going speech might be a distraction while reading Braille.
segment.target: 摸讀點字時持續的語音可能會使人分心，

segment.source: For this reason the option is enabled by default, interrupting speech when scrolling braille.
segment.target: 因此此選項預設啟用，當捲動點顯器時就會中斷語音。

segment.source: Disabling this option allows speech to be heard while simultaneously reading Braille.
segment.target: 停用此選項允許在摸讀點字的同時聽到語音。

segment.source: Options |Default (Enabled), Enabled, Disabled
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (啟用)、啟用、停用

segment.source: Default |Enabled
segment.target: 預設 |啟用

segment.source: Select Braille Display
segment.target: 選擇點顯器

segment.source: Open Select Braille Display dialog
segment.target: 開啟選擇點顯器對話框

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+a`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+A`

segment.source: The Select Braille Display dialog, which can be opened by activating the Change... button in the Braille category of the NVDA settings dialog, allows you to select which Braille display NVDA should use for braille output.
segment.target: 「選擇點顯器」對話框可以從 NVDA 設定對話框中「點字」類別的「變更...」按鈕來開啟，允許您選擇 NVDA 應該使用何種點顯器來輸出點字。

segment.source: Once you have selected your braille display of choice, you can press Ok and NVDA will load the selected display.
segment.target: 當您選擇了點顯器並按「確認」按鈕，NVDA 將載入選定的點顯器，

segment.source: If there is an error loading the display driver, NVDA will notify you with a message, and continue using the previous display, if any.
segment.target: 若載入點顯器驅動程式時發生錯誤，NVDA 將會顯示錯誤訊息，並繼續使用先前的點顯器 (如果有的話)。

segment.source: Braille Display
segment.target: 點字顯示器

segment.source: This combo box presents you with several options depending on what braille display drivers are available on your system.
segment.target: 此下拉式方塊會根據電腦上可用的點顯器驅動程式的不同而呈現出不同的選項，

segment.source: Move between these options with the arrow keys.
segment.target: 您可使用方向鍵在選項中移動以選擇所要的項目。

segment.source: The automatic option will allow NVDA to search for many supported braille displays in the background.
segment.target: 「自動偵測」選項將允許 NVDA 在背景自動搜尋許多支援的點顯器，

segment.source: When this feature is enabled and you connect a supported display using USB or bluetooth, NVDA will automatically connect with this display.
segment.target: 當啟用此功能，您可以使用 USB 或藍牙來連接支援的點顯器，NVDA 會自動偵測並連接點顯器。

segment.source: No braille means that you are not using braille.
segment.target: 「不使用點顯器」表示您沒使用點顯器。

segment.source: Please see the [Supported Braille Displays](#SupportedBrailleDisplays) section for more information about supported braille displays and which of these support automatic detection in the background.
segment.target: 要得到更多相關資訊以了解可支援的點顯器以及哪些點顯器可支援背景自動偵測功能等，請參見[支援的點顯器](#SupportedBrailleDisplays)章節。

segment.source: Displays to detect automatically
segment.target: 點顯器自動偵測

segment.source: When braille display is set to "Automatic", the check boxes in this list control allows you to enable and disable display drivers that will be involved in the automatic detection process.
segment.target: 當點字顯示器設定為「自動偵測」，此清單中的核取方塊可讓您啟用和停用自動偵測過程中包含的點顯器驅動程式，

segment.source: This allows you to exclude braille display drivers you do not use on a regular basis.
segment.target: 這允許您排除不常使用的點顯器驅動程式。

segment.source: For example, if you only own a display that requires the Baum driver to function, you may leave the Baum driver enabled whereas the other drivers can be disabled.
segment.target: 例如，如果您只擁有一個需要 Baum 驅動程式才能運作的點顯器，則可以啟用 Baum 驅動程式並停用其他的驅動程式。

segment.source: By default, all drivers that support automatic detection are enabled.
segment.target: 預設情況下所有支援自動偵測的驅動程式皆會啟用，

segment.source: Any driver added, for example in a future version of NVDA or in an add-on, will also be enabled by default.
segment.target: 新增的任何驅動程式 (例如在未來 NVDA 版本或附加元件中) 也將預設為啟用。

segment.source: You may consult the documentation for your braille display in the section [Supported Braille Displays](#SupportedBrailleDisplays) to check whether the driver supports automatic detection of displays.
segment.target: 您可以在[支援的點顯器](#SupportedBrailleDisplays)章節查閱點顯器的文件，檢查驅動程式是否支援點顯器自動偵測。

segment.source: Port
segment.target: 連接埠

segment.source: This option, if available, allows you to choose what port or type of connection will be used to communicate with the braille display you have selected.
segment.target: 當此選項可使用時，您可選擇連接埠或連接形式來與您所選的點顯器溝通，

segment.source: It is a combo box containing the possible choices for your braille display.
segment.target: 此為一個下拉式方塊，包含針對您所使用點顯器的可能選用方式。

segment.source: By default, NVDA employs automatic port detection, which means the connection with the braille device will be established automatically by scanning for available USB and bluetooth devices on your system.
segment.target: 預設情況下 NVDA 採用自動連接埠偵測功能，意即會掃描電腦上的 USB 或藍牙裝置以自動建立與點顯器的連接，

segment.source: However, for some braille displays, you may be able to explicitly choose what port should be used.
segment.target: 然而針對某些點顯器您或許可明確地選擇相對應的連接埠，

segment.source: Common options are "Automatic" (which tells NVDA to employ the default automatic port selection procedure), "USB", "Bluetooth" and legacy serial communication ports if your braille display supports this type of communication.
segment.target: 常見的選項是「自動」 (告訴 NVDA 採用預設的自動連接埠選擇程序)、「USB」、「藍芽」以及傳統串列埠 (若您的點顯器有支援此種通訊協定)。

segment.source: This option won't be available if your braille display only supports automatic port detection.
segment.target: 若您的點顯器只支援自動連接埠偵測功能，此連接埠選項就無法使用。

segment.source: You may consult the documentation for your braille display in the section [Supported Braille Displays](#SupportedBrailleDisplays) to check for more details on the supported types of communication and available ports.
segment.target: 您可以在[支援的點顯器](#SupportedBrailleDisplays)章節查閱相關點顯器的說明，確認支援的通訊協定及可用連接埠的更多細節。

segment.source: Please note: If you connect multiple Braille Displays to your machine at the same time which use the same driver (E.g. connecting two Seika displays),
segment.target: 請注意：若您同時用相同的驅動程式連接多台點顯器 (例如連接兩台 Seika 點顯器)，

segment.source: it is currently impossible to tell NVDA which display to use.
segment.target: 目前並無法告訴 NVDA 要使用哪一台點顯器來顯示，

segment.source: Therefore it is recommended to only connect one Braille Display of a given type / manufacturer to your machine at a time.
segment.target: 因此建議一次只連接一個機型/製造商的點顯器。

segment.source: Audio
segment.target: 音訊

segment.source: Open Audio settings
segment.target: 開啟音訊設定對話框

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+u`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+U`

segment.source: The Audio category in the NVDA Settings dialog contains options that let you change several aspects of audio output.
segment.target: NVDA 設定對話框中的音訊類別包含可讓您變更音訊輸出各方面的選項。

segment.source: Output device
segment.target: 輸出裝置

segment.source: This option allows you to choose the audio device that NVDA should instruct the selected synthesizer to speak through.
segment.target: 此選項可以讓您選擇 NVDA 合成器的語音要輸出到哪一個音訊裝置。

segment.source: Audio Ducking Mode
segment.target: 自動音量調整模式

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+shift+d`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Shift+D`

segment.source: This option allows you to choose if NVDA should lower the volume of other applications while NVDA is speaking, or all the time while NVDA is running.
segment.target: 此選項允許您選擇是否當 NVDA 正在朗讀時降低其他應用程式的音量，或是當 NVDA 執行時始終降低其他應用程式的音量。

segment.source: No Ducking: NVDA will never lower the volume of other audio.
segment.target: 沒有自動音量調整：NVDA 將永不降低其他音訊的音量。

segment.source: Duck when outputting speech and sounds: NVDA will only lower the volume of other audio when NVDA is speaking or playing sounds. This may not work for all synthesizers.
segment.target: 當有輸出語音或音效時開啟自動音量調整：僅有當 NVDA 正在朗讀或播放音效時才降低其他音訊的音量，這可能不適用於所有合成器。

segment.source: Always duck: NVDA will keep the volume of other audio lower the whole time NVDA is running.
segment.target: 總是開啟自動音量調整：當 NVDA 執行時始終降低其他音訊的音量。

segment.source: This option is only available if NVDA has been installed.
segment.target: 此選項只有 NVDA 的安裝版本才有，

segment.source: It is not possible to support audio ducking for portable and temporary copies of NVDA.
segment.target: NVDA 的可攜式及暫時性版本並不支援自動音量調整的功能。

segment.source: Volume of NVDA sounds follows voice volume
segment.target: NVDA 音效音量跟隨語音音量

segment.source: Options |Disabled, Enabled
segment.target: 選項 |停用、啟用

segment.source: Default |Disabled
segment.target: 預設 |停用

segment.source: When this option is enabled, the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps will follow the volume setting of the voice you are using.
segment.target: 當啟用此選項，NVDA 音效和嗶嗶聲的音量將跟隨您正在使用語音的音量設定，

segment.source: If you decrease the volume of the voice, the volume of sounds will decrease.
segment.target: 如果您降低語音的音量，音效的音量也會降低；

segment.source: Similarly, if you increase the volume of the voice, the volume of sounds will increase.
segment.target: 同樣地，如果您增加語音的音量，音效的音量也會增加，

segment.source: This option is not available if you have started NVDA with [WASAPI disabled for audio output](#WASAPI) in Advanced Settings.
segment.target: 如果您在進階設定中[停用 WASAPI 作為音訊輸出](#WASAPI)的情況下啟動 NVDA 則此選項不可用。

segment.source: Volume of NVDA sounds
segment.target: NVDA 音效音量

segment.source: This slider allows you to set the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps.
segment.target: 此滑桿允許您設定 NVDA 音效和嗶嗶聲的音量，

segment.source: This setting only takes effect when "Volume of NVDA sounds follows voice volume" is disabled.
segment.target: 只有在停用「NVDA 音效音量跟隨語音音量」時此設定才會生效，

segment.source: This option is not available if you have started NVDA with [WASAPI disabled for audio output](#WASAPI) in Advanced Settings.
segment.target: 如果您在進階設定中[停用 WASAPI 作為音訊輸出](#WASAPI)的情況下啟動 NVDA 則此選項不可用。

segment.source: Sound split
segment.target: 聲音分割

segment.source: The sound split feature allows users to make use of their stereo output devices, such as headphones and speakers.
segment.target: 聲音分割功能允許使用者使用立體聲輸出裝置 (例如耳機和喇叭)。

segment.source: Sound split makes it possible to have NVDA speech in one channel (e.g. left) and have all other applications play their sounds in the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: 聲音分割使得可以在一個聲道 (例如左聲道) 播放 NVDA 語音，並讓所有其他應用程式在其他聲道 (例如右聲道) 播放聲音。

segment.source: By default sound split is disabled.
segment.target: 聲音分割預設停用，

segment.source: A gesture allows cycling through the various sound split modes:
segment.target: 有一個手勢可在各種聲音分割模式之間循環切換：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Cycle Sound Split Mode |`NVDA+alt+s` |Cycles between sound split modes.
segment.target: 循環切換聲音分割模式 |NVDA+Alt+S |在聲音分割模式之間循環切換

segment.source: By default this command will cycle between the following modes:
segment.target: 預設情況下此指令會在以下模式之間循環切換：

segment.source: Sound split disabled: NVDA does not apply any sound split processing.
segment.target: 聲音分割已停用：NVDA 不處理任何聲音分割。

segment.source: NVDA on the left and applications on the right: NVDA will speak in the left channel, while other applications will play sounds in the right channel.
segment.target: NVDA 在左，應用程式在右：NVDA 將在左聲道說話，而其他應用程式將在右聲道播放聲音。

segment.source: NVDA on the left and applications in both channels: NVDA will speak in the left channel, while other applications will play sounds in both left and right channels.
segment.target: NVDA 在左，應用程式在雙聲道：NVDA 將在左聲道說話，而其他應用程式將在左聲道與右聲道播放聲音。

segment.source: There are more advanced sound split modes available in NVDA setting combo box.
segment.target: NVDA 音訊設定中的下拉式方塊提供了更進階的聲音分割模式，

segment.source: Among these modes, "NVDA in both channels and applications in both channels" forces all the sounds to be directed in both channels.
segment.target: 在這些模式中，「NVDA 在雙聲道，應用程式在雙聲道」強制所有聲音都在兩個聲道輸出，

segment.source: This mode may differ from "Sound split disabled" mode in case other audio processing interfers with channel volumes.
segment.target: 此模式與「聲音分割已停用」模式不同，以防止其他音訊處理幹擾聲道音量。

segment.source: Please note, that sound split doesn't work as a mixer.
segment.target: 請注意，聲音分割不能當作混音器使用，

segment.source: For example, if an application is playing a stereo sound track while sound split is set to "NVDA on the left and applications on the right", then you will only hear the right channel of the sound track, while the left channel of the sound track will be muted.
segment.target: 例如：如果應用程式正在播放立體聲音軌，而聲音分割設定為「NVDA 在左，應用程式在右」，那麼您就只能聽到音軌的右聲道，而音軌的左聲道會被靜音。

segment.source: This option is not available if you have started NVDA with [WASAPI disabled for audio output](#WASAPI) in Advanced Settings.
segment.target: 如果您已在「進階設定」中[停用 WASAPI 作為音訊輸出](#WASAPI)的情況下啟動 NVDA，則此選項不可用。

segment.source: Please note, that if NVDA crashes, then it won't be able to restore application sounds volume, and those applications might still output sound only in one channel after NVDA crash.
segment.target: 請注意，如果 NVDA 崩潰則將無法恢復應用程式的音量，且這些應用程式在 NVDA 崩潰後可能仍僅在一個聲道輸出聲音，

segment.source: In order to mitigate this, please restart NVDA and select the mode "NVDA in both channels and applications in both channels".
segment.target: 為了緩解這種情況，請重新啟動 NVDA 並選擇「NVDA 在雙聲道，應用程式在雙聲道」模式。

segment.source: Customizing Sound split modes
segment.target: 自訂聲音分割模式

segment.source: This checkable list allows selecting which sound split modes are included when cycling between them using `NVDA+alt+s`.
segment.target: 此可核取清單允許選擇當使用 NVDA+Alt+S 在聲音分割模式之間循環切換時應包含哪些聲音分割模式，

segment.source: Modes which are unchecked are excluded.
segment.target: 未勾選的模式會被排除，

segment.source: By default only three modes are included.
segment.target: 預設僅包含三種模式。

segment.source: Sound split disabled.
segment.target: 聲音分割已停用

segment.source: NVDA on the left and applications on the right.
segment.target: NVDA 在左，應用程式在右

segment.source: NVDA on the left and applications in both channels.
segment.target: NVDA 在左，應用程式在雙聲道

segment.source: Note that it is necessary to check at least one mode.
segment.target: 附註：必須勾選至少一種模式。

segment.source: This option is not available if you have started NVDA with [WASAPI disabled for audio output](#WASAPI) in Advanced Settings.
segment.target: 如果您已在「進階設定」中[停用 WASAPI 作為音訊輸出](#WASAPI)的情況下啟動 NVDA，則此選項不可用。

segment.source: Time to keep audio device awake after speech
segment.target: 語音結束後保持音訊裝置喚醒的時間

segment.source: This edit box specifies how long NVDA keeps the audio device awake after speech ends.
segment.target: 此編輯區指定 NVDA 在語音結束後使音訊裝置保持喚醒狀態的時間，

segment.source: This allows NVDA to avoid certain speech glitches like dropped parts of words.
segment.target: 可使 NVDA 避免某些語音故障，例如遺失部分單字，

segment.source: This can happen due to audio devices (especially Bluetooth and wireless devices) entering standby mode.
segment.target: 這可能是由於音訊裝置 (尤其是藍牙和無線裝置) 進入待機模式而發生的。

segment.source: This might also be helpful in other use cases, such as when running NVDA inside a virtual machine (e.g. Citrix Virtual Desktop), or on certain laptops.
segment.target: 這在其他情況中也會有所幫助，例如在虛擬機器 (例如 Citrix Virtual Desktop) 或在某些筆記型電腦上執行 NVDA 時。

segment.source: Lower values may allow audio to be cut-off more often, as a device may enter standby mode too soon, causing the start of the following speech to be clipped.
segment.target: 較低的數值可能會導致音訊更頻繁地被切斷，因為裝置可能會過早進入待機模式，導致後續語音的開頭被截斷，

segment.source: Setting the value too high may cause the battery of the sound output device to discharge faster, as it stays active for longer while no sound is being sent.
segment.target: 將數值設定得太高可能會導致聲音輸出裝置的電池耗電更快，因為它在不發送聲音時保持活動狀態的時間更長。

segment.source: You can set the time to zero in order to disable this feature.
segment.target: 您可以將時間設為 0 以停用此功能。

segment.source: Vision
segment.target: 視覺

segment.source: The Vision category in the NVDA Settings dialog allows you to enable, disable and configure [visual aids](#Vision).
segment.target: 在 NVDA 設定對話框中的「視覺」類別，允許您啟用、停用或設定各項[視覺輔助工具](#Vision)。

segment.source: Note that the available options in this category could be extended by [NVDA add-ons](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 某些 [NVDA 附加元件](#AddonsManager)可以擴充此類別的可用選項，

segment.source: By default, this settings category contains the following options:
segment.target: 預設情況下此設定類別包含以下選項：

segment.source: Visual Highlight
segment.target: 視覺醒目提示

segment.source: The check boxes in the Visual Highlight grouping control the behaviour of NVDA's built-in [Visual Highlight](#VisionFocusHighlight) facility.
segment.target: 在「視覺醒目提示」群組中的核取方塊用來控制 NVDA 內建的[視覺醒目提示](#VisionFocusHighlight)工具的行為。

segment.source: Enable Highlighting: Toggles Visual Highlight on and off.
segment.target: 啟用醒目提示：切換視覺醒目提示的開關

segment.source: Highlight system focus: toggles whether the [system focus](#SystemFocus) will be highlighted.
segment.target: 醒目提示系統焦點：切換是否讓[系統焦點](#SystemFocus)的位置被標示出來。

segment.source: Highlight navigator object: toggles whether the [navigator object](#ObjectNavigation) will be highlighted.
segment.target: 醒目提示導覽物件：切換是否讓[導覽物件](#ObjectNavigation)的位置被標示出來。

segment.source: Highlight browse mode cursor: Toggles whether the [virtual browse mode cursor](#BrowseMode) will be highlighted.
segment.target: 醒目提示瀏覽模式游標：切換是否讓[瀏覽模式中的虛擬游標](#BrowseMode)的位置被標示出來。

segment.source: Note that checking and unchecking the "Enable Highlighting" check box wil also change the state of the tree other check boxes accordingly.
segment.target: 注意當勾選或取消勾選「啟用醒目提示」核取方塊也會相對的改變另外三個核取方塊的狀態，

segment.source: Therefore, if "Enable Highlighting" is off and you check this check box, the other tree check boxes will also be checked automatically.
segment.target: 因此當「啟用醒目提示」核取方塊沒勾選而您將它勾選後其他三個核取方塊也會自動被勾選，

segment.source: If you only want to highlight the focus and leave the navigator object and browse mode check boxes unchecked, the state of the "Enable Highlighting" check box will be half checked.
segment.target: 若您只要醒目提示系統焦點，導覽物件和瀏覽模式游標核取方塊取消勾選，「啟用醒目提示」核取方塊的狀態會變成部分勾選。

segment.source: Screen Curtain
segment.target: 螢幕簾幕

segment.source: You can enable the [Screen Curtain](#VisionScreenCurtain) by checking the "Make screen black (immediate effect)" check box.
segment.target: 您可以勾選「使螢幕全黑 (立即生效)」核取方塊來啟用[螢幕簾幕](#VisionScreenCurtain)，

segment.source: A warning that your screen will become black after activation will be displayed.
segment.target: 此時會出現一個警告訊息，表示螢幕畫面將在啟用後變成全黑。

segment.source: Before continuing (selecting "Yes"), ensure you have enabled speech / braille and will be able to control your computer without the use of the screen.
segment.target: 在選擇「是」以繼續之前請確定您已啟用語音或點字，且在不使用螢幕的情況下仍可以控制電腦，

segment.source: Select "No" if you no longer wish to enable the Screen Curtain.
segment.target: 不打算使用螢幕簾幕則選擇「否」，

segment.source: If you are sure, you can choose the Yes button to enable the screen curtain.
segment.target: 若已確定就可以選擇「是」按鈕來啟用螢幕簾幕。

segment.source: If you no longer want to see this warning message every time, you can change this behaviour in the dialog that displays the message.
segment.target: 如果您不想每次都看到這個警告訊息，可以在顯示訊息的對話框中變更此行為，

segment.source: You can always restore the warning by checking the "Always show a warning when loading Screen Curtain" check box next to the "Make screen black" check box.
segment.target: 您也可以隨時將此警告訊息還原，只要勾選「使螢幕全黑」旁邊的「啟用螢幕簾幕時總是顯示警告」核取方塊即可。

segment.source: By default, sounds are played when the Screen Curtain is toggled.
segment.target: 預設情況下當切換螢幕簾幕時會播放音效，

segment.source: When you want to change this behaviour, you can uncheck the "Play sound when toggling Screen Curtain" check box.
segment.target: 若您想要更改此行為，可以取消勾選「切換螢幕簾幕時播放音效」核取方塊。

segment.source: Settings for third party visual aids
segment.target: 第三方視覺輔助工具的設定

segment.source: Additional vision enhancement providers can be provided in [NVDA add-ons](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 額外的視覺加強器可以由 [NVDA 附加元件](#AddonsManager)提供，

segment.source: When these providers have adjustable settings, they will be shown in this settings category in separate groupings.
segment.target: 當這些加強器有可調整的設定時，他們將顯示在此設定類別的單獨群組中，

segment.source: For the supported settings per provider, please refer to the documentation for that provider.
segment.target: 有關加強器支援的設定請參考加強器的說明文件。

segment.source: Keyboard
segment.target: 鍵盤

segment.source: Open Keyboard settings
segment.target: 開啟鍵盤設定

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+k`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+K`

segment.source: The Keyboard category in the NVDA Settings dialog contains options that set how NVDA behaves as you use and type on your keyboard.
segment.target: NVDA 設定對話框中的「鍵盤」類別包含一些選項用以設定當您使用鍵盤或打字時 NVDA 的行為，

segment.source: This settings category contains the following options:
segment.target: 此設定類別包括以下的選項：

segment.source: Keyboard layout
segment.target: 鍵盤配置

segment.source: This combo box lets you choose what type of keyboard layout NVDA should use. Currently the two that come with NVDA are Desktop and Laptop.
segment.target: 此下拉式方塊讓您選擇 NVDA 使用的鍵盤配置類型，目前有兩種，包括「桌上型電腦」及「筆記型電腦」。

segment.source: Select NVDA Modifier Keys
segment.target: 選擇 NVDA 鍵

segment.source: The checkboxes in this list control what keys can be used as [NVDA modifier keys](#TheNVDAModifierKey). The following keys are available to choose from:
segment.target: 此清單中的核取方塊用來控制哪些按鍵可以作為 [NVDA 鍵](#TheNVDAModifierKey)，有下列的按鍵可以選擇：

segment.source: The Caps Lock key
segment.target: Caps Lock 鍵

segment.source: The insert key on the number pad
segment.target: 數字鍵盤的 Insert 鍵 (數字鍵盤 0)

segment.source: The extended insert key (usually found above the arrow keys, near home and end)
segment.target: 主鍵盤的 Insert 鍵 (通常位於方向鍵的上方，Home 及 End 鍵附近)

segment.source: If no key is chosen as the NVDA key it may be impossible to access many NVDA commands, therefore you are required to check at least one of the modifiers.
segment.target: 如果沒有選擇任何按鍵作為 NVDA 鍵，許多 NVDA 指令將無法執行，因此您需要勾選至少一個組合鍵。

segment.source: Speak Typed Characters
segment.target: 讀出輸入字元

segment.source: Key: NVDA+2
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+2

segment.source: When enabled, NVDA will announce all characters you type on the keyboard.
segment.target: 當啟用時，NVDA 將讀出所有在鍵盤上輸入的字元。

segment.source: Speak Typed Words
segment.target: 讀出輸入單字

segment.source: Key: NVDA+3
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+3

segment.source: When enabled, NVDA will announce all words you type on the keyboard.
segment.target: 當啟用時，NVDA 將讀出所有在鍵盤上輸入的單字 (適用英文等拼音文字)。

segment.source: Speech interrupt for typed characters
segment.target: 輸入字元時中斷語音

segment.source: If on, this option will cause speech to be interrupted each time a character is typed. This is on by default.
segment.target: 如果開啟，每當語音朗讀時輸入字元將會中斷語音，此選項預設開啟。

segment.source: Speech interrupt for Enter key
segment.target: 按下 Enter 鍵時中斷語音

segment.source: If on, this option will cause speech to be interrupted each time the Enter key is pressed. This is on by default.
segment.target: 如果開啟，每當語音朗讀時按下 Enter 鍵將會中斷語音，此選項預設開啟。

segment.source: Allow skim reading in Say All
segment.target: 讀出全部時允許跳讀

segment.source: If on, certain navigation commands (such as quick navigation in browse mode or moving by line or paragraph) do not stop Say All, rather Say All jumps to the new position and continues reading.
segment.target: 如果開啟，當讀出全部時某些導覽指令 (例如瀏覽模式的單鍵導覽、逐行或逐段落移動) 並不會中斷朗讀，而是會跳至新的位置繼續往下讀出。

segment.source: Beep if Typing Lowercase Letters when Caps Lock is On
segment.target: caps lock 開時輸入小寫字母發出嗶嗶聲

segment.source: When enabled, a warning beep will be heard if a letter is typed with the shift key while Caps Lock is on.
segment.target: 當啟用時，如果 Caps Lock 為開啟狀態，按住 Shift 鍵輸入小寫字母將會聽到警告的嗶嗶聲，

segment.source: Generally, typing shifted letters with Caps Lock is unintentional and is usually due to not realizing that Caps Lock is enabled.
segment.target: 一般而言在 Caps Lock 開啟的狀態下按住 Shift 輸入小寫字母並非故意，通常是因為沒有意識到 Caps Lock 已開啟，

segment.source: Therefore, it can be quite helpful to be warned about this.
segment.target: 因此對於這個情況發出警告是很有幫助的。

segment.source: Speak Command Keys
segment.target: 讀出指令鍵

segment.source: Key: NVDA+4
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+4

segment.source: When enabled, NVDA will announce all non-character keys you type on the keyboard. This includes key combinations such as control plus another letter.
segment.target: 當啟用時，NVDA 將讀出所有在鍵盤上輸入的非字元按鍵，包括組合鍵例如 Ctrl 加上其他字母鍵。

segment.source: Play sound for spelling errors while typing
segment.target: 打字拼字錯誤時播放音效

segment.source: When enabled, a short buzzer sound will be played when a word you type contains a spelling error.
segment.target: 當啟用時，若您輸入的單字有拼字錯誤將會發出一簡短的警示音，

segment.source: This option is only available if reporting of spelling errors is enabled in NVDA's [Document Formatting Settings](#DocumentFormattingSettings), found in the NVDA Settings dialog.
segment.target: 此選項僅在當 NVDA 設定對話框中[文件格式設定](#DocumentFormattingSettings)的「拼字錯誤」有勾選時才會顯示。

segment.source: Handle keys from other applications
segment.target: 處理來自其他應用程式的按鍵

segment.source: This option allows the user to control if key presses generated by applications such as on-screen keyboards and speech recognition software should be processed by NVDA.
segment.target: 此選項允許使用者控制由應用程式例如螢幕鍵盤及語音辨識軟體所產生的按鍵動作是否憗讓 NVDA 來處理，

segment.source: This option is on by default, though certain users may wish to turn this off, such as those typing Vietnamese with the UniKey typing software as it will cause incorrect character input.
segment.target: 此選項預設是開啟的，不過某些使用者會想關掉它，例如那些利用 UniKey 輸入越南文的使用者，因為這會造成不正確的字元輸入。

segment.source: Multiple key press timeout
segment.target: 按鍵連按逾時

segment.source: Some NVDA keyboard gestures perform different actions based upon how many times the same key is pressed in rapid succession.
segment.target: 有些 NVDA 鍵盤手勢會根據快速連續按下相同按鍵的次數來執行不同的動作，

segment.source: An example of this is the "Report current character of navigator object" command.
segment.target: 「讀出目前導覽物件的檢閱游標所在字元」指令即為一個例子，

segment.source: This command reports the character if pressed once, a phonetic description of the character if pressed twice, and the numeric value of the character if pressed three times.
segment.target: 按一下此指令讀出該字元，連按兩下讀出該字元的字元說明，連按三下讀出該字元的數值。

segment.source: This option configures the timeout after which an additional press of the same key will start a new gesture, rather than being taken as a subsequent press of the first one.
segment.target: 此選項可設定一個時間，在此時間之後再次按下同一按鍵將視為新的手勢，而不是第一個手勢的後續。

segment.source: For the example command, a too short timeout will cause two presses to report the current character twice, rather than the phonetic description.
segment.target: 對於上述舉例的指令，過短的時間將導致連按兩下會讀出目前字元兩次而不是讀出字元說明。

segment.source: The default timeout is 500 ms, i.e. half a second.
segment.target: 預設逾時為 500 毫秒，也就是半秒鐘的時間，

segment.source: Increasing this timeout may be especially useful for people using sticky keys, or who have a physical disability.
segment.target: 增加此逾時對於使用相黏鍵或有肢體障礙的人來說可能特別有用。

segment.source: Mouse
segment.target: 滑鼠

segment.source: Open Mouse settings
segment.target: 開啟滑鼠設定

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+m`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+M`

segment.source: The Mouse category in the NVDA Settings dialog allows NVDA to track the mouse, play mouse coordinate beeps and sets other mouse usage options.
segment.target: 「滑鼠」類別在 NVDA 設定對話框中，允許 NVDA 跟隨滑鼠朗讀、隨滑鼠移動發出聲音和設定其他滑鼠使用選項，

segment.source: This category contains the following options:
segment.target: 此類別包括以下選項：

segment.source: Report Mouse Shape Changes
segment.target: 讀出滑鼠圖案變化

segment.source: A checkbox, that when checked means that NVDA will announce the shape of the mouse pointer each time it changes.
segment.target: 當勾選此核取方塊，每次滑鼠指標圖案改變時便會讀出，

segment.source: The mouse pointer in Windows changes shape to convey certain information such as when something is editable, or when something is loading etc.
segment.target: Windows 中滑鼠指標圖案會改變以傳達某些資訊，例如可編輯狀態或正在載入中。

segment.source: Enable mouse tracking
segment.target: 啟用跟隨滑鼠朗讀

segment.source: Key: NVDA+m
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+m

segment.source: When enabled, NVDA will announce the text currently under the mouse pointer, as you move it around the screen. This allows you to find things on the screen, by physically moving the mouse, rather than trying to find them through object navigation.
segment.target: 當啟用時，移動滑鼠 NVDA 將會讀出滑鼠指標所指的文字，這允許您藉由實際移動滑鼠來尋找螢幕上的內容而不是藉由物件導覽的方式來尋找。

segment.source: Text unit resolution
segment.target: 讀出文字範圍

segment.source: If NVDA is set to announce the text under the mouse as you move it, this option allows you to choose exactly how much text will be spoken.
segment.target: 若 NVDA 設定啟用跟隨滑鼠朗讀，此選項可讓您選擇讀出文字的確切範圍，

segment.source: The options are character, word, line and paragraph.
segment.target: 選項有字元、單字、單行及段落。

segment.source: To toggle text unit resolution from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方切換讀出文字範圍，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢。

segment.source: Report object when mouse enters it
segment.target: 讀出滑鼠所指物件

segment.source: If this checkbox is checked, NVDA will announce information about objects as the mouse moves inside them.
segment.target: 若勾選此核取方塊，當滑鼠移到物件時 NVDA 會讀出有關物件的資訊，

segment.source: This includes the role (type) of the object as well as states (checked/pressed), cell coordinates in tables, etc.
segment.target: 這包括物件的角色 (類型) 以及狀態 (選取/按下)、表格中的儲存格座標等。

segment.source: Note that the announcement of some object details might be dependent on how other settings are set, such as in the [object presentation](#ObjectPresentationSettings) or [Document Formatting](#DocumentFormattingSettings) categories.
segment.target: 附註：某些讀出的物件詳細資訊會取決於其他設定例如在[物件呈現](#ObjectPresentationSettings)或[文件格式](#DocumentFormattingSettings)類別中的設定。

segment.source: Play audio coordinates when mouse moves
segment.target: 滑鼠移動時播放聲音座標

segment.source: Checking this checkbox makes NVDA play beeps as the mouse moves, so that the user can work out where the mouse is in regards to the dimensions of the screen.
segment.target: 若勾選此核取方塊，NVDA 在滑鼠移動時會發出不同音調的嗶嗶聲，這樣使用者就可以了解滑鼠在螢幕上的相對位置。

segment.source: The higher the mouse is on the screen, the higher the pitch of the beeps.
segment.target: 滑鼠在螢幕上的位置愈高則音調愈高，

segment.source: The further left or right the mouse is located on the screen, the further left or right the sound will be played (assuming the user has stereo speakers or headphones).
segment.target: 若使用者有立體聲喇叭或耳機，滑鼠在螢幕上的位置愈左邊或愈右邊則聲音聽起來愈靠向左邊或愈靠向右邊。

segment.source: Brightness controls audio coordinates volume
segment.target: 螢幕亮度控制聲音座標音量

segment.source: If the "play audio coordinates when mouse moves" checkbox is checked, then checking this checkbox means that the volume of the audio coordinates beeps is controlled by how bright the screen is under the mouse.
segment.target: 若勾選「滑鼠移動時播放聲音座標」核取方塊，並且勾選此核取方塊，則聲音座標的嗶嗶聲音量由滑鼠所在的螢幕亮度所控制，

segment.source: This setting is unchecked by default.
segment.target: 此設定預設沒勾選。

segment.source: Ignore mouse input from other applications
segment.target: 忽略來自其他應用程式的滑鼠輸入

segment.source: This option allows the user to ignore mouse events (including mouse movement and button presses) generated by other applications such as TeamViewer and other remote control software.
segment.target: 此選項允許使用者忽略由其他應用程式例如 TeamViewer 或其他遠端遙控軟體產生的滑鼠動作，包括滑鼠移動和按鈕點擊等，

segment.source: This option is unchecked by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設沒勾選。

segment.source: If you check this option and you have the "Enable mouse tracking" option enabled, NVDA will not announce what is under the mouse if the mouse is moved by another application.
segment.target: 如果您勾選此選項並啟用「跟隨滑鼠朗讀」，當滑鼠被其他憗用程式移動時 NVDA 將不會讀出滑鼠所指的內容。

segment.source: Touch Interaction
segment.target: 觸控互動

segment.source: This settings category, only available on computers with touch capabilities, allows you to configure how NVDA interacts with touchscreens.
segment.target: 此設定類別只能在具有觸控螢幕功能的電腦上使用，允許您設定 NVDA 要如何與觸控螢幕互動，

segment.source: This category contains the following options:
segment.target: 此類別包含以下選項：

segment.source: Enable touch interaction support
segment.target: 啟用觸控互動支援

segment.source: This checkbox enables NVDA's touch interaction support.
segment.target: 此核取方塊可用來啟用 NVDA 的觸控互動支援，

segment.source: If enabled, you can use your fingers to navigate and interact with items on screen using a touchscreen device.
segment.target: 若啟用，您可以使用手指在觸控螢幕上導覽並與項目互動，

segment.source: If disabled, touchscreen support will be disabled as though NVDA is not running.
segment.target: 若停用，NVDA 支援觸控螢幕的功能將會關閉，如同沒有執行 NVDA 一樣，

segment.source: This setting can also be toggled using NVDA+control+alt+t.
segment.target: 此設定亦可使用快速鍵 NVDA+Ctrl+Alt+T 來切換開啟或關閉。

segment.source: Touch typing mode
segment.target: 觸控輸入模式

segment.source: This checkbox allows you to specify the method you wish to use when entering text using the touch keyboard.
segment.target: 此核取方塊允許您指定使用觸控鍵盤輸入文字時所使用的方法，

segment.source: If this checkbox is checked, when you locate a key on the touch keyboard, you can lift your finger and the selected key will be pressed.
segment.target: 若勾選此核取方塊，當在觸控鍵盤上手指移到一個按鍵位置後放開手指，所選擇的按鍵即被按下，

segment.source: If this is unchecked, you need to double-tap on the key of the touch keyboard to press the key.
segment.target: 若沒勾選此核取方塊，則需要點兩下觸控鍵盤的按鍵來按下按鍵。

segment.source: Review Cursor
segment.target: 檢閱游標

segment.source: The Review Cursor category in the NVDA Settings dialog is used to configure NVDA's review cursor behaviour.
segment.target: NVDA 設定對話框中的「檢閱游標」類別可以設定 NVDA 的檢閱游標行為，

segment.source: This category contains the following options:
segment.target: 此類別包括以下的選項：

segment.source: Follow System Focus
segment.target: 跟隨系統焦點

segment.source: Key: NVDA+7
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+7

segment.source: When enabled, The review cursor will always be placed in the same object as the current system focus whenever the focus changes.
segment.target: 啟用後，每當焦點改變時檢閱游標將始終與系統焦點位在同一個物件上。

segment.source: Follow System Caret
segment.target: 跟隨系統游標

segment.source: Key: NVDA+6
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+6

segment.source: When enabled, the review cursor will automatically be moved to the position of the System caret each time it moves.
segment.target: 啟用後，每當游標移動時檢閱游標將自動移到系統游標所在的位置。

segment.source: Follow mouse cursor
segment.target: 跟隨滑鼠游標

segment.source: When enabled, the review cursor will follow the mouse as it moves.
segment.target: 啟用後，滑鼠移動時檢閱游標將會跟隨滑鼠移動。

segment.source: Simple Review mode
segment.target: 簡易檢閱模式

segment.source: When enabled, NVDA will filter the hierarchy of objects that can be navigated to exclude objects that aren't of interest to the user; e.g. invisible objects and objects used only for layout purposes.
segment.target: 啟用後，NVDA 將過濾可導覽的物件階層架構以排除使用者不感興趣的物件，例如不可見物件及用於排版用途的物件。

segment.source: To toggle simple review mode from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方切換簡易檢閱模式，請使用[輸入手勢](#InputGestures)對話框來指派手勢。

segment.source: Object Presentation
segment.target: 物件呈現

segment.source: Open Object Presentation settings
segment.target: 開啟物件呈現設定

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+o`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+O`

segment.source: The Object Presentation category in the NVDA Settings dialog is used to set how much information NVDA will present about controls such as description, position information and so on.
segment.target: NVDA 設定對話框中的「物件呈現」類別可以設定 NVDA 將呈現多少控制項資訊，例如說明、位置資訊等，

segment.source: These options don't typically apply to browse mode.
segment.target: 這些選項通常不適用於瀏覽模式，

segment.source: These options typically apply to focus reporting and NVDA object navigation, but not reading text content e.g. browse mode.
segment.target: 這些選項通常適用於讀出焦點及 NVDA 物件導覽，但不適用於讀出文字內容 (例如瀏覽模式的網頁內容)。

segment.source: Report tooltips
segment.target: 讀出工具提示

segment.source: A checkbox that when checked tells NVDA to report tooltips as they appear.
segment.target: 若勾選此核取方塊，NVDA 會在有工具提示出現時讀出來。

segment.source: Many Windows and controls show a small message (or tooltip) when you move the mouse pointer over them, or sometimes when you move the focus to them.
segment.target: 當您將滑鼠指標或焦點移到許多 Windows 的應用程式控制項上面時，將會顯示一個小型訊息或工具提示。

segment.source: Report notifications
segment.target: 讀出通知

segment.source: This checkbox, when checked, tells NVDA to report help balloons and toast notifications as they appear.
segment.target: 若勾選此核取方塊，NVDA 會在有氣泡提示或快顯通知出現時讀出來。

segment.source: Help Balloons are like tooltips, but are usually larger in size, and are associated with system events such as a network cable being unplugged, or perhaps to alert you about Windows security issues.
segment.target: 氣泡提示類似於工具提示，但通常尺寸較大並且與 Windows 系統事件相關，例如網路線被拔除或警告 Windows 安全問題。

segment.source: Toast notifications have been introduced in Windows 10 and appear in the notification centre in the system tray, informing about several events (i.e. if an update has been downloaded, a new e-mail arrived in your inbox, etc.).
segment.target: Windows 10 引入了快顯通知，它會顯示在通知區域的行動中心中以提供一些事件的通知 (例如更新下載完成、收件匣中有新郵件等)。

segment.source: Report Object Shortcut Keys
segment.target: 讀出物件的便捷鍵

segment.source: When this checkbox is checked, NVDA will include the shortcut key that is associated with a certain object or control when it is reported.
segment.target: 若勾選此核取方塊，NVDA 會在讀出物件或控制項時連帶讀出關聯的便捷鍵，

segment.source: For example the File menu on a menu bar may have a shortcut key of alt+f.
segment.target: 例如在功能表列上的「檔案」功能表其便捷鍵是 Alt+F。

segment.source: Report object position information
segment.target: 讀出物件位置資訊

segment.source: This option lets you choose whether you wish to have an object's position (e.g. 1 of 4) reported when moving to the object with the focus or object navigation.
segment.target: 此選項讓您選擇當以焦點或物件導覽的方式移到物件時是否要讀出位置資訊，例如：4 之 1。

segment.source: Guess Object Position Information when unavailable
segment.target: 沒有物件位置資訊時猜測位置

segment.source: If reporting of object position information is turned on, this option allows NVDA to guess object position information when it is otherwise unavailable for a particular control.
segment.target: 若開啟「讀出物件位置資訊」功能，此選項允許 NVDA 在特定控制項的位置資訊不明時猜測位置資訊。

segment.source: When on, NVDA will report position information for more controls such as menus and toolbars, however this information may be slightly inaccurate.
segment.target: 開啟此選項後 NVDA 會讀出更多控制項的位置資訊，如功能表、工具列等，但此時的資訊可能較不準確。

segment.source: Report Object descriptions
segment.target: 讀出物件說明

segment.source: Uncheck this checkbox if you don't wish to have the description reported along with objects (i.e. search suggestions, reporting of whole dialog window right after the dialog opens, etc.).
segment.target: 如果不想要在讀出物件時一併讀出相關說明則不需勾選此核取方塊 (例如搜尋建議、對話框開啟後讀出整個對話框的內容等)。

segment.source: Progress bar output
segment.target: 進度列輸出

segment.source: Key: NVDA+u
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+u

segment.source: This option controls how NVDA reports progress bar updates to you.
segment.target: 此選項控制 NVDA 如何讀出進度列的更新進度，

segment.source: It has the following options:
segment.target: 包括下列選項：

segment.source: Off: Progress bars will not be reported as they change.
segment.target: 關：進度列改變時不讀出來。

segment.source: Speak: This option tells NVDA to speak the progress bar in percentages. Each time the progress bar changes, NVDA will speak the new value.
segment.target: 讀出百分比：每當進度列有改變時讀出進度百分比。

segment.source: Beep: This tells NVDA to beep each time the progress bar changes. The higher the beep, the closer the progress bar is to completion.
segment.target: 發出嗶嗶聲：每當進度列有改變時發出嗶嗶聲，音調愈高愈接近完成。

segment.source: Beep and speak: This option tells NVDA to both beep and speak when a progress bar updates.
segment.target: 讀出百分比及發出嗶嗶聲：每當進度列更新時就讀出百分比並發出嗶嗶聲。

segment.source: Report background progress bars
segment.target: 讀出背景進度列

segment.source: This is an option that, when checked, tells NVDA to keep reporting a progress bar, even if it is not physically in the foreground.
segment.target: 若勾選此選項，即使進度列沒有在使用中的前景視窗仍然會繼續讀出進度列的變化。

segment.source: If you minimize or switch away from a window that contains a progress bar, NVDA will keep track of it, allowing you to do other things while NVDA tracks the progress bar.
segment.target: 如果您將含有進度列的視窗縮到最小或切換到另一個視窗繼續其他的工作，NVDA 仍會持續追蹤此進度列以讓您掌握該項作業的進度。

segment.source: Report dynamic content changes
segment.target: 讀出動態內容變化

segment.source: Key: NVDA+5
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+5

segment.source: Toggles the announcement of new content in particular objects such as terminals and the history control in chat programs.
segment.target: 切換是否讀出特定物件中產生的新內容，例如即時通訊軟體的新交談訊息，終端機視窗輸入指令後所顯示的內容、網頁上動態更新的內容。

segment.source: Play a sound when auto-suggestions appear
segment.target: 自動建議出現時播放音效

segment.source: Toggles announcement of appearance of auto-suggestions, and if enabled, NVDA will play a sound to indicate this.
segment.target: 切換是否告知有自動建議出現，若啟用則 NVDA 會撥放音效來表示。

segment.source: Auto-suggestions are lists of suggested entries based on text entered into certain edit fields and documents.
segment.target: 自動建議是在某些文字編輯區或文件中輸入文字時出現的建議項目清單，

segment.source: For example, when you enter text into the search box in Start menu in Windows Vista and later, Windows displays a list of suggestions based on what you typed.
segment.target: 例如當您在 Windows Vista 以上的開始功能表的「搜尋方塊」中輸入文字，Windows 會根據所輸入的文字顯示相關的建議清單，

segment.source: For some edit fields such as search fields in various Windows 10 apps, NVDA can notify you that a list of suggestions has appeared when you type text.
segment.target: 有些文字編輯區 (例如 Windows 10 一些 APP 的搜尋方塊) 當您輸入文字時會顯示與輸入文字相關的建議清單，

segment.source: The auto-suggestions list will close once you move away from the edit field, and for some fields, NVDA can notify you of this when this happens.
segment.target: 一旦您離開文字編輯區，自動建議清單將會關閉，而有些欄位的設計可讓 NVDA 在此情況發生時通知您。

segment.source: Input Composition
segment.target: 輸入法組字

segment.source: The Input Composition category allows you to control how NVDA reports the input of Asian characters, such as with IME or Text Service input methods.
segment.target: 「輸入法組字」類別允許您控制如何讀出亞洲文字的輸入，例如 IME 或 TSF 輸入法，

segment.source: Note that due to the fact that input methods vary greatly by available features and by how they convey information, it will most likely be necessary to configure these options differently for each input method to get the most efficient typing experience.
segment.target: 由於輸入法因可用功能和資訊傳遞方法的不同而有很大的差異，因此可能需要為每種輸入法以不同的方式設定這些選項以獲得最有效率的輸入體驗。(譯者註：以下所提及之內建中文輸入法對應於 Windows 10 版本 2004 之後的輸入法)

segment.source: Automatically report all available candidates
segment.target: 讀出所有顯示的候選字

segment.source: This option, which is on by default, allows you to choose whether or not all visible candidates should be reported automatically when a candidate list appears or its page is changed.
segment.target: 此選項預設開啟，允許您選擇在候選字清單首頁或換頁出現時是否自動讀出所有顯示的候選字，

segment.source: Having this option on for pictographic input methods such as Chinese New ChangJie or Boshiami is useful, as you can automatically hear all symbols and their numbers and you can choose one right away.
segment.target: 對於拆字方式的輸入法如中文倉頡是很有助益的，因為您可以自動聽到所有的候選字及其編號，並且可立刻從中選擇，

segment.source: However, for phonetic input methods such as Chinese New Phonetic, it may be more useful to turn this option off, as all the symbols will sound the same and you will have to use the arrow keys to navigate the list items individually to gain more information from the character descriptions for each candidate.
segment.target: 但是對於拼音方式的輸入法如中文注音關閉此選項更為有用，因所有的候選字讀音皆相同無從分辨，故應將「讀出候選字及字元說明」的選項一併啟用，在您按方向鍵上下移動選擇候選字時方可從每個候選字的字元說明來區別，以有效選出正確的字。

segment.source: Announce Selected Candidate
segment.target: 讀出候選字及字元說明

segment.source: This option, which is on by default, allows you to choose whether NVDA should announce the selected candidate when a candidate list appears or when the selection is changed.
segment.target: 此選項預設開啟，允許您選擇是否讀出候選字清單中選擇的候選字及其字元說明，

segment.source: For input methods where the selection can be changed with the arrow keys (such as Chinese New Phonetic) this is necessary, but for some input methods it may be more efficient typing with this option turned off.
segment.target: 這對於那些可以按方向鍵上下移動選擇候選字的輸入法如中文注音和倉頡是有必要的，但對於有些輸入法關閉此選項可提昇打字效率。

segment.source: Note that even with this option off, the review cursor will still be placed on the selected candidate allowing you to use object navigation / review to manually read this or other candidates.
segment.target: 附註：即使此選項關閉，檢閱游標仍然會跟隨選擇的候選字，允許您使用物件導覽的方式瀏覽該候選字或其他的候選字。

segment.source: Always include short character descriptions for candidates
segment.target: 讀出候選字的簡短字元說明

segment.source: This option, which is on by default, allows you to choose whether or not NVDA should provide a short description for each character in a candidate, either when it's selected or when it's automatically read when the candidate list appears.
segment.target: 此選項預設開啟，允許您選擇是否要讀出每個候選字的簡短字元說明，不論是選擇的候選字或是在候選字清單出現時自動讀出。

segment.source: Note that for locales such as Chinese, the announcement of extra character descriptions for the selected candidate is not affected by this option.
segment.target: 附註：當地區語言選為中文，若「讀出候選字及字元說明」選項同時開啟，對於含有額外字元說明的候選字不受影響，

segment.source: This option may be useful for Korean and Japanese input methods.
segment.target: 此選項主要用於韓文或日文的輸入法。

segment.source: Report changes to the reading string
segment.target: 讀出輸入的組字字元

segment.source: Some input methods such as Chinese New Phonetic and New ChangJie have a reading string (sometimes known as a precomposition string).
segment.target: 有些輸入法例如中文注音和倉頡都是由組字字元組成與對應的，

segment.source: You can choose whether or not NVDA should announce new characters being typed into this reading string with this option.
segment.target: 您可以選擇是否在打字過程中需要聽到這些組字字元，

segment.source: This option is on by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設開啟。

segment.source: Note some older input methods such as Chinese ChangJie may not use the reading string to hold precomposition characters, but instead use the composition string directly. Please see the next option for configuring reporting of the composition string.
segment.target: 附註：一些輸入法如中文注音和倉頡是由下一個選項來控制是否要聽到輸入的組字字元。

segment.source: Report changes to the composition string
segment.target: 讀出浮動組字區的文字

segment.source: After reading or precomposition data has been combined into a valid pictographic symbol, most input methods place this symbol into a composition string for temporary storage along with other combined symbols before they are finally inserted into the document.
segment.target: 一些輸入法如中文注音在輸入組字字元後所產生的文字會與其他產生的文字一起存放於一個暫時性的浮動組字區，並不會直接插入到文件中，

segment.source: This option allows you to choose whether or not NVDA should report new symbols as they appear in the composition string.
segment.target: 此選項允許您選擇是否要讀出浮動組字區的文字，

segment.source: This option is on by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設開啟。(譯者註：中文注音、倉頡和嘸蝦米輸入法，使用者可以利用此選項選擇在打字過程中是否需要讀出組字字元。)

segment.source: Browse Mode
segment.target: 瀏覽模式

segment.source: Open Browse Mode settings
segment.target: 開啟瀏覽模式設定

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+b`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+B`

segment.source: The Browse Mode category in the NVDA Settings dialog is used to configure NVDA's behaviour when you read and navigate complex documents such as web pages.
segment.target: NVDA 設定對話框中的「瀏覽模式」類別用於設定當您閱讀和導覽複雜文件例如網頁時 NVDA 的行為，

segment.source: This category contains the following options:
segment.target: 此類別包括以下選項：

segment.source: Maximum Number of Characters on One Line
segment.target: 每行最多字元數

segment.source: This field sets the maximum length of a line in browse mode (in characters).
segment.target: 此為一個數字欄位，設定瀏覽模式中每一行最多允許的字元數。

segment.source: Maximum Lines Per Page
segment.target: 每頁行數

segment.source: This field sets the amount of lines you will move by when pressing page up or page down while in browse mode.
segment.target: 此為一個數字欄位，設定瀏覽模式中每按一次 Page Up 或 Page Down 時要移動多少行。

segment.source: Use screen layout
segment.target: 使用畫面版面配置

segment.source: Key: NVDA+v
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+v

segment.source: This option allows you to specify whether browse mode should place clickable content (links, buttons and fields) on its own line, or if it should keep it in the flow of text as it is visually shown.
segment.target: 此選項允許您指定瀏覽模式是否應將可點擊的內容 (如：連結、按鈕和欄位) 單獨放在一行，或是保持在如同視覺上顯示的文字走向中。

segment.source: Note that this option doesn't apply to Microsoft Office apps such as Outlook and Word, which always use screen layout.
segment.target: 注意此選項不適用於 Microsoft Office 應用程式如 Outlook 和 Word，它們始終使用畫面版面配置。

segment.source: When screen layout is enabled, page elements will stay as they are visually shown.
segment.target: 當啟用畫面版面配置，頁面元素將保持畫面直觀顯示的狀態，

segment.source: For example, a visual line of multiple links will be presented in speech and braille as multiple links on the same line.
segment.target: 例如在視覺上排成一行的多個連結，在語音和點字上的呈現也會將多個連結排在同一行。

segment.source: If it is disabled, then page elements will be placed on their own lines.
segment.target: 若停用則頁面元素本身將自成一行，

segment.source: This may be easier to understand during line by line page navigation and make items easier to interact with for some users.
segment.target: 這或許在逐行的頁面導覽時更容易理解，並可使某些使用者更容易與項目互動。

segment.source: Enable browse mode on page load
segment.target: 頁面載入時啟用瀏覽模式

segment.source: This checkbox toggles whether browse mode should be automatically enabled when loading a page.
segment.target: 此核取方塊切換在頁面載入後是否自動啟用瀏覽模式，

segment.source: When this option is disabled, browse mode can still be manually activated on pages or in documents where browse mode is supported.
segment.target: 當停用此選項您仍然可以在支援瀏覽模式的頁面或文件中手動啟用瀏覽模式，

segment.source: See the [Browse Mode section](#BrowseMode) for a list of applications supported by browse mode.
segment.target: 請參見[瀏覽模式章節](#BrowseMode)來查看支援瀏覽模式的應用程式清單。

segment.source: Note that this option does not apply to situations where browse mode is always optional, e.g. in Microsoft Word.
segment.target: 附註：此選項並不適用於瀏覽模式總是為選用的情況，例如在 Microsoft Word。

segment.source: This option is enabled by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設啟用。

segment.source: Automatic Say All on page load
segment.target: 頁面載入時自動讀出全部內容

segment.source: This checkbox toggles the automatic reading of a page after it loads in browse mode.
segment.target: 此核取方塊切換在瀏覽模式下載入頁面後是否自動讀出頁面的內容，

segment.source: This option is enabled by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設啟用。

segment.source: Include layout tables
segment.target: 包含排版表格

segment.source: This option affects how NVDA handles tables used purely for layout purposes.
segment.target: 此選項會影響 NVDA 如何處理單純用於排版用途的表格，

segment.source: When on, NVDA will treat these as normal tables, reporting them based on [Document Formatting Settings](#DocumentFormattingSettings) and locating them with quick navigation commands.
segment.target: 當此選項開啟，NVDA 會視同一般表格，將根據[文件格式](#DocumentFormattingSettings)的設定讀出，並且可以使用快速導覽指令來定位，

segment.source: When off, they will not be reported nor found with quick navigation.
segment.target: 當此選項關閉，排版表格就無法讀出，也無法用快速導覽指令找到，

segment.source: However, the content of the tables will still be included as normal text.
segment.target: 然而表格的內容仍會視同一般文字。

segment.source: This option is turned off by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設關閉。

segment.source: To toggle inclusion of layout tables from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方切換包含排版表格，請使用[輸入手勢](#InputGestures)對話框來指派手勢。

segment.source: Configuring reporting of fields such as links and headings
segment.target: 設定讀出如連結及標題等的元素

segment.source: Please see the options in the [Document Formatting category](#DocumentFormattingSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog to configure the fields that are reported when navigating, such as links, headings and tables.
segment.target: 請參見 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中[文件格式類別](#DocumentFormattingSettings)的選項，以設定導覽時要讀出的元素如連結、標題、表格等。

segment.source: Automatic focus mode for focus changes
segment.target: 焦點改變時自動切換焦點模式

segment.source: This option allows focus mode to be invoked if focus changes.
segment.target: 此選項允許焦點改變時是否要跟著切換為焦點模式，

segment.source: For example, when on a web page, if you press tab and you land on a form, if this option is checked, focus mode will automatically be invoked.
segment.target: 例如在網頁上按 Tab 移到一個表單，如果有勾選此選項，將會自動切換為焦點模式。

segment.source: Automatic focus mode for caret movement
segment.target: 游標移動時自動切換焦點模式

segment.source: This option, when checked, allows NVDA to enter and leave focus mode when using arrow keys.
segment.target: 當勾選此選項，可以使用方向鍵來進入或離開焦點模式，

segment.source: For example, if arrowing down a web page and you land on an edit box, NVDA will automatically bring you into focus mode.
segment.target: 例如當使用方向鍵在網頁中瀏覽並移到編輯區，NVDA 將自動切換為焦點模式，

segment.source: If you arrow out of the edit box, NVDA will put you back in browse mode.
segment.target: 若以方向鍵移出此編輯區將回到瀏覽模式。

segment.source: Audio indication of Focus and Browse modes
segment.target: 以音效表示焦點模式與瀏覽模式

segment.source: If this option is enabled, NVDA will play special sounds when it switches between browse mode and focus mode, rather than speaking the change.
segment.target: 若啟用此選項，NVDA 在瀏覽模式與焦點模式之間切換時將播放特殊音效，而不是說出變更的模式。

segment.source: Trap non-command gestures from reaching the document
segment.target: 在文件中限製所有非命令手勢

segment.source: Enabled by default, this option allows you to choose if gestures (such as key presses) that do not result in an NVDA command and are not considered to be a command key in general, should be trapped from going through to the document you are currently focused on.
segment.target: 此選項預設啟用，允許您選擇不會產生 NVDA 指令且通常不被視為指令的手勢或按鍵是否要作用於目前的文件中，

segment.source: As an example, if enabled and the letter j was pressed, it would be trapped from reaching the document, even though it is not a quick navigation command nor is it likely to be a command in the application itself.
segment.target: 例如啟用此選項並按英文字母 J 鍵，這個按鍵動作會被限制無法輸入到文件中，即使它不是快速導覽指令也不可能是應用程式本身的指令，

segment.source: In this case NVDA will tell Windows to play a default sound whenever a key which gets trapped is pressed.
segment.target: 在此情況下每當按下被限制的按鍵時 NVDA 將會播放 Windows 預設音效提示。

segment.source: Automatically set system focus to focusable elements
segment.target: 自動將系統焦點設至可設定焦點的元素

segment.source: Key: NVDA+8
segment.target: 快速鍵: NVDA+8

segment.source: Disabled by default, this option allows you to choose if the system focus should automatically be set to elements that can take the system focus (links, form fields, etc.) when navigating content with the browse mode caret.
segment.target: 此選項預設停用，允許您選擇當以瀏覽模式游標導覽時，系統焦點是否要自動設在那些可取得系統焦點的元素 (例如連結、表單欄位) 上，

segment.source: Leaving this option disabled will not automatically focus focusable elements when they are selected with the browse mode caret.
segment.target: 若此選項保持在停用狀態，當以瀏覽模式游標選擇可設定焦點的元素時將不會自動取得焦點，

segment.source: This might result in faster browsing experience and better responsiveness in browse mode.
segment.target: 這可能會在瀏覽模式下帶來更快的瀏覽體驗與更好的反應速度，

segment.source: The focus will yet be updated to the particular element when interacting with it (e.g. pressing a button, checking a check box).
segment.target: 當與特定的元素進行互動時焦點仍將會移到該元素 (例如按下按鈕或勾選核取方塊)。

segment.source: Enabling this option may improve support for some websites at the cost of performance and stability.
segment.target: 啟用此選項對瀏覽某些網站可能會有較佳的支援，但也許會降低效能及穩定性。

segment.source: Document Formatting
segment.target: 文件格式

segment.source: Open Document Formatting settings
segment.target: 開啟文件格式設定

segment.source: Key: `NVDA+control+d`
segment.target: 快速鍵: `NVDA+Ctrl+D`

segment.source: Most of the options in this category are for configuring what type of formatting you wish to have reported as you move the cursor around documents.
segment.target: 大部分在此類別中的選項都是用來設定游標在文件中移動時要讀出的格式類型，

segment.source: For example, if you check the report font name checkbox, each time you arrow onto text with a different font, the name of the font will be announced.
segment.target: 例如勾選「字型名稱」核取方塊，當游標移到不同字型的文字時就會讀出字型名稱。

segment.source: The document formatting options are organized into groups.
segment.target: 文件格式的選項是以分組方式排列，

segment.source: You can configure reporting of:
segment.target: 您可以設定讀出：

segment.source: Font
segment.target: 「字型」群組

segment.source: Font name
segment.target: 字型名稱

segment.source: Font size
segment.target: 字型大小

segment.source: Font attributes [(Off, Speech, Braille, Speech and braille)](#DocumentFormattingFontAttributes)
segment.target: 字型屬性 [(關、語音、點字、語音及點字)](#DocumentFormattingFontAttributes)

segment.source: Superscripts and subscripts
segment.target: 上標及下標

segment.source: Emphasis
segment.target: 強調

segment.source: Highlighted (Marked) text
segment.target: 高亮文字

segment.source: Style
segment.target: 樣式

segment.source: Colours
segment.target: 色彩

segment.source: Document information
segment.target: 「文件資訊」群組

segment.source: Comments
segment.target: 附註及註解

segment.source: Bookmarks
segment.target: 書籤

segment.source: Editor revisions
segment.target: 編輯者修訂

segment.source: Spelling errors
segment.target: 拼字錯誤

segment.source: Pages and spacing
segment.target: 「頁碼及間距」群組

segment.source: Page numbers
segment.target: 頁碼

segment.source: Line numbers
segment.target: 行號

segment.source: Line indentation reporting [(Off, Speech, Tones, Both Speech and Tones)](#DocumentFormattingSettingsLineIndentation)
segment.target: 讀出行縮排 [(包括關、語音、提示音、語音及提示音)](#DocumentFormattingSettingsLineIndentation)

segment.source: Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting
segment.target: 讀出行縮排時忽略空白行

segment.source: Paragraph indentation (e.g. hanging indent, first line indent)
segment.target: 段落縮排 (例如凸排、第一行縮排)

segment.source: Line spacing (single, double, etc.)
segment.target: 行距 (單行間距、兩倍行高等)

segment.source: Alignment
segment.target: 對齊

segment.source: Table information
segment.target: 「表格資訊」群組

segment.source: Tables
segment.target: 表格

segment.source: Row/column headers (Off, Rows, Columns, Rows and columns)
segment.target: 欄列標題 (關、列、欄、列及欄)

segment.source: Cell coordinates
segment.target: 儲存格座標

segment.source: Cell borders (Off, Styles, Both Colours and Styles)
segment.target: 儲存格框線 (關、樣式、色彩與樣式)

segment.source: Elements
segment.target: 「元素」群組

segment.source: Headings
segment.target: 標題

segment.source: Links
segment.target: 連結

segment.source: Graphics
segment.target: 圖片

segment.source: Lists
segment.target: 清單

segment.source: Block quotes
segment.target: 引述

segment.source: Groupings
segment.target: 群組

segment.source: Landmarks
segment.target: 地標及區域

segment.source: Articles
segment.target: 文章

segment.source: Frames
segment.target: 頁框

segment.source: Figures and captions
segment.target: 圖表及說明

segment.source: Clickable
segment.target: 可點擊

segment.source: To toggle these settings from anywhere, please assign custom gestures using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方切換以上這些設定，請使用[輸入手勢](#InputGestures)對話框來指派手勢。

segment.source: Font attributes
segment.target: 字型屬性

segment.source: This option allows you to select how certain font attributes, such as bold, italics, underline and strikethrough are reported.
segment.target: 此選項可讓您選擇如何呈現某些字型屬性，例如粗體、斜體、底線及刪除線。

segment.source: The font attributes combo box has four options:
segment.target: 字型屬性下拉式方塊有四個選項：

segment.source: Off: NVDA will not report these font attributes.
segment.target: 關：NVDA 不會呈現這些字型屬性。

segment.source: Speech: NVDA will announce when these font attributes change.
segment.target: 語音：NVDA 將在這些字型屬性發生變化時讀出。

segment.source: Braille: NVDA will display these attributes in braille.
segment.target: 點字：NVDA 將以點字形式呈現這些屬性。

segment.source: Exactly how they are displayed can be configured in [NVDA's braille settings](#BrailleFormattingDisplay).
segment.target: 它們的確切顯示方式可以在 [NVDA 的點字設定](#BrailleFormattingDisplay)中進行設定。

segment.source: Speech and braille: NVDA will report font attributes using both of the above methods.
segment.target: 語音及點字：NVDA 會使用上述兩種方法呈現字型屬性。

segment.source: Report formatting changes after the cursor
segment.target: 讀出游標經過後的格式變化

segment.source: If enabled, this setting tells NVDA to try and detect all the formatting changes on a line as it reports it, even if doing this may slow down NVDA's performance.
segment.target: 若啟用此設定，NVDA 將設法偵測游標經過一行的格式變化並讀出來，即便這可能會降低 NVDA 的效能。

segment.source: By default, NVDA will detect the formatting at the position of the System caret / Review Cursor, and in some instances may detect formatting on the rest of the line, only if it is not going to cause a performance decrease.
segment.target: 預設情況下 NVDA 會偵測系統游標／檢閱游標所在位置的格式，在某些情況下若不會導致效能下降，才會偵測該行其他部分的格式。

segment.source: Enable this option while proof reading documents in applications such as WordPad, where formatting is important.
segment.target: 當文件格式很重要，例如在 WordPad 等應用程式中校對文件即可啟用此選項。

segment.source: Line indentation reporting
segment.target: 讀出行縮排

segment.source: This option allows you to configure how indentation at the beginning of lines is reported.
segment.target: 此選項允許您設定要如何讀出一行開頭的縮排，

segment.source: The Report line indentation with combo box has four options.
segment.target: 「讀出行縮排」的下拉式方塊有 4 個選項：

segment.source: Off: NVDA will not treat indentation specially.
segment.target: 關： NVDA 不會讀出縮排資訊。

segment.source: Speech: If speech is selected, when the amount of indentation changes, NVDA will say something like "twelve space" or "four tab."
segment.target: 語音：若選擇此項，當縮排量有變化時 NVDA 將會讀出像「12 個空格」、「4 個 tab」等資訊。

segment.source: Tones: If Tones is selected, when the amount of indentation changes, tones indicate the amount of change in indent.
segment.target: 提示音：若選擇此項，當縮排量有變化時 NVDA 將會以提示音表示縮排量的變化。

segment.source: The tone will increase in pitch every space, and for a tab, it will increase in pitch the equivalent of 4 spaces.
segment.target: 提示音將每一個空格升高一個音調，若為 tab，則每一個 tab 以相當於 4 個空格的音調遞增。

segment.source: Both Speech and Tones: This option reads indentation using both of the above methods.
segment.target: 語音及提示音： NVDA 將以上述兩種方式讀出縮排。

segment.source: If you tick the "Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting" checkbox, then indentation changes won't be reported for blank lines.
segment.target: 如果勾選「讀出行縮排時忽略空白行」核取方塊，則不會讀出空白行的縮排變化，

segment.source: This may be useful when reading a document where blank lines are used to separate indented bloks of text, such as in programming source code.
segment.target: 當閱讀使用空白行來分隔縮排文字區塊的文件時 (例如正在編寫程式碼) 這會很有用。

segment.source: Document Navigation
segment.target: 文件導覽

segment.source: This category allows you to adjust various aspects of document navigation.
segment.target: 此類別允許您針對文件導覽的部分進行調整。

segment.source: Paragraph Style
segment.target: 段落樣式

segment.source: Options |Default (Handled by application), Handled by application, Single line break, Multi line break
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (由應用程式處理)、由應用程式處理、單一換行、多個換行

segment.source: Default |Handled by application
segment.target: 預設 |由應用程式處理

segment.source: This combo box allows you to select the paragraph style to be used when navigating by paragraphs with `control+upArrow` and `control+downArrow`.
segment.target: 此下拉式方塊允許您選擇在使用「Ctrl+向上鍵」及「Ctrl+向下鍵」按段落導覽時要使用的段落樣式，

segment.source: The available paragraph styles are:
segment.target: 可用的段落樣式有：

segment.source: Handled by application: NVDA will let the application determine the previous or next paragraph, and NVDA will read the new paragraph when navigating.
segment.target: 由應用程式處理：NVDA 會讓應用程式來決定上一個或下一個段落，並在導覽時讀出新段落，

segment.source: This style works best when the application supports paragraph navigation natively, and is the default.
segment.target: 當應用程式原生支援段落導覽時此樣式效果最好，並設為預設值。

segment.source: Single line break: NVDA will attempt to determine the previous or next paragraph using a single line break as the paragraph indicator.
segment.target: 單一換行：NVDA 將嘗試使用單一換行作為分段依據來決定上一個或下一個段落，

segment.source: This style works best when reading documents in an application which does not natively support paragraph navigation, and paragraphs in the document are marked by a single press of the `enter` key.
segment.target: 在原生不支援段落導覽的應用程式中讀取文件時此樣式效果最好，文件中的段落透過按一下 Enter 鍵來標記。

segment.source: Multi line break: NVDA will attempt to determine the previous or next paragraph using at least one blank line (two presses of the `enter` key) as the paragraph indicator.
segment.target: 多個換行：NVDA 將嘗試使用至少一個空白行 (按兩下 Enter 鍵) 作為分段依據來決定上一個或下一個段落，

segment.source: This style works best when working with documents which use block paragraphs.
segment.target: 此樣式在處理使用區塊段落的文件時效果最好。

segment.source: Note that this paragraph style cannot be used in Microsoft Word or Microsoft Outlook, unless you are using UIA to access Microsoft Word controls.
segment.target: 附註：此段落樣式不能在 Microsoft Word 或 Microsoft Outlook 中使用，除非您正在使用 UIA 取用 Microsoft Word 控制項。

segment.source: You may toggle through the available paragraph styles from anywhere by assigning a key in the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 您可以在[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)中指派快速鍵來在任何地方循環切換可用的段落樣式。

segment.source: Add-on Store Settings
segment.target: 附加元件商店設定

segment.source: This category allows you to adjust the behaviour of the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 此類別可讓您調整附加元件商店的行為。

segment.source: Update Notifications
segment.target: 更新通知

segment.source: When this option is set to "Notify", the Add-on Store will notify you after NVDA startup if any add-on updates are available.
segment.target: 當此選項設定為「通知」，如果有任何可用的附加元件更新，附加元件商店會在 NVDA 啟動後通知您，

segment.source: This check is performed every 24 hours.
segment.target: 此檢查每 24 小時進行一次。

segment.source: Notifications will only occur for add-ons with updates available within the same channel.
segment.target: 只有當附加元件在同一通道內有可用更新時才會發出通知，

segment.source: For example, for installed beta add-ons, you will only be notified of updates within the beta channel.
segment.target: 例如對於已安裝的 Beta 版附加元件，您只會收到 Beta 版通道內的更新通知。

segment.source: Options |Notify (Default), Disabled
segment.target: 選項 |通知 (預設)、停用

segment.source: Default |Notify
segment.target: 預設 |通知

segment.source: Option |Behaviour
segment.target: 選項 |行為

segment.source: Notify |Notify when updates are available to add-ons within the same channel
segment.target: 通知 |同一通道內的附加元件有可用的更新時通知

segment.source: Disabled |Do not automatically check for updates to add-ons
segment.target: 停用 |不自動檢查附加元件的更新

segment.source: Windows OCR Settings
segment.target: Windows OCR 設定

segment.source: The settings in this category allow you to configure [Windows OCR](#Win10Ocr).
segment.target: 此類別的設定允許您對 [Windows OCR](#Win10Ocr) 進行設定，

segment.source: This category contains the following options:
segment.target: 此類別包含以下選項：

segment.source: Recognition language
segment.target: 辨識語言

segment.source: This combo box allows you to choose the language to be used for text recognition.
segment.target: 此下拉式方塊允許您選擇要用來辨識的語言。

segment.source: To cycle through available languages from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方循環切換可用語言，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢。

segment.source: Periodically refresh recognized content
segment.target: 定時更新辨識內容

segment.source: When this checkbox is enabled, NVDA will automatically refresh the recognized content when a recognition result has focus.
segment.target: 啟用此核取方塊後，當焦點位於辨識結果上，NVDA 將會自動更新辨識內容，

segment.source: This can be very useful when you want to monitor constantly changing content, such as when watching a video with subtitles.
segment.target: 當您想要監看不斷變化的內容時 (例如觀看帶有字幕的影片) 非常有用，

segment.source: The refresh takes place every one and a half seconds.
segment.target: 每隔 1.5 秒會更新一次。

segment.source: This option is disabled by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設停用。

segment.source: Advanced Settings
segment.target: 進階設定

segment.source: Warning! The settings in this category are for advanced users and may cause NVDA to not function correctly if configured in the wrong way.
segment.target: 警告！此類別的設定乃針對進階使用者，若進行錯誤的設定可能導致 NVDA 無法正常運作，

segment.source: Only make changes to these settings if you are sure you know what you are doing or if you have been specifically instructed to by an NVDA developer.
segment.target: 只有在您清楚了解自己正在做什麼或是經由 NVDA 開發者的特別指示才變更這些設定。

segment.source: Making changes to advanced settings
segment.target: 變更進階設定

segment.source: In order to make changes to the advanced settings, the controls must be enabled by confirming, with the checkbox, that you understand the risks of modifying these settings
segment.target: 要變更進階設定，須先勾選核取方塊以表示您了解修改這些設定的風險。

segment.source: Restoring the default settings
segment.target: 還原為預設值

segment.source: The button restores the default values for the settings, even if the confirmation checkbox is not ticked.
segment.target: 此按鈕會將設定還原為預設值，即便您沒有勾選確認變更進階設定的核取方塊，

segment.source: After changing settings you may wish to revert to the default values.
segment.target: 在變更設定後您也許會想要將設定還原為預設值，

segment.source: This may also be the case if you are unsure if the settings have been changed.
segment.target: 當您無法確定設定是否已變更也可以利用此按鈕將設定還原。

segment.source: Enable loading custom code from Developer Scratchpad Directory
segment.target: 啟用從開發者 Scratchpad 目錄載入自訂程式碼

segment.source: When developing add-ons for NVDA, it is useful to be able to test code as you are writing it.
segment.target: 在開發 NVDA 附加元件時若能夠測試所撰寫的程式碼將是很有用的，

segment.source: This option when enabled, allows NVDA to load custom appModules, globalPlugins, brailleDisplayDrivers, synthDrivers and vision enhancement providers, from a special developer scratchpad directory in your NVDA user configuration directory.
segment.target: 啟用此選項允許 NVDA 從您的 NVDA 使用者組態目錄中的特殊開發者 scratchpad 目錄載入自訂應用程式模組、全域外掛程式、點顯器驅動程式、合成器驅動程式與視覺加強器，

segment.source: As their equivalents in add-ons, these modules are loaded when starting NVDA or, in the case of appModules and globalPlugins, when [reloading plugins](#ReloadPlugins).
segment.target: 就如同附加元件，這些模組會在啟動 NVDA 時載入，或者應用程式模組與全域外掛程式可在[重新載入外掛程式](#ReloadPlugins)時載入。

segment.source: This option is off by default, ensuring that no untested code is ever run in NVDA with out the user's explicit knowledge.
segment.target: 此選項預設關閉，以確保 NVDA 不會在使用者不知情的情況下執行未經測試的程式碼。

segment.source: If you wish to distribute custom code to others, you should package it as an NVDA add-on.
segment.target: 如果您想要將自訂的程式碼分發給他人，您應將它封裝成 NVDA 附加元件。

segment.source: Open Developer Scratchpad Directory
segment.target: 開啟開發者 scratchpad 目錄

segment.source: This button opens the directory where you can place custom code while developing it.
segment.target: 此按鈕會開啟一個目錄，讓您可以在其中放進自訂的程式碼，

segment.source: This button is only enabled if NVDA is configured to enable loading custom code from the Developer Scratchpad Directory.
segment.target: 此按鈕僅在「啟用從開發者 Scratchpad 目錄載入自訂程式碼」選項啟用時才可以使用。

segment.source: Registration for UI Automation events and property changes
segment.target: 針對 UI Automation 事件及屬性變更的記錄

segment.source: Options |Automatic, Selective, Global
segment.target: 選項 |自動、選擇性、全域

segment.source: Default |Automatic
segment.target: 預設 |自動

segment.source: This option changes how NVDA registers for events fired by the Microsoft UI Automation accessibility API.
segment.target: 此選項可變更 NVDA 記錄來自 Microsoft UI Automation 輔助功能 API 事件的行為，

segment.source: The registration for UI Automation events and property changes combo box has three options:
segment.target: 針對 UI Automation 事件及屬性變更的記錄下拉式方塊有三個選項：

segment.source: Automatic: "selective" on Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (version 22H2) and later, "global" otherwise.
segment.target: 自動：在 Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (版本 22H2) 及之後版本設為「選擇性」，其餘則為「全域」。

segment.source: Selective: NVDA will limit event registration to the system focus for most events.
segment.target: 選擇性：NVDA 會限制大多數來自系統焦點的記錄事件，

segment.source: If you suffer from performance issues in one or more applications, We recommend you to try this functionality to see whether performance improves.
segment.target: 如果您在一個或多個應用程式中遇到效能問題，我們建議您啟用此選項看是否可以改善效能。

segment.source: However, on older versions of Windows, NVDA may have trouble tracking focus in some controls (such as the task manager and emoji panel).
segment.target: 然而，在舊版的 Windows 上 NVDA 可能無法在某些控制項 (例如工作管理員和表情符號面板) 中追蹤焦點。

segment.source: Global: NVDA registers for many UIA events that are processed and discarded within NVDA itself.
segment.target: 全域：NVDA 會記錄大量的 UIA 事件並在 NVDA 中進行處理與捨棄，

segment.source: While focus tracking is more reliable in more situations, performance is significantly degraded, especially in applications like Microsoft Visual Studio.
segment.target: 雖然追蹤焦點在多數情況下更為可靠，但這在效能上有很大的負面影響，尤其是在像 Microsoft Visual Studio 這類的應用程式。

segment.source: Use UI automation to access Microsoft Word document controls
segment.target: 使用 UI Automation 取用 Microsoft Word 文件控制項

segment.source: Configures whether or not NVDA should use the UI Automation accessibility API to access Microsoft Word documents, rather than the older Microsoft Word object model.
segment.target: 設定 NVDA 是否要使用 UI Automation 輔助功能 API 取用 Microsoft Word 文件，而不使用舊的 Microsoft Word 物件模型，

segment.source: This applies to documents in Microsoft word itself, plus messages in Microsoft Outlook.
segment.target: 這適用於 Microsoft Word 中的文件以及 Microsoft Outlook 中的訊息，

segment.source: This setting contains the following values:
segment.target: 此設定包含以下選項：

segment.source: Default (where suitable)
segment.target: 預設 (相應情況下使用)

segment.source: Only where necessary: where the Microsoft Word object model is not available at all
segment.target: 必要時使用：當 Microsoft Word 物件模型完全不可用時。

segment.source: Where suitable: Microsoft Word version 16.0.15000 or higher, or where the Microsoft Word object model is unavailable
segment.target: 相應情況下使用：Microsoft Word 版本 16.0.15000 或以上版本，或當 Microsoft Word 物件模型無法使用時。

segment.source: Always: where ever UI automation is available in Microsoft word (no matter how complete).
segment.target: 總是使用：無論 UI automation 在 Microsoft word 是否可用 (無論其完整性)。

segment.source: Use UI automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls when available
segment.target: 使用 UI Automation 取用 Microsoft Excel 工作表控制項 (若可用)

segment.source: When this option is enabled, NVDA will try to use the Microsoft UI Automation accessibility API in order to fetch information from Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet controls.
segment.target: 當啟用此選項，NVDA 會嘗試使用 Microsoft UI Automation 輔助功能 API 從 Microsoft Excel 工作表控制項獲取資訊，

segment.source: This is an experimental feature, and some features of Microsoft Excel may not be available in this mode.
segment.target: 此為實驗性功能，在此模式下有些 Microsoft Excel 的功能無法使用，

segment.source: For instance, NVDA's Elements List for listing formulas and comments, and Browse mode quick navigation to jump to form fields on a spreadsheet features are not available.
segment.target: 例如在 NVDA 的項目清單中列出公式和附註，在瀏覽模式中使用單鍵導覽跳到表單欄位等功能會無法使用，

segment.source: However, for basic spreadsheet navigating / editing, this option may provide a vast performance improvement.
segment.target: 然而對於基本的工作表導覽及編輯，此選項可以提供最佳的效能改善。

segment.source: We still do not recommend that the majority of users turn this on by default, though we do welcome users of Microsoft Excel build 16.0.13522.10000 or higher to test this feature and provide feedback.
segment.target: 我們仍不建議大多數的使用者預設啟用此選項，但我們歡迎使用 Microsoft Excel build 16.0.13522.10000 以上版本的使用者測試此功能並提供回饋。

segment.source: Microsoft Excel's UI automation implementation is ever changing, and versions of Microsoft Office older than 16.0.13522.10000 may not expose enough information for this option to be of any use.
segment.target: Microsoft Excel 的 UI automation 實作不斷改變，而 Microsoft Office 版本低於 16.0.13522.10000 無法公開足夠資訊，啟用此選項並沒有太大用處。

segment.source: Use enhanced event processing
segment.target: 使用增強的事件處理程序

segment.source: Options |Default (Enabled), Disabled, Enabled
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (啟用)、停用、啟用

segment.source: Default |Enabled
segment.target: 預設 |啟用

segment.source: When this option is enabled, NVDA should remain responsive when being flooded with many UI Automation events, e.g. large amounts of text in a terminal.
segment.target: 當啟用此選項，NVDA 在處理大量 UI Automation 事件時能夠持續回應 (例如終端機中出現大量文字)，

segment.source: After changing this option, you will need to restart NVDA for the change to take effect.
segment.target: 更改此選項後您需要重新啟動 NVDA 才能使變更生效。

segment.source: Windows Console support
segment.target: Windows 主控台支援

segment.source: Options |Automatic, UIA when available, Legacy
segment.target: 選項 |自動、UIA (若可用)、傳統

segment.source: Default |Automatic
segment.target: 預設 |自動

segment.source: This option selects how NVDA interacts with the Windows Console used by command prompt, PowerShell, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux.
segment.target: 此選項選擇 NVDA 如何與命令提示字元、PowerShell 及 Windows Subsystem for Linux 使用的 Windows 主控台互動。

segment.source: It does not affect the modern Windows Terminal.
segment.target: 這不會影響新版 Windows 終端機。

segment.source: In Windows 10 version 1709, Microsoft [added support for its UI Automation API to the console](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/commandline/whats-new-in-windows-console-in-windows-10-fall-creators-update/), bringing vastly improved performance and stability for screen readers that support it.
segment.target: 在 Windows 10 版本 1709，Microsoft [在主控台中加入了 UI Automation API 的支援](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/commandline/whats-new-in-windows-console-in-windows-10-fall-creators-update/)，對於支援主控台的螢幕助讀程式帶來極大效能及穩定性的改善，

segment.source: In situations where UI Automation is unavailable or known to result in an inferior user experience, NVDA's legacy console support is available as a fallback.
segment.target: 在無法使用 UI Automation 或已知會導致較差的使用者體驗情況下，NVDA 的傳統主控台支援可做為備用。

segment.source: The Windows Console support combo box has three options:
segment.target: Windows 主控台支援下拉式方塊有三個選項：

segment.source: Automatic: Uses UI Automation in the version of Windows Console included with Windows 11 version 22H2 and later.
segment.target: 自動：在 Windows 11 22H2 及之後版本中的 Windows 主控台使用 UI Automation，

segment.source: This option is recommended and set by default.
segment.target: 建議使用此選項並設為預設。

segment.source: UIA when available: Uses UI Automation in consoles if available, even for versions with incomplete or buggy implementations.
segment.target: UIA (若可用)：若可用時在主控台中使用 UI Automation，即使是實作上有不完整或有錯誤的版本。

segment.source: While this limited functionality may be useful (and even sufficient for your usage), use of this option is entirely at your own risk and no support for it will be provided.
segment.target: 雖然此有限的功能可能好用 (甚至可滿足您的使用需求)，然而您必須承擔使用此選項帶來的所有風險，且不會提供任何支援。

segment.source: Legacy: UI Automation in the Windows Console will be completely disabled.
segment.target: 傳統：Windows 主控台中的 UI Automation 將被完全停用，

segment.source: The legacy fallback will always be used even in situations where UI Automation would provide a superior user experience.
segment.target: 即使在使用 UI Automation 可提供更佳使用者體驗的情況下，也總是使用備用的傳統主控台，

segment.source: Therefore, selecting this option is not recommended unless you know what you are doing.
segment.target: 因此除非您知道自己在做什麼否則不建議選擇此選項。

segment.source: Use UIA with Microsoft Edge and other Chromium based browsers when available
segment.target: 在 Microsoft Edge 及其他以 Chromium 為基礎的瀏覽器中使用 UIA (若可用)

segment.source: Allows specifying when UIA will be used when it is available in Chromium based browsers such as Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: 允許在使用以 Chromium 為基礎的瀏覽器時 (如 Microsoft Edge) 指定何時使用 UIA，

segment.source: UIA support for Chromium based browsers is early in development and may not provide the same level of access as IA2.
segment.target: 針對以 Chromium 為基礎的瀏覽器 UIA 支援仍在初期開發階段，無法提供和 IA2 一樣的取用等級。

segment.source: The combo box has the following options:
segment.target: 此下拉式方塊有下列選項：

segment.source: Default (Only when necessary): The NVDA default, currently this is "Only when necessary". This default may change in the future as the technology matures.
segment.target: 預設 (必要時使用)：NVDA 的預設選項，目前為「必要時使用」，未來待技術成熟此預設選項可能會變更。

segment.source: Only when necessary: When NVDA is unable to inject into the browser process in order to use IA2 and UIA is available, then NVDA will fall back to using UIA.
