segment.target: 必要時使用：若 NVDA 無法在瀏覽器使用 IA2 且瀏覽器支援 UIA 的情況下，NVDA 將會使用 UIA。

segment.source: Yes: If the browser makes UIA available, NVDA will use it.
segment.target: 是：若瀏覽器允許使用 UIA，NVDA 便會使用它。

segment.source: No: Don't use UIA, even if NVDA is unable to inject in process. This may be useful for developers debugging issues with IA2 and want to ensure that NVDA does not fall back to UIA.
segment.target: 否：即使 NVDA 無法在瀏覽器使用 IA2 也不使用 UIA。此選項適合讓開發者強迫 NVDA 不使用 UIA 的情況下測試並尋找 NVDA 使用 IA2 的問題。

segment.source: Annotations
segment.target: 注釋

segment.source: This group of options is used to enable features which add experimental support for ARIA annotations.
segment.target: 此群組的選項用來啟用實驗性的 ARIA 註釋功能，

segment.source: Some of these features may be incomplete.
segment.target: 其中有些功能可能是不完整的。

segment.source: To "Report summary of any annotation details at the system caret", press NVDA+d.
segment.target: 要讀出系統游標所在的注釋詳細資料的摘要，按 NVDA+D。

segment.source: The following options exist:
segment.target: 現有下列選項：

segment.source: "Report 'has details' for structured annotations": enables reporting if the text or control has further details.
segment.target: 針對結構注釋讀出「有詳細資料」：啟用時當文字或控制項有更多詳細資料則會讀出。

segment.source: "Report aria-description always":
segment.target: 「總是讀出 aria-description」：

segment.source: When the source of `accDescription` is aria-description, the description is reported.
segment.target: 當 accDescription 的來源是 aria-description 時會將說明讀出來，

segment.source: This is useful for annotations on the web.
segment.target: 這對於網頁上的註解很有用。

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: 注意：

segment.source: There are many sources for `accDescription` several have mixed or unreliable semantics.
segment.target: accDescription 有很多來源，其中一些具有混合或不可靠的語義。

segment.source: Historically AT has not been able to differentiate sources of `accDescription` typically it wasn't spoken due to the mixed semantics.
segment.target: 過去 AT 無法區分 accDescription 的來源，由於混合語義，通常無法被讀出來。

segment.source: This option is in very early development, it relies on browser features not yet widely available.
segment.target: 此選項處於早期開發階段，它依賴於尚未廣泛使用的瀏覽器功能。

segment.source: Expected to work with Chromium 92.0.4479.0+
segment.target: 預計適用於 Chromium 92.0.4479.0+

segment.source: Report live regions
segment.target: 讀出即時區域

segment.source: Options |Default (Enabled), Disabled, Enabled
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (啟用)、停用、啟用

segment.source: Default |Enabled
segment.target: 預設 |啟用

segment.source: This option selects whether NVDA reports changes in some dynamic web content in Braille.
segment.target: 此選項選擇 NVDA 是否要以點字顯示某些動態網頁內容的變化，

segment.source: Disabling this option is equivalent to NVDA's behaviour in versions 2023.1 and earlier, which only reported these content changes in speech.
segment.target: 停用此選項相當於 NVDA 在 2023.1 及之前版本中的行為，僅會以語音讀出這些內容變化。

segment.source: Speak passwords in all enhanced terminals
segment.target: 在所有增強型終端機讀出密碼

segment.source: This setting controls whether characters are spoken by [speak typed characters](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedCharacters) or [speak typed words](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedWords) in situations where the screen does not update (such as password entry) in some terminal programs, such as the Windows Console with UI automation support enabled and Mintty.
segment.target: 此設定用在一些終端程式，例如啟用支援 UI Automation 的 Windows 主控台及 Mintty 中，當畫面不會更新的情況下 (如輸入密碼) 讀出字元是否被[讀出輸入字元](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedCharacters)或[讀出輸入單字](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedWords)所控制。

segment.source: For security purposes, this setting should be left disabled.
segment.target: 基於安全考量，此設定應該保持停用，

segment.source: However, you may wish to enable it if you experience performance issues or instability with typed character and/or word reporting in consoles, or work in trusted environments and prefer password announcement.
segment.target: 但是您會想要在主控台中遇到讀出輸入字元 及/或 單字的效能問題或不穩定時啟用它，或在一個授信任的環境中工作且偏好讀出密碼時啟用它。

segment.source: Use enhanced typed character support in legacy Windows Console when available
segment.target: 在傳統 Windows 主控台使用增強的輸入字元支援 (若可用)

segment.source: This option enables an alternative method for detecting typed characters in legacy Windows consoles.
segment.target: 此選項會啟用一個替代的方式來偵側在傳統 Windows 主控台輸入的字元，

segment.source: While it improves performance and prevents some console output from being spelled out, it may be incompatible with some terminal programs.
segment.target: 雖然這可以改善效能並避免主控台的輸出以拼讀的方式讀出，但可能與一些終端程式不相容。

segment.source: This feature is available and enabled by default on Windows 10 versions 1607 and later when UI Automation is unavailable or disabled.
segment.target: 此功能在 Windows 10 版本 1607 之後預設啟用，當 UI Automation 無法使用或被停用的情況下均是可用的。

segment.source: Warning: with this option enabled, typed characters that do not appear onscreen, such as passwords, will not be suppressed.
segment.target: 警告：當啟用此選項，輸入不會顯示在螢幕上的字元 (如密碼) 也同樣會被讀出來，

segment.source: In untrusted environments, you may temporarily disable [speak typed characters](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedCharacters) and [speak typed words](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedWords) when entering passwords.
segment.target: 在不受信任的環境下輸入密碼時您可以暫時停用[讀出輸入字元](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedCharacters)及[讀出輸入單字](#KeyboardSettingsSpeakTypedWords)兩個選項。

segment.source: Diff algorithm
segment.target: 內容差異分析

segment.source: This setting controls how NVDA determines the new text to speak in terminals.
segment.target: 此設定控制 NVDA 在終端機中如何判斷要讀出的新文字，

segment.source: The diff algorithm combo box has three options:
segment.target: 「內容差異分析」下拉式方塊有 3 個選項：

segment.source: Automatic: This option causes NVDA to prefer Diff Match Patch in most situations, but fall back to Difflib in problematic applications, such as older versions of the Windows Console and Mintty.
segment.target: 自動：此選項讓 NVDA 在大多數情況下優先使用字元分析，在一些有問題的應用程式如舊版 Windows 主控台和 Mintty 則回到使用單行分析。

segment.source: Diff Match Patch: This option causes NVDA to calculate changes to terminal text by character, even in situations where it is not recommended.
segment.target: 字元分析：此選項讓 NVDA 以逐字的方式來分析終端機中文字內容的改變，即使是在不建議使用的情況下。

segment.source: It may improve performance when large volumes of text are written to the console and allow more accurate reporting of changes made in the middle of lines.
segment.target: 當有大量文字填入主控台時可以提高效能，以及在一行文字的中間有文字改變時更精準地讀出，

segment.source: However, in some applications, reading of new text may be choppy or inconsistent.
segment.target: 但是在某些應用程式中讀出新文字可能會斷斷續續或不連貫。

segment.source: Difflib: this option causes NVDA to calculate changes to terminal text by line, even in situations where it is not recommended.
segment.target: 單行分析：此選項讓 NVDA 以逐行的方式來分析終端機中文字內容的改變，即使是在不建議使用的情況下，

segment.source: It is identical to NVDA's behaviour in versions 2020.4 and earlier.
segment.target: 這與 NVDA 2020.4 及之前版本的預設作法相同。

segment.source: This setting may stabilize reading of incoming text in some applications.
segment.target: 此設定可以使某些應用程式中讀出傳入的文字時更加穩定，

segment.source: However, in terminals, when inserting or deleting a character in the middle of a line, the text after the caret will be read out.
segment.target: 但是在終端機中當編輯或刪除某行中間的字元時，其後的文字會被讀出來。

segment.source: Speak new text in Windows Terminal via
segment.target: 在 Windows 終端機讀出新文字方式

segment.source: Options |Default (Diffing), Diffing, UIA notifications
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (單行分析)、單行分析、UIA 通知

segment.source: Default |Diffing
segment.target: 預設 |單行分析

segment.source: This option selects how NVDA determines what text is "new" (and thus what to speak when "report dynamic content changes" is enabled) in Windows Terminal and the WPF Windows Terminal control used in Visual Studio 2022.
segment.target: 此選項選擇 NVDA 在 Windows 終端機及 Visual Studio 2022 使用的 WPF Windows 終端機控製項中如何判斷哪些文字是「新的」 (以及當啟用「讀出動態內容變化」時要讀出哪些文字)，

segment.source: It does not affect the Windows Console (`conhost.exe`).
segment.target: 但不會影響 Windows 主控台 (conhost.exe)。

segment.source: The Speak new text in Windows Terminal combo box has three options:
segment.target: 「在 Windows 終端機讀出新文字方式」下拉式方塊有三個選項：

segment.source: Default: This option is currently equivalent to "diffing", but it is anticipated to change once support for UIA notifications is further developed.
segment.target: 預設：此選項目前等同於「單行分析」，但預計在進一步開發對 UIA 通知的支援後會有改變。

segment.source: Diffing: This option uses the selected diff algorithm to calculate changes each time the terminal renders new text.
segment.target: 單行分析：此選項使用所選的差異分析來計算每次終端機顯示新文字時的變化，

segment.source: This is identical to NVDA's behaviour in versions 2022.4 and earlier.
segment.target: 這與 NVDA 在 2022.4 及更早版本中的行為相同。

segment.source: UIA notifications: This option defers the responsibility of determining what text to speak to Windows Terminal itself, meanning that NVDA no longer has to determine what text currently on-screen is "new".
segment.target: UIA 通知：此選項將要讀出哪些文字的責任交給 Windows 終端機本身，表示 NVDA 不再須要判斷目前螢幕上的文字是否是「新的」。

segment.source: This should markedly improve performance and stability of Windows Terminal, but this feature is not yet complete.
segment.target: 這應該能夠顯著提高 Windows 終端機的效能及穩定性，但此功能尚未完成，

segment.source: In particular, typed characters that are not displayed on-screen, such as passwords, are reported when this option is selected.
segment.target: 特別是當選擇此選項，不會在螢幕上顯示的輸入文字例如密碼會被讀出來。

segment.source: Additionally, contiguous spans of output of over 1,000 characters may not be reported accurately.
segment.target: 此外，連續輸出超過 1,000 個字元可能無法準確讀出。

segment.source: Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events
segment.target: 嘗試將已過期焦點事件的語音取消

segment.source: This option enables behaviour which attempts to cancel speech for expired focus events.
segment.target: 啟用此選項會嘗試將已過期焦點事件的語音取消，

segment.source: In particular moving quickly through messages in Gmail with Chrome can cause NVDA to speak outdated information.
segment.target: 尤其是以 Chrome 快速瀏覽 Gmail 中的訊息常引發 NVDA 讀出過時的資訊。

segment.source: This functionality is enabled by default as of NVDA 2021.1.
segment.target: 此功能自 NVDA 2021.1 起預設啟用。

segment.source: Caret move timeout (in MS)
segment.target: 等待游標移動時間 (以毫秒計)

segment.source: This option allows you to configure the number of milliseconds NVDA will wait for the caret (insertion point) to move in editable text controls.
segment.target: 此選項允許您設定 NVDA 等待游標 (插入點) 在文字編輯區中移動的毫秒數，

segment.source: If you find that NVDA seems to be incorrectly tracking the caret E.g. it seems to be always one character behind or is repeating lines, then you may wish to try increasing this value.
segment.target: 如果您發現 NVDA 似乎沒有正確的追蹤游標位置，例如總是比實際的游標位置慢一個字元，或是重覆讀出同一行的內容，那麼不妨嘗試提高此數值。

segment.source: Report transparency for colors
segment.target: 讀出色彩的透明度

segment.source: This option enables reporting when colors are transparent, useful for addon/appModule developers gathering information to improve user experience with a 3rd party application.
segment.target: 啟用此選項可在色彩是透明時讀出來，這對於附加元件/appModule 的開發者收集資訊以改善第三方應用程式的使用者體驗非常有用。

segment.source: Some GDI applications will highlight text with a background color, NVDA (via display model) attempts to report this color.
segment.target: 一些 GDI 應用程式會用背景色來突顯文字，NVDA (透過 display model) 會嘗試讀出這種色彩，

segment.source: In some situations, the text background may be entirely transparent, with the text layered on some other GUI element.
segment.target: 某些情況下文字背景可能是完全透明的，文字直接覆蓋在其他 GUI 元素上。

segment.source: With several historically popular GUI APIs, the text may be rendered with a transparent background, but visually the background color is accurate.
segment.target: 對於幾個過去流行的 GUI API，文字可能會以透明背景顯示，但在視覺上背景色是準確的。

segment.source: Use WASAPI for audio output
segment.target: 使用 WASAPI 作為音訊輸出

segment.source: Options |Default (Enabled), Disabled, Enabled
segment.target: 選項 |預設 (啟用)、啟用、停用

segment.source: Default |Enabled
segment.target: 預設 |啟用

segment.source: This option enables audio output via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI).
segment.target: 此選項允許透過 Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI) 進行音訊輸出，

segment.source: WASAPI is a more modern audio framework which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA audio output, including both speech and sounds.
segment.target: WASAPI 是一種更現代的音訊框架，可以提高 NVDA 音訊輸出 (包括語音和音效) 的反應、效能和穩定性，

segment.source: After changing this option, you will need to restart NVDA for the change to take effect.
segment.target: 變更此選項後您需要重新啟動 NVDA 才能使變更生效。

segment.source: Disabling WASAPI will disable the following options:
segment.target: 停用 WASAPI 將會停用下列選項：

segment.source: [Volume of NVDA sounds follows voice volume](#SoundVolumeFollowsVoice)
segment.target: [NVDA 音效音量跟隨語音音量](#SoundVolumeFollowsVoice)

segment.source: [Volume of NVDA sounds](#SoundVolume)
segment.target: [NVDA 音效音量](#SoundVolume)

segment.source: Debug logging categories
segment.target: 偵錯記錄類別

segment.source: The checkboxes in this list allow you to enable specific categories of debug messages in NVDA's log.
segment.target: 此清單中的核取方塊允許您啟用在 NVDA 事件記錄中偵錯記錄需記錄的特定訊息類別，

segment.source: Logging these messages can result in decreased performance and large log files.
segment.target: 記錄這些訊息會導致效能降低及更大的事件記錄檔，

segment.source: Only turn one of these on if specifically instructed to by an NVDA developer e.g. when debugging why a braille display driver is not functioning correctly.
segment.target: 只有在 NVDA 開發者特別指示的情況下才開啟其中一個項目，例如要針對點顯器驅動程式異常進行偵錯。

segment.source: Play a sound for logged errors
segment.target: 記錄到錯誤時播放音效

segment.source: This option allows you to specify if NVDA will play an error sound in case an error is logged.
segment.target: 此選項允許您指定 NVDA 是否在錯誤事件被記錄時播放錯誤音效。

segment.source: Choosing Only in test versions (default) makes NVDA play error sounds only if the current NVDA version is a test version (alpha, beta or run from source).
segment.target: 選擇「僅限於測試版本」(預設) 時，讓 NVDA 僅在執行測試版本 (alpha、 beta 或從原始程式碼執行) 時播放錯誤音效。

segment.source: Choosing Yes allows to enable error sounds whatever your current NVDA version is.
segment.target: 選擇「是」，則不論您目前使用的 NVDA 版本為何均會播放錯誤音效。

segment.source: Regular expression for text paragraph quick navigation commands
segment.target: 用於文字段落導覽的正規表達式

segment.source: This field allows users to customize regular expression for detecting text paragraphs in browse mode.
segment.target: 此欄位允許使用者自訂正規表達式以在瀏覽模式下偵測文字段落，

segment.source: The [text paragraph navigation command](#TextNavigationCommand) searches for paragraphs matched by this regular expression.
segment.target: [文字段落導覽指令](#TextNavigationCommand)會搜尋與此正規表達式相符的段落。

segment.source: miscellaneous Settings
segment.target: 其他設定

segment.source: Besides the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog, The Preferences sub-menu of the NVDA Menu contains several other items which are outlined below.
segment.target: 除了 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框，NVDA 功能表中的偏好子功能表包含以下幾個其他項目。

segment.source: Speech dictionaries
segment.target: 讀音字典

segment.source: The speech dictionaries menu (found in the Preferences menu) contains dialogs that allow you to manage the way NVDA pronounces particular words or phrases.
segment.target: 「讀音字典」功能表 (位於「偏好」子功能表) 具有一個對話框允許您管理 NVDA 對特定文字的讀音方式，

segment.source: There are currently three different types of speech dictionaries.
segment.target: 目前有三個不同類型的字典

segment.source: They are:
segment.target: 分別是：

segment.source: Default: rules in this dictionary affect all speech in NVDA.
segment.target: 預設字典：此字典中的規則影響所有在 NVDA 中的語音。

segment.source: Voice: rules in this dictionary affect speech for the synthesizer voice currently being used.
segment.target: 語音字典：此字典中的規則影響目前使用中的合成器語音。

segment.source: Temporary: rules in this dictionary affect all speech in NVDA, but only for the current session. These rules are temporary and will be lost if NVDA is restarted.
segment.target: 暫存字典：此字典中的規則影響 NVDA 中的所有語音，但僅對現階段執行的 NVDA 有作用，重新啟動 NVDA 後這些暫存的規則將會消失。

segment.source: You need to assign custom gestures using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures) if you wish to open any of these dictionary dialogs from anywhere.
segment.target: 如果您想要在任何地方開啟任一個字典對話框，您需要使用[輸入手勢](#InputGestures)對話框來指派手勢。

segment.source: All dictionary dialogs contain a list of rules which will be used for processing the speech.
segment.target: 所有字典的對話框都含有處理讀音的規則清單，

segment.source: The dialog also contains Add, Edit, Remove and Remove all buttons.
segment.target: 對話框也包含「新增」、「編輯」、「移除」與「全部移除」的按鈕。

segment.source: To add a new rule to the dictionary, press the Add button, and fill in the fields in the dialog box that appears and then press Ok.
segment.target: 要在字典中新增一個規則請按「新增」按鈕，

segment.source: You will then see your new rule in the list of rules.
segment.target: 接著填入相關欄位，然後按「確認」按鈕，您將會在規則清單中看到新規則，

segment.source: However, to make sure your rule is actually saved, make sure to press Ok to exit the dictionary dialog completely once you have finished adding/editing rules.
segment.target: 不過要確保規則已經儲存，在完成新增或編輯規則後要再按一下「確認」按鈕關閉字典對話框才算完成。

segment.source: The rules for NVDA's speech dictionaries allow you to change one string of characters into another.
segment.target: NVDA 讀音字典的規則允許您將一個字串改變為另一個字串，

segment.source: For example, you could create a rule which causes NVDA to say the word "frog" instead of "bird" whenever the word "bird" is encountered.
segment.target: 例如您可以建立一個規則使 NVDA 每當遇到一個英文字「bird」時讀成「frog」而不是「bird」。

segment.source: In the Add rule dialog, the easiest way to do this is to type the word bird in the Pattern field, and the word frog in the Replacement field.
segment.target: 在「新增字典項目」對話框中，最簡單的方法是在「原來文字」欄位填入「bird」，並在「替代文字」欄位填入「frog」，

segment.source: You may also want to type a description of the rule in the Comment field (something like: changes bird to frog).
segment.target: 您也可在「註解」欄位輸入此規則的說明，像是「將 bird 改成 frog 的讀音」這樣。

segment.source: NVDA's speech dictionaries however are much more powerful than simple word replacement.
segment.target: 然而 NVDA 讀音字典比簡單的字串替換功能要強的多，

segment.source: The Add rule dialog also contains a checkbox to say whether or not you want the rule to be case sensitive (meaning that NVDA should care whether the characters are uppercase or lowercase.
segment.target: 在「新增字典項目」對話框中還包括一個「大小寫須相符」的核取方塊，用以告訴 NVDA 是否要注意規則中的字元是大寫還是小寫，

segment.source: NVDA ignores case by default).
segment.target: NVDA 預設忽略大小寫。

segment.source: Finally, a set of radio buttons allows you to tell NVDA whether your pattern should match anywhere, should only match if it is a complete word or should be treated as a "Regular expression".
segment.target: 最後是一組選擇鈕，用以告訴 NVDA 規則項目是否在任何地方匹配或是僅在為整個單字時匹配，還是要視為正規表達式。

segment.source: Setting the pattern to match as a whole word means that the replacement will only be made if the pattern does not occur as part of a larger word.
segment.target: 「整個單字」是指「原來文字」的字串不是作為一個較大單字的一部分時才會變更為「替代文字」的讀音，

segment.source: This condition is met if the characters immediately before and after the word are anything other than a letter, a number, or an underscore, or if there are no characters at all.
segment.target: 當單字前後的字元不是字母、數字、底線或者完全沒有字元即滿足此條件。(請注意：中文字也屬於字母的一種，因此若英文單字夾在中文句子中，且與前後中文字之間沒有空白或非字母相隔，將不符合此條件。)

segment.source: Thus, using the earlier example of replacing the word "bird" with "frog", if you were to make this a whole word replacement, it would not match "birds" or "bluebird".
segment.target: 舉前述將「bird」替代為「frog」讀音為例，如果選擇「整個單字」這個選項，則遇到那些「birds」或是「bluebird」均不會改變讀音。

segment.source: A regular expression is a pattern containing special symbols that allow you to match on more than one character at a time, or match on just numbers, or just letters, as a few examples.
segment.target: 「正規表達式」是指一個包含特殊符號的模式，允許您一次比對一個以上的字元，只比對數字或字母，

segment.source: Regular expressions are not covered in this user guide.
segment.target: 正規表達式這個主題並不在本用戶指南的說明中，

segment.source: For an introductory tutorial, please refer to [Python's Regular Expression Guide](https://docs.python.org/3.11/howto/regex.html).
segment.target: 有關介紹教學請參考 [Python's Regular Expression Guide](https://docs.python.org/3.11/howto/regex.html)。

segment.source: Punctuation/symbol pronunciation
segment.target: 標點及符號讀音

segment.source: This dialog allows you to change the way punctuation and other symbols are pronounced, as well as the symbol level at which they are spoken.
segment.target: 此對話框允許您變更標點符號及其他符號的讀音方式以及讀出這些符號的時機。

segment.source: The language for which symbol pronunciation is being edited will be shown in the dialog's title.
segment.target: 正在編輯符號讀音的語言將顯示在此「符號讀音」對話框的標題列上。

segment.source: Note that this dialog respects the "Trust voice's language for processing symbols and characters" option found in the [Speech category](#SpeechSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog; i.e. it uses the voice language rather than the NVDA global language setting when this option is enabled.
segment.target: 附註：當 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中[語音類別](#SpeechSettings)的「處理字元及符號時依靠語音的語言」選項啟用時，讀出符號的方式將按照所使用的語音語言讀出這些符號，並不是使用 NVDA 本身的語言設定讀出。

segment.source: To change a symbol, first select it in the Symbols list.
segment.target: 要更改一個符號，首先在「符號」清單中選取該項目，

segment.source: You can filter the symbols by entering the symbol or a part of the symbol's replacement into the Filter by edit box.
segment.target: 您可以在「篩選」編輯區輸入符號或讀音替代文字的部分內容以篩選出想要編輯的符號。

segment.source: The Replacement field allows you to change the text that should be spoken in place of this symbol.
segment.target: 替代文字：允許您更改選取符號的讀音文字

segment.source: Using the Level field, you can adjust the lowest symbol level at which this symbol should be spoken (none, some, most or all).
segment.target: 等級：您可調整符號要被讀出的最低等級設定 (無、一些、多數、全部)

segment.source: You can also set the level to character; in this case the symbol will not be spoken regardless of the symbol level in use, with the following two exceptions:
segment.target: 您也可以將等級設為字元，在這種情況下無論使用的符號等級為何都不會說出該符號，除了以下兩種情況：

segment.source: When navigating character by character.
segment.target: 按字元導覽時。

segment.source: When NVDA is spelling any text containing that symbol.
segment.target: 當 NVDA 正在拼讀含有該符號的文字時。

segment.source: The Send actual symbol to synthesizer field specifies when the symbol itself (in contrast to its replacement) should be sent to the synthesizer.
segment.target: 送出實際的符號到合成器：指定何時要將符號本身或其讀音替代文字送出到合成器。

segment.source: This is useful if the symbol causes the synthesizer to pause or change the inflection of the voice.
segment.target: 一個符號引發合成器產生朗讀停頓或語音的語調改變的效果相當有用，

segment.source: For example, a comma causes the synthesizer to pause.
segment.target: 例如一個逗點 (或逗號) 引發朗讀的停頓，

segment.source: There are three options:
segment.target: 此選項有三個選擇：

segment.source: never: Never send the actual symbol to the synthesizer.
segment.target: 永不：不將實際的符號送到合成器

segment.source: always: Always send the actual symbol to the synthesizer.
segment.target: 總是：總是將實際的符號送到合成器

segment.source: only below symbols' level: Send the actual symbol only if the configured speech symbol level is lower than the level set for this symbol.
segment.target: 僅當低於符號等級：只有當變更讀出符號等級低於此符號設定的等級時才將實際的符號送到合成器。

segment.source: For example, you might use this so that a symbol will have its replacement spoken at higher levels without pausing, while still being indicated with a pause at lower levels.
segment.target: 例如您可以使用這個功能，在較高等級時讀出符號的替代文字而不停頓，在較低等級時維持停頓效果。

segment.source: You can add new symbols by pressing the Add button.
segment.target: 您可以按「新增」按鈕來新增一個符號，

segment.source: In the dialog that appears, enter the symbol and press the OK button.
segment.target: 在顯示的對話框中輸入要新增的符號，接著按「確認」按鈕，

segment.source: Then, change the fields for the new symbol as you would for other symbols.
segment.target: 然後再比照先前其他的符號作業方式設定新符號的相關欄位。

segment.source: You can remove a symbol you previously added by pressing the Remove button.
segment.target: 您也可以按「移除」按鈕以移除先前加入的符號。

segment.source: When you are finished, press the OK button to save your changes or the Cancel button to discard them.
segment.target: 當您完成編輯可按「確認」按鈕以儲存變更，或按「取消」按鈕不做任何變更。

segment.source: In the case of complex symbols, the Replacement field may have to include some group references of the matched text. For instance, for a pattern matching a whole date, \1, \2, and \3 would need to appear in the field, to be replaced by the corresponding parts of the date.
segment.target: 在復雜符號的情況下，替代文字欄位可能必須包含正規表達式比對文字的一些群組參照，

segment.source: Normal backslashes in the Replacement field should thus be doubled, e.g. "a\\b" should be typed in order to get the "a\b" replacement.
segment.target: 例如對於完整日期的模式比對，\1、\2、\3 需要出現在替代文字欄位用以表示對應的年月日，因此替代文字欄位中若要將反斜線作為一般反斜線使用則需要以兩個反斜線來表示，例如應輸入「a\\b」以表示「a\b」。

segment.source: Input Gestures
segment.target: 輸入手勢

segment.source: In this dialog, you can customize the input gestures (keys on the keyboard, buttons on a braille display, etc.) for NVDA commands.
segment.target: 在此對話框中您可以自訂 NVDA 指令的輸入手勢 (鍵盤上的按鍵、點顯器上的按鈕等)。

segment.source: Only commands that are applicable immediately before the dialog is opened are shown.
segment.target: 對話框開啟後僅有那些當下情境適用的指令才會顯示，

segment.source: For example, if you want to customize commands related to browse mode, you should open the Input Gestures dialog while you are in browse mode.
segment.target: 例如當您要自訂與瀏覽模式相關的指令，應在瀏覽模式下開啟輸入手勢對話框。

segment.source: The tree in this dialog lists all of the applicable NVDA commands grouped by category.
segment.target: 此對話框依類別分組將所有可適用的 NVDA 指令以樹狀結構方式全部列出，

segment.source: You can filter them by entering one or more words from the command's name into the Filter by edit box in any order.
segment.target: 您可以不需依順序在「篩選」的編輯方塊中輸入指令的一個或多個關鍵字，

segment.source: Any gestures associated with a command are listed beneath the command.
segment.target: 任何與指令關聯的手勢會列於該指令的下方。

segment.source: To add an input gesture to a command, select the command and press the Add button.
segment.target: 要針對指令新增輸入手勢，先選定指令並按「新增」按鈕，

segment.source: Then, perform the input gesture you wish to associate; e.g. press a key on the keyboard or a button on a braille display.
segment.target: 然後執行您想要關聯的輸入手勢，例如按下鍵盤上的一個按鍵或是點顯器上的一個按鈕。

segment.source: Often, a gesture can be interpreted in more than one way.
segment.target: 通常一個手勢可以有不只一種對應的配置，

segment.source: For example, if you pressed a key on the keyboard, you may wish it to be specific to the current keyboard layout (e.g. desktop or laptop) or you may wish it to apply for all layouts.
segment.target: 例如您在鍵盤上按一個鍵，可設定成僅適用於目前的鍵盤配置 (譬如「桌上型電腦」或「筆記型電腦」) 或是套用到所有配置，

segment.source: In this case, a menu will appear allowing you to select the desired option.
segment.target: 在此情況下將出現一個選單允許您選擇所需的選項。

segment.source: To remove a gesture from a command, select the gesture and press the Remove button.
segment.target: 要將指令的手勢刪除則選定手勢後再按「移除」按扭。

segment.source: The Emulated system keyboard keys category contains NVDA commands that emulate keys on the system keyboard.
segment.target: 在「模擬系統鍵盤按鍵」類別中包含 NVDA 指令來模擬按下系統鍵盤上的按鍵，

segment.source: These emulated system keyboard keys can be used to control a system keyboard right from your braille display.
segment.target: 這些模擬系統鍵盤按鍵可用於從點顯器上控制系統鍵盤。

segment.source: To add an emulated input gesture, select the Emulated system keyboard keys category and press the Add button.
segment.target: 要新增模擬輸入手勢，選擇「模擬系統鍵盤按鍵」類別，接著按下「新增」按鈕，

segment.source: Then, press the key on the keyboard you wish to emulate.
segment.target: 然後在鍵盤上按下您想要模擬的按鍵，

segment.source: After that, the key will be available from the Emulated system keyboard keys category and you will be able to assign an input gesture to it as described above.
segment.target: 如此該按鍵就會新增至「模擬系統鍵盤按鍵」類別中，您可以按照前述方式指派輸入手勢。

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: 注意：

segment.source: Emulated keys must have gestures assigned in order to persist when saving / closing the dialog.
segment.target: 模擬按鍵必須指派輸入手勢，如此在儲存或關閉對話框時才會保留。

segment.source: An input gesture with modifier keys may not be able to be mapped to an emulated gesture without modifier keys.
segment.target: 輸入手勢含有組合鍵則無法對應到沒有組合鍵的模擬按鍵，

segment.source: For instance, setting the emulated input `a` and configuring an input gesture of `ctrl+m`, may result in the application receiving `ctrl+a`.
segment.target: 例如您指派了 Ctrl+M 這個輸入手勢來模擬鍵盤上的按鍵 A，可能導致應用程式會接收到 Ctrl+A 的按鍵組合，而非只有 A 而已。

segment.source: When you are finished making changes, press the OK button to save them or the Cancel button to discard them.
segment.target: 當您完成變更，按「確認」按鈕儲存設定，或按「取消」按鈕捨棄變更。

segment.source: Saving and Reloading the configuration
segment.target: 儲存與還原組態

segment.source: By default NVDA will automatically save your settings on exit.
segment.target: 預設情況下當結束 NVDA 時會自動儲存設定上的變更，

segment.source: Note, however, that this option can be changed under the general options in the preferences menu.
segment.target: 不過您也可到 NVDA 設定對話框中的「一般」類別去更改，

segment.source: To save the settings manually at any time, choose the Save configuration item in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 要隨時以手動方式儲存設定，請選擇 NVDA 功能表的「儲存組態」項目。

segment.source: If you ever make a mistake with your settings and need to revert back to the saved settings, choose the "revert to saved configuration" item in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 如果您進行設定時出錯，想要回複原先儲存的設定，請選擇 NVDA 功能表的「還原為已儲存的組態」項目，

segment.source: You can also reset your settings to their original factory defaults by choosing Reset Configuration To Factory Defaults, which is also found in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 您也可以利用 NVDA 功能表的「重設組態為預設值」，將設定重設為原始的預設值。

segment.source: The following NVDA key commands are also useful:
segment.target: 以下為好用的 NVDA 快速鍵指令：

segment.source: Name |Desktop key |Laptop key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |桌電快速鍵 |筆電快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Save configuration |NVDA+control+c |NVDA+control+c |Saves your current configuration so that it is not lost when you exit NVDA
segment.target: 儲存組態 |NVDA+Ctrl+C |NVDA+Ctrl+C |儲存目前的組態，當結束 NVDA 時設定不會遺失。

segment.source: Revert configuration |NVDA+control+r |NVDA+control+r |Pressing once resets your configuration to when you last saved it. Pressing three times will reset it back to factory defaults.
segment.target: 還原組態 |NVDA+Ctrl+R |NVDA+Ctrl+R |按一下回復到上次儲存的組態，連按三下重設回原始預設值。

segment.source: Configuration Profiles
segment.target: 組態設定檔

segment.source: Sometimes, you may wish to have different settings for different situations.
segment.target: 有時候您會想要在不同情境有不同的設定，例如

segment.source: For example, you may wish to have reporting of indentation enabled while you are editing or reporting of font attributes enabled while you are proofreading.
segment.target: 在編輯時啟用讀出行縮排或是在校對時啟用讀出字型屬性，

segment.source: NVDA allows you to do this using configuration profiles.
segment.target: NVDA 允許您使用組態設定檔做到這點。

segment.source: A configuration profile contains only those settings which are changed while the profile is being edited.
segment.target: 組態設定檔僅會包含那些在編輯設定檔時所變更的設定，

segment.source: Most settings can be changed in configuration profiles except for those in the General category of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog, which apply to the entirety of NVDA.
segment.target: 除了套用於整個 NVDA 的 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的「一般」類別設定外，大多數設定都可以在組態設定檔中變更。

segment.source: Configuration profiles can be manually activated either from a dialog or using custom added gestures.
segment.target: 組態設定檔可以從對話框或使用自訂手勢的方式來手動啟用，

segment.source: They can also be activated automatically due to triggers such as switching to a particular application.
segment.target: 也可以因觸發器例如切換到特定應用程式而自動啟用。

segment.source: Basic Management
segment.target: 基本管理

segment.source: You manage configuration profiles by selecting "Configuration profiles" in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 您可以從 NVDA 功能表選擇「組態設定檔」來管理組態設定檔，

segment.source: You can also do this using a key command:
segment.target: 也可以利用以下的快速鍵：

segment.source: NVDA+control+p: Show the Configuration Profiles dialog.
segment.target: NVDA+Ctrl+P: 顯示「組態設定檔」對話框

segment.source: The first control in this dialog is the profile list from which you can select one of the available profiles.
segment.target: 在此對話框的第一個控制項是設定檔清單，您可從清單中選擇一個可用的設定檔。

segment.source: When you open the dialog, the profile you are currently editing is selected.
segment.target: 當您開啟對話框，您目前正在編輯的設定檔會被選取，

segment.source: Additional information is also shown for active profiles, indicating whether they are manually activated, triggered and/or being edited.
segment.target: 此外作用中的設定檔還會顯示額外資訊，包括是手動啟用、觸發器啟用、是否正在編輯。

segment.source: To rename or delete a profile, press the Rename or Delete buttons, respectively.
segment.target: 要重新命名或刪除設定檔，分別按「重新命名」或「刪除」按鈕。

segment.source: Press the Close button to close the dialog.
segment.target: 要關閉此對話框則按「關閉」按鈕。

segment.source: Creating a Profile
segment.target: 建立設定檔

segment.source: To create a profile, press the New button.
segment.target: 要建立一個設定檔，按「新增」按鈕。

segment.source: In the New Profile dialog, you can enter a name for the profile.
segment.target: 在「新設定檔」對話框您可輸入設定檔的名稱，

segment.source: You can also select how this profile should be used.
segment.target: 還可以選擇要如何使用此設定檔，

segment.source: If you only want to use this profile manually, select Manual activation, which is the default.
segment.target: 如果您只要手動使用此設定檔則選擇「手動啟用」，此為預設值，

segment.source: Otherwise, select a trigger which should automatically activate this profile.
segment.target: 否則是選擇應自動啟用此設定檔的觸發器，

segment.source: For convenience, if you haven't entered a name for the profile, selecting a trigger will fill in the name accordingly.
segment.target: 為方便起見，如果您還沒有為設定檔輸入名稱，選擇觸發器將會填入觸發器的名稱。

segment.source: See [below](#ConfigProfileTriggers) for more information about triggers.
segment.target: 請參見以下的[「觸發器」](#ConfigProfileTriggers)一節以獲取更多有關觸發器的資訊。

segment.source: Pressing OK will create the profile and close the Configuration Profiles dialog so you can edit it.
segment.target: 按「確認」按鈕將新增設定檔並關閉「組態設定檔」對話框，以便您可以對其進行編輯。

segment.source: Manual Activation
segment.target: 手動啟用

segment.source: You can manually activate a profile by selecting a profile and pressing the Manual activate button.
segment.target: 您可選擇一個設定檔後按「手動啟用」按鈕即可手動啟用這個設定檔，

segment.source: Once activated, other profiles can still be activated due to triggers, but any settings in the manually activated profile will override them.
segment.target: 一旦啟用後其他設定檔仍然可因觸發器而被啟用，但在手動啟用設定檔中調整的設定會覆蓋它們。

segment.source: For example, if a profile is triggered for the current application and reporting of links is enabled in that profile but disabled it in the manually activated profile, links will not be reported.
segment.target: 例如目前的應用程式觸發一個設定檔，在該設定檔中啟用了讀出連結，但在手動啟用的設定檔中則是停用讀出連結，那麼連結將不會被讀出，

segment.source: However, if you have changed the voice in the triggered profile but have never changed it in the manually activated profile, the voice from the triggered profile will be used.
segment.target: 然而您在觸發的設定檔中變更語音，但是從未在手動啟用的設定檔中變更過語音，那麼將使用觸發的設定檔中的語音。

segment.source: Any settings you change will be saved in the manually activated profile.
segment.target: 您更改的任何設定都將儲存在手動啟用的設定檔中。

segment.source: To deactivate a manually activated profile, select it in the Configuration Profiles dialog and press the Manual deactivate button.
segment.target: 要停用手動啟用的設定檔，在「組態設定檔」對話框中選擇該設定檔後按「手動停用」按鈕。

segment.source: Triggers
segment.target: 觸發器

segment.source: Pressing the Triggers button in the Configuration Profiles dialog allows you to change the profiles which should be automatically activated for various triggers.
segment.target: 在「組態設定檔」對話框中按下「觸發器」按鈕允許您變更由各種不同觸發器自動啟用的設定檔。

segment.source: The Triggers list shows the available triggers, which are as follows:
segment.target: 觸發器清單顯示可用的觸發器，如下所示：

segment.source: Current application: Triggered when you switch to the current application.
segment.target: 目前的應用程式：切換到目前的應用程式時觸發。

segment.source: Say all: Triggered while reading with the say all command.
segment.target: 讀出全部：使用讀出全部指令時觸發。

segment.source: To change the profile which should be automatically activated for a trigger, select the trigger and then select the desired profile from the Profile list.
segment.target: 要變更由觸發器自動啟用的設定檔，先選擇觸發器，然後從設定檔清單中選擇所需的設定檔，

segment.source: You can select "(normal configuration)" if you don't want a profile to be used.
segment.target: 如果您不想要使用設定檔可選擇「一般組態」。

segment.source: Press the Close button to return to the Configuration Profiles dialog.
segment.target: 按「關閉」按鈕以回到「組態設定檔」對話框。

segment.source: Editing a Profile
segment.target: 編輯設定檔

segment.source: If you have manually activated a profile, any settings you change will be saved to that profile.
segment.target: 如果您已經手動啟用設定檔，您進行設定上的變更都將儲存在該設定檔中，

segment.source: Otherwise, any settings you change will be saved to the most recently triggered profile.
segment.target: 否則所有您變更的設定將會儲存到最近觸發的設定檔中。

segment.source: For example, if you have associated a profile with the Notepad application and you switch to Notepad, any changed settings will be saved to that profile.
segment.target: 舉例來說，如果您已將設定檔與記事本應用程式關聯並切換到記事本，任何設定的變更均會儲存於此設定檔。

segment.source: Finally, if there is neither a manually activated nor a triggered profile, any settings you change will be saved to your normal configuration.
segment.target: 最後，如果沒有手動啟用或觸發的設定檔，則所有的設定變更會儲存到「一般組態」設定檔中。

segment.source: To edit the profile associated with say all, you must [manually activate](#ConfigProfileManual) that profile.
segment.target: 要編輯與「讀出全部」關連的設定檔，您需要[手動啟用](#ConfigProfileManual)該設定檔。

segment.source: Temporarily Disabling Triggers
segment.target: 暫時停用觸發器

segment.source: Sometimes, it is useful to temporarily disable all triggers.
segment.target: 有時將所有的觸發器暫時停用對於操作是有幫助的，

segment.source: For example, you might wish to edit a manually activated profile or your normal configuration without triggered profiles interfering.
segment.target: 例如您也許想編輯手動啟用的設定檔或一般組態而不要受到自動觸發設定檔的干擾，

segment.source: You can do this by checking the Temporarily disable all triggers checkbox in the Configuration Profiles dialog.
segment.target: 那麼您可以開啟「組態設定檔」對話框，將「暫時停用所有的觸發器」核取方塊勾選以達此目的。

segment.source: To toggle disabling triggers from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方切換停用觸發器，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢。

segment.source: Activating a profile using input gestures
segment.target: 使用輸入手勢啟用設定檔

segment.source: For every profile you add, you are able to assign one or more input gestures to activate it.
segment.target: 對於每個新增的設定檔，您可以指派一個或多個輸入手勢來啟用它們，

segment.source: By default, configuration profiles do not have input gestures assigned.
segment.target: 預設情況下組態設定檔並沒有指派任何輸入手勢，

segment.source: You can add gestures to activate a profile using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 您可以在[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)中新增手勢來啟用設定檔。

segment.source: Every profile has its own entry under the configuration profiles category.
segment.target: 每個設定檔在「組態設定檔」類別中都有自己的項目，

segment.source: When you rename a profile, any gesture you added previously will still be available.
segment.target: 當您重新命名設定檔，原先的手勢依然有效，

segment.source: Removing a profile will automatically delete the gestures associated with it.
segment.target: 刪除設定檔將會自動刪除關聯的手勢。

segment.source: Location of Configuration files
segment.target: 組態檔案位置

segment.source: Portable versions of NVDA store all settings and add-ons in a directory called userConfig, found in the NVDA directory.
segment.target: NVDA 的可攜式版本將所有的設定、附加元件均儲存在 NVDA 目錄下一個名為 userConfig 的目錄中。

segment.source: Installed versions of NVDA store all settings and add-ons in a special NVDA directory located in your Windows user profile.
segment.target: NVDA 的安裝版本將所有設定及附加元件儲存在 Windows 使用者設定檔中一個特殊的 NVDA 目錄，

segment.source: This means that each user on the system can have their own NVDA settings.
segment.target: 這表示在 Windows 系統中每一個使用者都可以擁有自己的 NVDA 設定。

segment.source: To open your settings directory from anywhere you can use [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures) to add a custom gesture.
segment.target: 要在任何地方開啟您的設定目錄，可以使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢，

segment.source: In addition for an installed version of NVDA, on the start menu you can go to programs -> NVDA -> explore user configuration directory.
segment.target: 此外對於 NVDA 的安裝版本，您可以從「開始」功能表進到「所有應用程式」清單的「NVDA」中找到「開啟 NVDA 使用者組態目錄」來開啟。

segment.source: Settings for NVDA when running during sign-in or on UAC screens are stored in the systemConfig directory in NVDA's installation directory.
segment.target: 關於登入或使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 畫面中的 NVDA 設定是儲存在 NVDA 安裝目錄中的 systemConfig 目錄下，

segment.source: Usually, this configuration should not be touched.
segment.target: 通常不應該直接觸碰這裡的組態，

segment.source: To change NVDA's configuration during sign-in or on UAC screens, configure NVDA as you wish while signed into Windows, save the configuration, and then press the "use currently saved settings during sign-in and on secure screens" button in the General category of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog.
segment.target: 要更改在登入或使用者帳戶控制畫面的 NVDA 組態，您必須先登入 Windows，根據需要設定 NVDA 並儲存組態，然後從 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框的「一般」類別中按「在登入或安全畫面使用目前儲存的設定」按鈕。

segment.source: Add-ons and the Add-on Store
segment.target: 附加元件及附加元件商店

segment.source: Add-ons are software packages which provide new or altered functionality for NVDA.
segment.target: 附加元件是為 NVDA 提供新功能或更改功能的軟體套件，

segment.source: They are developed by the NVDA community, and external organisations such as commercial vendors.
segment.target: 它們由 NVDA 社群和外部組織如商業供應商開發。

segment.source: Add-ons may do any of the following:
segment.target: 附加元件可以做到以下的事：

segment.source: Add or enhance support for certain applications.
segment.target: 增加或加強對某些應用程式的支援。

segment.source: Provide support for extra Braille displays or speech synthesizers.
segment.target: 提供對點顯器或語音合成器的額外支援。

segment.source: Add or change features in NVDA.
segment.target: 增加或變更 NVDA 中的功能。

segment.source: NVDA's Add-on Store allows you to browse and manage add-on packages.
segment.target: NVDA 附加元件商店允許您瀏覽及管理附加元件，

segment.source: All add-ons that are available in the Add-on Store can be downloaded for free.
segment.target: 附加元件商店中提供的所有附加元件都可以免費下載，

segment.source: However, some of them may require users to pay for a license or additional software before they can be used.
segment.target: 不過它們有些可能會要求使用者在使用之前支付授權或軟體費用，

segment.source: Commercial speech synthesizers are an example of this type of add-on.
segment.target: 商業語音合成器即為此類附加元件的一個例子，

segment.source: If you install an add-on with paid components and change your mind about using it, the add-on can be easily removed.
segment.target: 如果您安裝了需要付費的附加元件後不打算使用，可以很容易的就移除該附加元件。

segment.source: The Add-on Store is accessed from the Tools submenu of the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 附加元件商店可從 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表找到，

segment.source: To access the Add-on Store from anywhere, assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方開啟附加元件商店，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢。

segment.source: Browsing add-ons
segment.target: 瀏覽附加元件

segment.source: When opened, the Add-on Store displays a list of add-ons.
segment.target: 附加元件商店開啟後會顯示附加元件清單，

segment.source: If you have not installed an add-on before, the Add-on Store will open to a list of add-ons available to install.
segment.target: 如果您之前未安裝過附加元件，附加元件商店將打開可安裝的附加元件清單，

segment.source: If you have installed add-ons, the list will display currently installed add-ons.
segment.target: 如果您已安裝過附加元件，清單將顯示目前安裝的附加元件。

segment.source: Selecting an add-on, by moving to it with the up and down arrow keys, will display the details for the add-on.
segment.target: 使用向上鍵和向下鍵移動並選擇附加元件會顯示該附加元件的詳細資料，

segment.source: Add-ons have associated actions that you can access through an [actions menu](#AddonStoreActions), such as install, help, disable, and remove.
segment.target: 附加元件具有關聯的動作，您可以透過[動作功能表](#AddonStoreActions)來執行這些動作，例如安裝、說明、停用和移除，

segment.source: Available actions will change based on whether the add-on is installed or not, and whether it is enabled or disabled.
segment.target: 可用的動作將根據附加元件是否安裝及是否啟用或停用而改變。

segment.source: Add-on list views
segment.target: 附加元件清單檢視

segment.source: There are different views for installed, updatable, available and incompatible add-ons.
segment.target: 對於已安裝、可更新、可用和不相容附加元件有不同的檢視畫面，

segment.source: To change the view of add-ons, change the active tab of the add-ons list using `ctrl+tab`.
segment.target: 要變更附加元件的檢視，請使用 Ctrl+Tab 變更附加元件清單的索引標籤，

segment.source: You can also `tab` to the list of views, and move through them with the `leftArrow` and `rightArrow` keys.
segment.target: 您也可以按 Tab 到檢視清單，並使用向左鍵或向右鍵在它們之間移動。

segment.source: Filtering for enabled or disabled add-ons
segment.target: 篩選啟用或停用的附加元件

segment.source: Normally, an installed add-on is "enabled", meaning that it is running and available within NVDA.
segment.target: 通常安裝的附加元件處於「啟用」狀態，表示正在 NVDA 中執行且可用，

segment.source: However, some of your installed add-ons may be set to the "disabled" state.
segment.target: 不過某些您安裝的附加元件可能被設為「停用」狀態，

segment.source: This means that they will not be used, and their functions won't be available during your current NVDA session.
segment.target: 這表示它們將不會被使用，並且在目前的 NVDA 階段期間它們的功能不可用。

segment.source: You may have disabled an add-on because it conflicted with another add-on, or with a certain application.
segment.target: 您有可能因為某個附加元件與另一個附加元件或某個應用程式衝突而將它停用。

segment.source: NVDA may also disable certain add-ons, if they are found to be incompatible during an NVDA upgrade; though you will be warned if this is going to happen.
segment.target: 如果在 NVDA 升級過程中發現某些附加元件不相容，NVDA 也可能會停用它們，若是這種情況您會收到警告。

segment.source: Add-ons can also be disabled if you simply don't need them for a prolonged period, but don't want to uninstall them because you expect to want them again in the future.
segment.target: 如果您僅是長時間不需要某些附加元件，但未來可能會需要而不想將它們移除，也可以將它們停用。

segment.source: The lists of installed and incompatible add-ons can be filtered by their enabled or disabled state.
segment.target: 已安裝和不相容的附加元件清單可以依照其啟用或停用狀態來篩選，

segment.source: The default shows both enabled and disabled add-ons.
segment.target: 預設會同時顯示啟用和停用的附加元件。

segment.source: Include incompatible add-ons
segment.target: 包含不相容附加元件

segment.source: Available and updatable add-ons can be filtered to include [incompatible add-ons](#incompatibleAddonsManager) that are available to install.
segment.target: 當篩選可用和可更新的附加元件時會包含那些可安裝的[不相容附加元件](#incompatibleAddonsManager)。

segment.source: Filter add-ons by channel
segment.target: 依照通道篩選附加元件

segment.source: Add-ons can be distributed through up to four channels:
segment.target: 附加元件可以透過最多四個通道分發：

segment.source: Stable: The developer has released this as a tested add-on with a released version of NVDA.
segment.target: 穩定：已經過開發者在 NVDA 發行版進行測試而後發行的附加元件。

segment.source: Beta: This add-on may need further testing, but is released for user feedback.
segment.target: Beta：此附加元件可能需要進一步測試，但已發行讓使用者提供回饋，

segment.source: Suggested for early adopters.
segment.target: 建議提供給初期想要嘗試的使用者。

segment.source: Dev: This channel is suggested to be used by add-on developers to test unreleased API changes.
segment.target: Dev：建議附加元件開發者使用此通道來測試尚未發行的 API 變更，

segment.source: NVDA alpha testers may need to use a "Dev" version of their add-ons.
segment.target: NVDA alpha 測試者可能需要使用其附加元件的 dev 版本。

segment.source: External: Add-ons installed from external sources, outside of the Add-on Store.
segment.target: 外部：從附加元件商店以外的外部來源安裝的附加元件。

segment.source: To list add-ons only for specific channels, change the "Channel" filter selection.
segment.target: 要列出特定通道的附加元件，請從「通道」篩選器中選擇。

segment.source: Searching for add-ons
segment.target: 搜尋附加元件

segment.source: To search add-ons, use the "Search" text box.
segment.target: 要搜尋附加元件，請使用「搜尋」文字方塊，

segment.source: You can reach it by pressing `shift+tab` from the list of add-ons.
segment.target: 您可以在附加元件清單上按 Shift+Tab 移到該處，

segment.source: Type a keyword or two for the kind of add-on you're looking for, then `tab` to the list of add-ons.
segment.target: 針對您要尋找的附加元件輸入一兩個關鍵字，接著按 Tab 移到附加元件清單，

segment.source: Add-ons will be listed if the search text can be found in the add-on ID, display name, publisher, author or description.
segment.target: 如果可以在附加元件 ID、顯示名稱、發行者、作者或簡介中找到搜尋文字，則這些附加元件會被列出來。

segment.source: Add-on actions
segment.target: 附加元件動作

segment.source: Add-ons have associated actions, such as install, help, disable, and remove.
segment.target: 附加元件具有關聯的動作，例如安裝、說明、停用及刪除，

segment.source: For an add-on in the add-on list, these actions can be accessed through a menu opened by pressing the `applications` key, `enter`, right clicking or double clicking the add-on.
segment.target: 對於附加元件清單中的附加元件，可以透過按快顯鍵、Enter 鍵、點擊滑鼠右鍵或點擊左鍵兩下打開功能表找到這些動作，

segment.source: This menu can also be accessed through an Actions button in the selected add-on's details.
segment.target: 此功能表也可以透過按所選取附加元件詳細資料中的「動作」按鈕來打開。

segment.source: Installing add-ons
segment.target: 安裝附加元件

segment.source: Just because an add-on is available in the NVDA Add-on Store, does not mean that it has been approved or vetted by NV Access or anyone else.
segment.target: 正由於 NVDA 附加元件商店中提供的附加元件不代表已獲得 NV Access 或其他任何人的認可或審查，

segment.source: It is very important to only install add-ons from sources you trust.
segment.target: 因此僅安裝來自您信任來源的附加元件非常重要。

segment.source: The functionality of add-ons is unrestricted inside NVDA.
segment.target: 附加元件的功能在 NVDA 內是不受限制的，

segment.source: This could include accessing your personal data or even the entire system.
segment.target: 這可以包括存取您的個人資料甚至整個系統。

segment.source: You can install and update add-ons by [browsing Available add-ons](#AddonStoreBrowsing).
segment.target: 您可以透過[瀏覽可用的附加元件](#AddonStoreBrowsing)來安裝及更新附加元件，

segment.source: Select an add-on from the "Available add-ons" or "Updatable add-ons" tab.
segment.target: 在「可用的附加元件」或「可更新的附加元件」索引標籤中選擇一個附加元件，

segment.source: Then use the update, install, or replace action to start the installation.
segment.target: 然後使用更新、安裝或取代動作開始安裝。

segment.source: You can also install multiple add-ons at once.
segment.target: 您也可以一次安裝多個附加元件，

segment.source: This can be done by selecting multiple add-ons in the available add-ons tab, then activating the context menu on the selection and choosing the "Install selected add-ons" action.
segment.target: 在可用的附加元件索引標籤中選擇多個附加元件，然後開啟所選內容的快顯功能表並選擇「安裝選取的附加元件」動作。

segment.source: To install an add-on you have obtained outside of the Add-on Store, press the "Install from external source" button.
segment.target: 要安裝從附加元件商店外部獲得的附加元件，請按「從外部來源安裝」按鈕。

segment.source: This will allow you to browse for an add-on package (`.nvda-addon` file) somewhere on your computer or on a network.
segment.target: 這將允許您從您的電腦或網路上的位置瀏覽附加元件 (.nvda-addon 檔案)，

segment.source: Once you open the add-on package, the installation process will begin.
segment.target: 開啟附加元件檔案後將開始安裝程序。

segment.source: If NVDA is installed and running on your system, you can also open an add-on file directly from the browser or file system to begin the installation process.
segment.target: 如果在您的 Windows 系統上已安裝並執行 NVDA，您也可以直接從瀏覽器或檔案系統開啟附加元件檔案以開始安裝程序。

segment.source: When an add-on is being installed from an external source, NVDA will ask you to confirm the installation.
segment.target: 從外部來源安裝附加元件時，NVDA 會要求您確認是否安裝。

segment.source: Once the add-on is installed, NVDA must be restarted for the add-on to start running, although you may postpone restarting NVDA if you have other add-ons to install or update.
segment.target: 安裝附加元件後必須重新啟動 NVDA 才能使附加元件開始執行，但如果您有其他附加元件需要安裝或更新，則可以延後重新啟動 NVDA。

segment.source: By default, after NVDA startup, you will be notified if any add-on updates are available.
segment.target: 預設情況下，NVDA 啟動後如果有任何可用的附加元件更新您就會收到通知，

segment.source: To learn more about and configure this behaviour, refer to ["Update Notifications"](#AutomaticAddonUpdates).
segment.target: 要了解有關此行為的更多資訊及設定，請參考[「更新通知」](#AutomaticAddonUpdates)。

segment.source: Removing Add-ons
segment.target: 移除附加元件

segment.source: To remove an add-on, select the add-on from the list and use the Remove action.
segment.target: 要移除附加元件，請從清單中選擇附加元件並使用「移除」動作，

segment.source: NVDA will ask you to confirm removal.
segment.target: NVDA 將要求您確認移除，

segment.source: As with installing, NVDA must be restarted for the add-on to be fully removed.
segment.target: 與安裝一樣必須重新啟動 NVDA 才能完全移除附加元件，

segment.source: Until you do, a status of "Pending removal" will be shown for that add-on in the list.
segment.target: 在此之前，清單中附加元件的狀態將顯示為「等待移除」。

segment.source: As with installing, you can also remove multiple add-ons at once.
segment.target: 與安裝一樣，您也可以一次移除多個附加元件。

segment.source: Disabling and Enabling Add-ons
segment.target: 停用及啟用附加元件

segment.source: To disable an add-on, use the "disable" action.
segment.target: 要停用附加元件，請使用「停用」動作，

segment.source: To enable a previously disabled add-on, use the "enable" action.
segment.target: 要啟用先前停用的附加元件，請使用「啟用」動作。

segment.source: You can disable an add-on if the add-on status indicates it is "enabled", or enable it if the add-on is "disabled".
segment.target: 如果附加元件狀態指示為「啟用」，您可以停用該附加元件；如果附加元件為「停用」則可以啟用它。

segment.source: For each use of the enable/disable action, add-on status changes to indicate what will happen when NVDA restarts.
segment.target: 每次使用啟用/停用動作，附加元件狀態都會改變以表明 NVDA 重新啟動會發生什麼事，

segment.source: If the add-on was previously "disabled", the status will show "enabled after restart".
segment.target: 如果附加元件先前為「停用」，狀態將顯示「已啟用，等待重新啟動」；

segment.source: If the add-on was previously "enabled", the status will show "disabled after restart".
segment.target: 如果附加元件先前為「啟用」，狀態將顯示「已停用，等待重新啟動」。

segment.source: Just like when you install or remove add-ons, you need to restart NVDA in order for changes to take effect.
segment.target: 就像安裝或移除附加元件一樣，您需要重新啟動 NVDA 才能使變更生效。

segment.source: You can also enable or disable multiple add-ons at once by selecting multiple add-ons in the available add-ons tab, then activating the context menu on the selection and choosing the appropriate action.
segment.target: 您也可以透過在可用的附加元件索引標籤中選擇多個附加元件，然後開啟所選內容的快顯功能表並選擇適當的動作，來一次啟用或停用多個附加元件。

segment.source: Reviewing add-ons and reading reviews
segment.target: 評論附加元件與閱讀評論

segment.source: You may want to read reviews by other users who have experienced an add-on, for example before you install it, or as you are learning to use it.
segment.target: 當您在安裝附加元件之前或正在學習使用附加元件時，您可能會想閱讀其他人的評論，

segment.source: Also, it is helpful to other users to provide feedback about add-ons you have tried.
segment.target: 此外，針對您嘗試過的附加元件提供回饋對其他使用者能夠有所幫助。

segment.source: To read reviews for an add-on, select it, and use the "Community reviews" action.
segment.target: 要閱讀附加元件的評論，請選擇一個附加元件，然後使用「社群評論」動作，

segment.source: This links to a GitHub Discussion webpage, where you will be able to read and write reviews for the add-on.
segment.target: 這會連結至 GitHub 討論網頁，您可以在其中閱讀和撰寫該附加元件的評論。

segment.source: Please be aware that this doesn't replace direct communication with add-on developers.
segment.target: 請注意，這並不能取代與附加元件開發者的直接溝通，

segment.source: Instead, the purpose of this feature is to share feedback to help users decide if an add-on may be useful for them.
segment.target: 此功能的目的反而是分享回饋，以幫助使用者決定附加元件是否對他們有用。

segment.source: Incompatible Add-ons
segment.target: 不相容附加元件

segment.source: Some older add-ons may no longer be compatible with the version of NVDA that you have.
segment.target: 有些較舊的附加元件可能不再與您擁有的 NVDA 版本相容，

segment.source: If you are using an older version of NVDA, some newer add-ons may not be compatible either.
segment.target: 如果您使用的是舊版的 NVDA，有些較新的附加元件可能也不相容，

segment.source: Attempting to install an incompatible add-on will result in an error explaining why the add-on is considered incompatible.
segment.target: 嘗試安裝不相容附加元件將出現錯誤說明為何附加元件被認為不相容。

segment.source: For older add-ons, you can override the incompatibility at your own risk.
segment.target: 對於較舊的附加元件，您可以在自行承擔風險的情況下忽略不相容，

segment.source: Incompatible add-ons may not work with your version of NVDA, and can cause unstable or unexpected behaviour including crashing.
segment.target: 不相容附加元件可能無法與您的 NVDA 版本一起使用，並可能導致不穩定或包括崩潰在內的非預期行為。

segment.source: You can override compatibility when enabling or installing an add-on.
segment.target: 您可以在啟用或安裝附加元件時忽略相容性，

segment.source: If the incompatible add-on causes issues later, you can disable or remove it.
segment.target: 如果不相容附加元件在之後引發問題，您可以停用或移除它。

segment.source: If you are having trouble running NVDA, and you have recently updated or installed an add-on, especially if it is an incompatible add-on, you may want to try running NVDA temporarily with all add-ons disabled.
segment.target: 如果您在執行 NVDA 時遇到問題，並且最近更新或安裝了附加元件，特別是不相容附加元件，您可能想嘗試暫時在停用所有附加元件的情況下使用 NVDA，

segment.source: To restart NVDA with all add-ons disabled, choose the appropriate option when quitting NVDA.
segment.target: 要在停用所有附加元件的情況下重新啟動 NVDA，請在結束 NVDA 時選擇適當的選項，

segment.source: Alternatively, use the [command line option](#CommandLineOptions) `--disable-addons`.
segment.target: 或者使用[命令列選項](#CommandLineOptions) `--disable-addons`。

segment.source: You can browse available incompatible add-ons using the [available and updatable add-ons tabs](#AddonStoreFilterStatus).
segment.target: 您可以使用[可用及可更新的附加元件索引標籤](#AddonStoreFilterStatus)瀏覽可用的不相容附加元件；

segment.source: You can browse installed incompatible add-ons using the [incompatible add-ons tab](#AddonStoreFilterStatus).
segment.target: 您可以使用[不相容附加元件索引標籤](#AddonStoreFilterStatus)瀏覽安裝的不相容附加元件。

segment.source: Extra Tools
segment.target: 額外工具

segment.source: Log Viewer
segment.target: 事件記錄檢視器

segment.source: The log viewer, found under Tools in the NVDA menu, allows you to view the logging output that has occurred since the latest session of NVDA was started.
segment.target: 在 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表的「檢視事件記錄」，允許您檢視自上次啟動 NVDA 後到現在所有發生的輸出記錄，

segment.source: Apart from reading the content, you can also Save a copy of the log file, or refresh the viewer so that it loads new log output generated after the Log viewer was opened.
segment.target: 除了閱讀內容外，您也可以儲存事件記錄，或重新整理檢視器以顯示自開啟事件記錄檢示器之後的最新輸出內容，

segment.source: These actions are available under the Log menu in the log viewer.
segment.target: 這些操作都可以從開啟「事件記錄」的功能表中執行。

segment.source: The file which is displayed when you open the log viewer is saved on your computer at the file location `%temp%\nvda.log`.
segment.target: 開啟事件記錄檢視器時所顯示的檔案儲存在電腦上的「%temp%\nvda.log」，

segment.source: A new log file is created each time NVDA is started.
segment.target: 每次啟動 NVDA 都會建立一個新的事件記錄檔，

segment.source: When this happens, the previous NVDA session's log file is moved to `%temp%\nvda-old.log`.
segment.target: 此時前一個 NVDA 階段的記錄檔將移至「%temp%\nvda-old.log」。

segment.source: You can also copy a fragment of the current log file to the clipboard without opening the log viewer.
segment.target: 您也可以將目前事件記錄檔的片段複製到剪貼簿而不需開啟事件記錄檢視器來複製。

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Open log viewer |`NVDA+f1` |Opens the log viewer and displays developer information about the current navigator object.
segment.target: 開啟事件記錄檢視器 |NVDA+F1 |開啟事件記錄檢視器並顯示有關目前導覽物件的開發者資訊。

segment.source: Copy a fragment of the log to the clipboard |`NVDA+control+shift+f1` |When this command is pressed once, it sets a starting point for the log content that should be captured. When pressed a second time, it copies the log content since the start point to your clipboard.
segment.target: 複製事件記錄片段到剪貼簿 |NVDA+Ctrl+Shift+F1 |第一次按下此指令會設定應截取事件記錄內容的起始點，按下第二次會覆製從起始點開始的事件記錄內容到剪貼簿。

segment.source: Speech Viewer
segment.target: 語音檢視器

segment.source: For sighted software developers or people demoing NVDA to sighted audiences, a floating window is available that allows you to view all the text that NVDA is currently speaking.
segment.target: 對於有視力的軟體開發者或是為了向有視力的人示範 NVDA，「語音檢視器」的浮動視窗允許您看到目前 NVDA 正在讀出的所有文字。

segment.source: To enable the speech viewer, check the "Speech Viewer" menu item under Tools in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 要啟用語音檢視器，可以從 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表勾選「語音檢視器」項目，

segment.source: Uncheck the menu item to disable it.
segment.target: 取消勾選則停用。

segment.source: The speech viewer window contains a check box labelled "Show speech viewer on startup".
segment.target: 語音檢視器視窗包含一個「啟動時顯示語音檢視器」的核取方塊，

segment.source: If this is checked, the speech viewer will open when NVDA is started.
segment.target: 若勾選則 NVDA 啟動時語音檢視器也會開啟，

segment.source: The speech viewer window will always attempt to re-open with the same dimensions and location as when it was closed.
segment.target: 語音檢視器視窗每次開啟時其大小與位置會與前一次關閉時相同。

segment.source: While the speech viewer is enabled, it constantly updates to show you the most current text being spoken.
segment.target: 當語音檢視器啟用後會持續更新以顯示目前讀出的文字，

segment.source: However, if you hover your mouse over or focus inside the viewer, NVDA will temporarily stop updating the text, so that you are able to easily select or copy the existing content.
segment.target: 但在滑鼠停留或焦點移到此浮動視窗內則 NVDA 將暫時停止更新，此時您能夠方便的選取或複製現有的內容。

segment.source: To toggle the speech viewer from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方開關語音檢視器，請使用[輸入手勢](#InputGestures)對話框來指派手勢。

segment.source: Braille Viewer
segment.target: 點字檢視器

segment.source: For sighted software developers or people demoing NVDA to sighted audiences, a floating window is available that allows you to view braille output, and the text equivalent for each braille character.
segment.target: 對於有視力的軟體開發者或是為了向有視力的人示範 NVDA，「點字檢視器」的浮動視窗允許您看到點字的輸出，呈現的是點字的字元。

segment.source: The braille viewer can be used at the same time as a physical braille display, it will match the number of cells on the physical device.
segment.target: 點字檢視器可以和實體的點顯器同時使用，且會與點顯器上顯示的點字方數相同，

segment.source: While the braille viewer is enabled, it constantly updates to show you the braille that would be displayed on a physical braille display.
segment.target: 點字檢視器啟用後會不斷地更新以顯示目前在實體點顯器上所顯示的點字內容。

segment.source: To enable the braille viewer, check the "Braille Viewer" menu item under Tools in the NVDA menu.
segment.target: 要啟用點字檢視器，可在 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表勾選「點字檢視器」項目，

segment.source: Uncheck the menu item to disable it.
segment.target: 取消勾選則停用。

segment.source: Physical braille displays typically have buttons to scroll forwards or backwards, to enable scrolling with the braille viewer tool use the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures) to assign keyboard shortcuts which "Scrolls the braille display back" and "Scrolls the braille display forward"
segment.target: 實體的點顯器通常具有向下或向上捲動的按鈕，要在點字檢視器上啟用捲動效果，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派「點顯器向上捲動」及「點顯器向下捲動」這兩項的快速鍵。

segment.source: The braille viewer window contains a check box labelled "Show braille viewer on startup".
segment.target: 點字檢視器視窗包含一個「啟動時顯示點字檢視器」的核取方塊，

segment.source: If this is checked, the braille viewer will open when NVDA is started.
segment.target: 若勾選則 NVDA 啟動時點字檢視器也會開啟，

segment.source: The braille viewer window will always attempt to re-open with the same dimensions and location as when it was closed.
segment.target: 點字檢視器視窗每次開啟時其大小與位置會與前一次關閉時相同。

segment.source: The braille viewer window contains a check box labeled "Hover for cell routing", the default is unchecked.
segment.target: 點字檢視器視窗包含一個「停留滑鼠以定位點字方」的核取方塊，預設是沒勾選，

segment.source: If checked, hovering the mouse over a braille cell will enable trigger the "route to braille cell" command for that cell.
segment.target: 若勾選則滑鼠停留於某個點字方上會觸發該點字方的游標定位指令，

segment.source: This is often used to move the caret or trigger the action for a control.
segment.target: 通常這是用來移動游標或觸發控制項的動作，

segment.source: This can be useful for testing NVDA is able to correctly reverse map a from braille cell.
segment.target: 此功能適用於測試 NVDA 是否可正確地從點字方對應到所顯示的點字上。

segment.source: To prevent unintentionally routing to cells, the command is delayed.
segment.target: 為了避免不小心觸發游標定位功能，此指令設計會稍微延遲些，

segment.source: The mouse must hover until the cell turns green.
segment.target: 滑鼠必須停留在點字方上直到它變為綠色，

segment.source: The cell will start as a light yellow colour, transition to orange, then suddenly become green.
segment.target: 點字方先是從淺黃色轉為橘色，再變為綠色才表示觸發。

segment.source: To toggle the braille viewer from anywhere, please assign a custom gesture using the [Input Gestures dialog](#InputGestures).
segment.target: 要在任何地方開關點字檢視器，請使用[輸入手勢對話框](#InputGestures)來指派手勢。

segment.source: Python Console
segment.target: Python 主控台

segment.source: The NVDA Python console, found under Tools in the NVDA menu, is a development tool which is useful for debugging, general inspection of NVDA internals or inspection of the accessibility hierarchy of an application.
segment.target: 在 NVDA 功能表的「工具」子功能表的「Python 主控台」是一個很有用的開發工具，可作為偵錯、NVDA 內部的一般檢查，或是應用程式的可及性階層架構檢查，

segment.source: For more information, please see the [NVDA Developer Guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html).
segment.target: 要了解更多資訊請參見 [NVDA 開發者指南](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html)。

segment.source: Add-on Store
segment.target: 附加元件商店

segment.source: This will open the [NVDA Add-on Store](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 這將開啟 [NVDA 附加元件商店](#AddonsManager)，

segment.source: For more information, read the in-depth section: [Add-ons and the Add-on Store](#AddonsManager).
segment.target: 要了解更多資訊請閱讀[附加元件和附加元件商店](#AddonsManager)章節的深入說明。

segment.source: Create portable copy
segment.target: 建立可攜式版

segment.source: This will open a dialog which allows you to create a portable copy of NVDA out of the currently running version.
segment.target: 這將會開啟一個對話框允許您從目前執行的版本建立 NVDA 可攜式版。

segment.source: Follow the directions in [Creating a portable copy](#CreatingAPortableCopy) for more information.
segment.target: 有關祥細資訊請按照[建立可攜式版](#CreatingAPortableCopy)一節中的說明進行操作。

segment.source: Run COM registration fixing tool...
segment.target: 執行 COM 註冊修復工具...

segment.source: Installing and uninstalling programs on a computer can, in certain cases, cause COM DLL files to get unregistered.
segment.target: 在電腦上安裝或移除程式於某些情況下可能會導致 COM DLL 檔案的註冊關聯被取消，

segment.source: As COM Interfaces such as IAccessible depend on correct COM DLL registrations, issues can appear in case the correct registration is missing.
segment.target: 由於 COM 介面例如 IAccessible 仰賴 COM DLL 的正確註冊，因此遺失註冊時可能會出現問題。

segment.source: This can happen i.e. after installing and uninstalling Adobe Reader, Math Player and other programs.
segment.target: 這可能會發生在安裝或移除 Adobe Reader、Math Player 及其他應用程式之後。

segment.source: The missing registration can cause issues in browsers, desktop apps, task bar and other interfaces.
segment.target: 遺失的註冊可能會導致瀏覽器、桌面應用程式、工作列和其他介面出現問題。

segment.source: Specifically, following issues can be solved by running this tool:
segment.target: 具體來說執行此工具可以解決下列問題：

segment.source: NVDA reports "unknown" when navigating in browsers such as Firefox, Thunderbird etc.
segment.target: 在 Firefox、Thunderbird 等瀏覽器中導覽時 NVDA 提示「不明」

segment.source: NVDA fails to switch between focus mode and browse mode
segment.target: NVDA 無法在焦點模式與瀏覽模式之間切換

segment.source: NVDA is very slow when navigating in browsers while using browse mode
segment.target: 使用瀏覽模式在瀏覽器中導覽時 NVDA 的反應變很慢

segment.source: And possibly other issues.
segment.target: 其他一些可能的問題

segment.source: Reload plugins
segment.target: 重新載入外掛程式

segment.source: This item, once activated, reloads app modules and global plugins without restarting NVDA, which can be useful for developers.
segment.target: 一但執行此項目，可不需重新啟動 NVDA 就可重新載入應用程式模組及全域外掛程式，此功能對於程式開發者很有助益。

segment.source: App modules manage how NVDA interacts with specific applications.
segment.target: 應用程式模組管理 NVDA 如何與特定應用程式互動，

segment.source: Global plugins manage how NVDA interacts with all applications.
segment.target: 全域外掛程式則是管理 NVDA 如何與所有應用程式互動。

segment.source: The following NVDA key commands may also be useful:
segment.target: 以下 NVDA 快速鍵也可能有用：

segment.source: Name |Key |Description
segment.target: 名稱 |快速鍵 |說明

segment.source: Reload plugins |`NVDA+control+f3` |Reloads NVDA's global plugins and app modules.
segment.target: 重新載入外掛程式 |NVDA+Ctrl+F3 |重新載入 NVDA 全域外掛程式及應用程式模組。

segment.source: Report loaded app module and executable |`NVDA+control+f1` |Report the name of the app module, if any, and the name of the executable associated with the application which has the keyboard focus.
segment.target: 讀出載入的應用程式模組和執行檔 |NVDA+Ctrl+F1 |如果有的話，讀出應用程式模組的名稱以及鍵盤焦點所在應用程式關聯的執行檔名稱。

segment.source: Supported Speech Synthesizers
segment.target: 支援的語音合成器

segment.source: This section contains information about the speech synthesizers supported by NVDA.
segment.target: 本章節包含有關 NVDA 支援的語音合成器的資訊，

segment.source: For an even more extensive list of free and commercial synthesizers that you can purchase and download for use with NVDA, please see the [extra voices page](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/wiki/ExtraVoices).
segment.target: 要獲得更多可用於 NVDA 的免費及商用的合成器清單並可購買和下載，請參見 [extra voices page](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/wiki/ExtraVoices)。

segment.source: eSpeak NG
segment.target: eSpeak NG

segment.source: The [eSpeak NG](https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng) synthesizer is built directly into NVDA and does not require any other special drivers or components to be installed.
segment.target: [eSpeak NG](https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng) 合成器直接內建於 NVDA，不需安裝任何其他的驅動程式或元件，

segment.source: On Windows 8.1 NVDA uses eSpeak NG by default ([Windows OneCore](#OneCore) is used in Windows 10 and later by default).
segment.target: 在 Windows 8.1，NVDA 預設使用 eSpeak NG (在 Windows 10 及之後的版本預設使用 [Windows OneCore](#OneCore))，

segment.source: As this synthesizer is built into NVDA, this is a great choice for when running NVDA off a USB thumb drive on other systems.
segment.target: 由於此合成器內建於 NVDA 中，對於在其他 Windows 系統上從 USB 隨身碟執行 NVDA 來說是一個很好的選擇。

segment.source: Each voice that comes with eSpeak NG speaks a different language.
segment.target: eSpeak NG 提供多種語音能說出不同的語言，

segment.source: There are over 43 different languages supported by eSpeak NG.
segment.target: 全部共支援超過 43 種語言，

segment.source: There are also many variants which can be chosen to alter the sound of the voice.
segment.target: 而且還有許多不同的變聲可供選擇。

segment.source: Microsoft Speech API version 4 (SAPI 4)
segment.target: Microsoft SAPI 4 (SAPI 4)

segment.source: SAPI 4 is an older Microsoft standard for software speech synthesizers.
segment.target: SAPI 4 是 Microsoft 較早期的軟體語音合成器標準，

segment.source: NVDA still supports this for users who already have SAPI 4 synthesizers installed.
segment.target: NVDA 仍然支援原先已安裝此語音合成器的使用者，

segment.source: However, Microsoft no longer support this and needed components are no longer available from Microsoft.
segment.target: 然而 Microsoft 已不再支援，所需的元件也無法從 Microsoft 取得。

segment.source: When using this synthesizer with NVDA, the available voices (accessed from the [Speech category](#SpeechSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog or by the [Synth Settings Ring](#SynthSettingsRing)) will contain all the voices from all the installed SAPI 4 engines found on your system.
segment.target: 當 NVDA 選取這個合成器，安裝在您的 Windows 系統中的所有 SAPI 4 引擎提供的語音都可被使用，您可以從 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的[語音類別](#SpeechSettings)或利用[快速語音設定](#SynthSettingsRing)來選用。

segment.source: Microsoft Speech API version 5 (SAPI 5)
segment.target: Microsoft SAPI 5 (SAPI 5)

segment.source: SAPI 5 is a Microsoft standard for software speech synthesizers.
segment.target: SAPI 5 是 Microsoft 軟體語音合成器的標準，

segment.source: Many speech synthesizers that comply with this standard may be purchased or downloaded for free from various companies and websites, though your system will probably already come with at least one SAPI 5 voice preinstalled.
segment.target: 您可以從許多公司或網站購買或免費下載遵循這個標準的語音，僅管您的 Windows 系統中可能已預先安裝了至少一個 SAPI 5 語音。

segment.source: When using this synthesizer with NVDA, the available voices (accessed from the [Speech category](#SpeechSettings) of the [NVDA Settings](#NVDASettings) dialog or by the [Synth Settings Ring](#SynthSettingsRing)) will contain all the voices from all the installed SAPI 5 engines found on your system.
segment.target: 當 NVDA 選取這個合成器，安裝在您的 Windows 系統中的所有 SAPI 5 引擎提供的語音都可被使用，您可以從 [NVDA 設定](#NVDASettings)對話框中的[語音類別](#SpeechSettings)或利用[快速語音設定](#SynthSettingsRing)來選用。

segment.source: Microsoft Speech Platform
segment.target: Microsoft Speech Platform

segment.source: The Microsoft Speech Platform provides voices for many languages which are normally used in the development of server-based speech applications.
segment.target: Microsoft Speech Platform 提供了許多種語言的語音，通常用在基於伺服器的語音應用程式的開發，

segment.source: These voices can also be used with NVDA.
segment.target: NVDA 也能使用這些語音。

segment.source: To use these voices, you will need to install two components:
segment.target: 要使用這些語音，您需要安裝兩個元件：

segment.source: [Microsoft Speech Platform - Runtime (Version 11), x86](https://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=27225)
segment.target: [Microsoft Speech Platform - Runtime (版本 11), x86](https://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=27225)

segment.source: [Microsoft Speech Platform - Runtime Languages (Version 11)](https://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=27224)
segment.target: [Microsoft Speech Platform - Runtime Languages (版本 11)](https://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=27224)

segment.source: This page includes many files for both speech recognition and text-to-speech.
segment.target: 此頁面包含了許多語音辨識及文字轉語音 (text-to-speech, TTS) 的檔案，

segment.source: Choose the files containing the TTS data for the desired languages/voices.
segment.target: 請依照所需的語言或語音選擇對應的 TTS 檔案，

segment.source: For example, the file MSSpeech_TTS_en-US_ZiraPro.msi is a U.S. English voice.
segment.target: 例如 MSSpeech_TTS_en-US_ZiraPro.msi 是美式英文的語音。

segment.source: Windows OneCore Voices
segment.target: Windows OneCore 語音

segment.source: Windows 10 and later includes voices known as "OneCore" or "mobile" voices.
segment.target: Windows 10 及之後的版本含有稱為「OneCore」或「mobile」的語音，

segment.source: Voices are provided for many languages, and they are more responsive than the Microsoft voices available using Microsoft Speech API version 5.
segment.target: 該語音提供了多種語言，且與使用 Microsoft SAPI 5 的 Microsoft 語音相比反應更快，

segment.source: On Windows 10 and later, NVDA uses Windows OneCore voices by default ([eSpeak NG](#eSpeakNG) is used in other releases).
segment.target: 在 Windows 10 及之後的版本 NVDA 預設使用 Windows OneCore 語音 (在其他版本中則預設使用 [eSpeak NG](#eSpeakNG))。

segment.source: To add new Windows OneCore voices, go to "Speech Settings", within Windows system settings.
segment.target: 要新增 Windows OneCore 語音，請前往 Windows 系統「設定」中的「時間與語言」，

segment.source: Use the "Add voices" option and search for the desired language.
segment.target: 接著在清單中選擇「語音」，然後找到「新增語音」按鈕來搜尋所需語言的語音。

segment.source: Many languages include multiple variants.
segment.target: 許多語言會包含多種不同地區使用的語音，

segment.source: "United Kingdom" and "Australia" are two of the English variants.
segment.target: 例如「英國」、「澳大利亞」是兩個英文的不同語音，

segment.source: "France", "Canada" and "Switzerland" are French variants available.
segment.target: 又例如「法國」、「加拿大」、「瑞士」是法文可使用的不同語音，

segment.source: Search for the broader language (such as English or French), then locate the variant in the list.
segment.target: 您可以使用大範圍的語言來搜尋，例如輸入「英文」、「法文」等，清單便會列出該語言的不同地區語音，

segment.source: Select any languages desired and use the "add" button to add them.
segment.target: 選擇想要的語言然後按「新增」按鈕來加入，

segment.source: Once added, restart NVDA.
segment.target: 新增完成後重新啟動 NVDA。

segment.source: Please see [Supported languages and voices](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/appendix-a-supported-languages-and-voices-4486e345-7730-53da-fcfe-55cc64300f01) for a list of available voices.
segment.target: 有關可用的語音清單請見[支援的詞言和聲音](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/appendix-a-supported-languages-and-voices-4486e345-7730-53da-fcfe-55cc64300f01)。

segment.source: Supported Braille Displays
segment.target: 支援的點顯器

segment.source: This section contains information about the Braille displays supported by NVDA.
segment.target: 本章節包含 NVDA 支援點顯器的資訊。

segment.source: Displays supporting automatic detection in the background
segment.target: 支援背景自動偵測的點顯器

segment.source: NVDA has the ability to detect many braille displays in the background automatically, either via USB or bluetooth.
segment.target: NVDA 擁有透過 USB 或藍牙在背景自動偵測到許多點顯器的能力，

segment.source: This behaviour is achieved by selecting the Automatic option as the preferred braille display from NVDA's [Braille Settings dialog](#BrailleSettings).
segment.target: 要實現此行為請在 NVDA 設定對話框中[點字類別](#BrailleSettings)]的變更點顯器選擇「自動偵測」選項作為慣用的點顯器，

segment.source: This option is selected by default.
segment.target: 此選項預設選取。

segment.source: The following displays support this automatic detection functionality.
segment.target: 下列點顯器支援背景自動偵測功能。

segment.source: Handy Tech displays
segment.target: Handy Tech 點顯器

segment.source: Baum/Humanware/APH/Orbit braille displays
segment.target: Baum/Humanware/APH/Orbit 點顯器

segment.source: HumanWare Brailliant BI/B series
segment.target: HumanWare Brailliant BI/B 系列

segment.source: Freedom Scientific Focus/PAC Mate Series
segment.target: Freedom Scientific Focus/PAC Mate 系列

segment.source: All Focus and PAC Mate displays from [Freedom Scientific](https://www.freedomscientific.com/) are supported when connected via USB or bluetooth.
segment.target: NVDA 支援透過 USB 或藍牙連接的所有 [Freedom Scientific](https://www.freedomscientific.com/) 的 Focus 與 PAC Mate 點顯器，

segment.source: You will need the Freedom Scientific braille display drivers installed on your system.
segment.target: 您需要在電腦上安裝 Freedom Scientific 點顯器的驅動程式，

segment.source: If you do not have them already, you can obtain them from the [Focus Blue Braille Display Driver page](https://support.freedomscientific.com/Downloads/Focus/FocusBlueBrailleDisplayDriver).
segment.target: 如果您還沒有這些驅動程式，您可以從 [Focus Blue Braille Display Driver page](https://support.freedomscientific.com/Downloads/Focus/FocusBlueBrailleDisplayDriver) 取得，

segment.source: Although this page only mentions the Focus Blue display, the drivers support all Freedom Scientific Focus and Pacmate displays.
segment.target: 雖然此網頁只提到 Focus Blue 點顯器，但驅動程式支援所有 Freedom Scientific Focus 及 Pacmate 點顯器。

segment.source: By default, NVDA can automatically detect and connect to these displays either via USB or bluetooth.
segment.target: 預設情況下 NVDA 可以透過 USB 或藍牙自動偵測並連接這些點顯器，

segment.source: However, when configuring the display, you can explicitly select "USB" or "Bluetooth" ports to restrict the connection type to be used.
segment.target: 不過在設定點顯器時您可以明確的選擇「USB」或「藍牙」連接埠以限制要使用的連接類型，

segment.source: This might be useful if you want to connect the focus display to NVDA using bluetooth, but still be able to charge it using USB power from your computer.
segment.target: 若您想要 NVDA 用藍芽與 focus 點顯器連接，但仍然要能用電腦的 USB 為點顯器充電，這將非常有用。

segment.source: NVDA's automatic braille display detection will also recognize the display on USB or Bluetooth.
segment.target: NVDA 的點顯器自動偵測功能也將會辨識 USB 或藍牙上的點顯器。

segment.source: Following are the key assignments for this display with NVDA.
segment.target: 以下是此點顯器在 NVDA 的按鍵指派，

segment.source: Please see the display's documentation for descriptions of where these keys can be found.
segment.target: 這些按鍵的實際位置請參見點顯器的說明文件。

segment.target: 名稱 |按鍵

segment.target: 點顯器向下捲動 |topRouting20/40/80 (點顯器最後一方)
